item.description: Game Description SOL CESTO is a swift route that encounter a strategy and accident. Gamers fall into the world shrouded in secrets, and seek to get to the depths of the dungeon in search of a long -lost sun. The dungeon is generated randomly, which means that there are no two identical travels. Each floor is divided into four rooms, and you have to decide which one to enter, never knowing what awaits the door.

item.title: Zombie Cure Lab
item.description: Game Description Zombie Cure Lab - this is an opportunity to plunge into a colorful sandbox-laboratory, in which gamers have to put a variety of experiments on zombies. Scientists find a way to begin to control monsters that will be able to turn into hybrid creatures, half-dead people. Now you have to find a full medicine to calm and cure all the injured humanity from the disease of zombie. Users will build walls and fences to protect complexes with scientists.

item.title: Contractville
item.description: Game Description Contraactville beckoning lovers of simulators with their history about how to turn from rags into rich. Forget about gorgeous houses, you start with a penny in a port town. But do not be afraid, starting a tycoon! In Contractville you can build your own fate yourself by demolition, construction and interior design. And what is interesting: you can sell your architectural masterpieces at the auction, turning your sweat and ingenuity into cold, firm money.

item.title: 9 kings
item.description: Game Description 9 Kings throws users into the very heart of the medieval kingdom, where the strategy, tactics and resource management dictates the need for survival. This urban planning Roguelike combines a lot of a mechanic, offering unpredictable experience with each launch. The expansion of the kingdom requires careful planning, because the power of the empire depends on each decision. Using a deck of various cards, rulers form their possessions, adapting to unexpected challenges.

item.title: Clink
item.description: Game Description Clink puts a player in the role of a woman living in voluntary solitude in an old house only with her cat and buried memories. The central conflict lies in the question of whether its experiences are symptoms of a prescribed disease or a manifestation of something otherworldly. One morning, the familiar way of the heroine is broken: one of the doors is locked, the key disappeared, and a metal ringing echoed in his head.

item.title: Coin Push RPG
item.description: Game Description Coin Push RPG combines the mechanics of an arcade machine with elements of pumping characters. In the center of the process is a full-fledged simulator of a classic coin-pusher, where actions directly affect resources. Good luck drums, bonus towers and jackpotes form the rhythm of sessions and provide an influx of coins. It is these coins that launch the actions of fighters subordinates to the player. In the Coin Push RPG project, characters do not enter the battle for free.

item.title: Garden of Witches
item.description: Game Description Garden of Witches will tell about the strength - a girl who makes his way through a dangerous magical world to return order. Its goal is to find the escaped witches who violated agreements and abandoned the garden. The place is rapidly destroyed, but the strength is not going to allow Leni to destroy everything that she built. Each promotion requires actions, choice and readiness for a fight.

item.title: Tainted Grail: The Fall of Avalon
item.description: Game Description The player in Tainted Grail: The Fall of Avalon will have to unravel the secrets of the guards of menhirs, threatening the main character of the main character. The role -playing adventure will occur in an open world based on rethought classical legends about King Arthur. The user will be able to design his own deck of various cards with unique features and use. The plot begins with the death of Avalon.

item.title: Tinkerlands
item.description: Game Description Tinkerlands offers game experience where the characters find themselves in unknown islands. Survival becomes the main task that encourages the study of these new territories, the creation of the necessary tools and contacts with various inhabitants of these lands. Gamers gradually build personal shelters that can develop into large settlements. Interaction with the environment also opens access to magic, giving additional ways to overcome difficulties. The Tinkerlands universe consists of the main continent, three other large islands and many small islands, each of them provides unique conditions, resources and tests.

item.title: Velocity Rift
item.description: Game Description Velocity Rift puts a player for driving a vehicle with a view of the top, setting him the task of competing on tracks located on a secluded island. A single gameplay is built around 3 separate game modes, each of which has its own rules and conditions for victory. Promotion on these diverse competitions requires a constant concentration from the racer to pass complicated routes and maneuvers of computer opponents.

item.title: City Tales - Medieval Era
item.description: Game Description City Tales - Medieval Era is devoted to the construction and development of settlements in the Middle Ages. The player controls the expansion of territories, creating residential areas, roads and public places. Instead of a predetermined net of streets, the path is determined by the actions of residents - it is they who form routes connecting various objects. The layout is not fixed: the areas are adjusted to real needs, and the structure of the city depends on the decisions made in the course of the process.

item.title: Duck Detective: The Ghost of Glamping
item.description: Game Description Duck Detective: The Ghost of Glamping introduces Eugene McCryaklin, a duck detective who is currently experiencing depression, the consequences of a recent divorce and documented traction to bread, noticeably complicating its everyday life. His mission is to understand the situation in the camping territory, a place with the alleged paranormal activity, where there was no murder. In the process of completing this task, McRryakclina will have to study important subjects, find connections between facts and deal with episodes of her own past.

item.title: Loss
item.description: Game Description Loss represents a narrative concentrated on a teenager who is faced with family tragedies. He wakes up one night and discovers the disappearance of his family members from their house, which encourages him to begin the trial. The gameplay includes the movement of housing, collecting objects and keys to open new areas, as well as a solution to riddles to understand what is happening. The study of the situation becomes important for restoring the chain of events that led to its isolation.

item.title: Mindkatt: first stud
item.description: Game Description mindkatt: first strike represents a setting in which cats with developed intelligence use mechanical structures to interact in human society. This project puts players in a futuristic environment, where despotistical orders reign. These cats, having passed serious mental evolution, are in contact with the world through robotic devices. Their life in this difficult era, subject to people, forms the core of history. In the general world, Mindkatt: First Strike, human groups are kept under the control of Mindkatt - a developed type of cats facing slavery.

item.title: Mystery Island: Missing Amy
item.description: Game Description Mystery Island: Missing Amy tells about the hell, the researcher, looking for sister, mysteriously missing months ago. The plot unfolds when hell receives a selfie from a loved one; The picture captures the missing girl on a remote island, where sea water has a bloody red color. This frame encourages hell to take a sea trip to search for a relative and study the location from a mysterious message.

item.title: Out of Sight
item.description: Game Description Out of Sight is a project where a young girl, deprived of direct vision, should find a way through the building, temporarily receiving the ability to see through her toy. She turned out to be locked inside and tries to get out at any cost. Those who keep her here are actively looking for her and seek to stop her, creating a constant direct threat of her freedom and life.

item.title: Survive the Fall
item.description: Game Description The disaster in Survive The Fall occurred in 2023, when a huge asteroid crashed into the ground. Most of the population died, and those who were in distant places in the world survived. The player moves to the post -apocalyptic environment, where it is necessary to engage in the construction of settlements, using tactical and strategic elements. An extensive and open world includes many good lands, forests or destroyed cities.

item.title: Cauldron
item.description: Game Description Cauldron is a role project with an emphasis on a system of improvement and the implementation of mini-stories. In the role of NIX, a character who finds himself in a world immersed in darkness will have to explore the environment and look for allies. The structure implies the cycle: the commission of actions leads to strengthening the party, which opens the way to the study of new areas and obtaining content.

item.title: Fantasy Life I: The Girl Who Steals Time
item.description: Game Description In Fantasy Life I: The Girl Who Steals Time, immersion in the atmosphere of leisurely existence within the boundaries of the fantasy world is available. This title includes the possibility of changing roles among 14 different professions called lives. Participants can collect resources by fishing or wood harvesting, cooking, form an island space, or unite with other gamers to confront creatures in extensive areas. The narrative begins with the adventurer’s accession to the team of the archaeologist Edward on a sea journey.

item.title: JDM: Japanese Drift Master
item.description: Game Description JDM: Japanese Drift Master is a colorful car simulator that will take you into the exciting world of drifting on the streets of Japan. A huge open world with varied landscapes, from serene lakes to bustling city areas, offers endless opportunities for exploration, racing and, of course, the art of drifting itself. What sets the game apart is the freedom it gives players to customize their cars, allowing them to truly make it their own.

item.title: Regulators
item.description: Game Description Regulators sets before a detachment of mercenaries the task of stripping the city from mutating villains with weapons, gadgets and special abilities. The team penetrates into buildings from streets, roofs or sewers to fulfill the goals leading to the scientist, commander of the antagonists. The situation began after the fall of an asteroid that released the alien substance of the UZ. It was soon found that this material has narcotic potential and causes mutations in all its exposure, including the detachment fighters themselves.

item.title: Wool at the Gates
item.description: Game Description Wool at the Gates presents a tactical defense experience. This project combines base defense mechanics, auto-battler-style synergy elements, and hero character control. User takes on the role of commander, leading the allied forces and building defenses for the city. This structure creates a cycle involving strategic preparation and subsequent combat engagements against advancing swarms of sheep. The gameplay unfolds in stages, the complexity of which increases. Each stage in Wool at the Gates consists of a construction phase and a subsequent battle against enemy formations.

item.title: Desktop Survivors 98
item.description: Game Description Desktop Survivors 98 Places the gaming cursor directly into the operational environment of the computer. This pointer acts as a central element, moving through the generated areas and entering into battle with the emerging groups of enemies. Players find and collect various objects and weapons designed to facilitate their further advancement and survival through subsequent threats. The cyclic structure directs through stages that require constant confrontation between the advancing waves of opponents, organized maneuvering in the determined zones and the necessary repetition of these actions for further penetration.

item.title: Roadcraft
item.description: Game Description Roadcraft is a simulator in which gamers take on the role of the head of a company engaged in the restoration of territories affected by natural disasters. The main task is to use various types of construction equipment for clearing blockages, restoring roads and repairing damaged infrastructure. The Title offers a detailed approach to the problems that arise in the elimination of the consequences of natural disasters, offering tasks such as replacing faulty equipment and deploying resources columns to create the necessary materials for reconstruction.

item.title: S.T.A.L.K.E.R.: Call of Prypiat - Enhanced Edition
item.description: Game Description S.T.A.L.K.E.R.: Call of Prypiat - Enhanced Edition puts the player in the role of Major Degtyarev, an intelligence officer sent to the cover under the cover. Its task is to find out the causes of the failure of the military operation and the disappearance of the detachment. Events unfold in the Pripyat region, where everything is permeated with dangers: anomalies, radiation, hostile groups and an unstable situation. In Stalker: Call of Prypiat - Enhanced Edition, each action has consequences.

item.title: S.T.A.L.K.E.R.: Clear Sky - Enhanced Edition
item.description: Game Description S.T.A.L.K.E.R.: Clear Sky - Enhanced Edition transfers a gamer to the role of a mercenary named Scar, forced to survive among warring groups, unstable abnormalities and deadly emissions. The action takes place to the events of the previous title of the series, demonstrating the origins of the territorial split in the zone. The basis of the mechanics is the system of wars of fractions - with its help, the user is able to change the alignment of forces between armed formations.

item.title: S.T.A.L.K.E.R.: Shadow of Chornobyl - Enhanced Edition
item.description: Game Description S.T.A.L.K.E.R.: Shadow of Chornobyl - Enhanced Edition transferred gamers to the alienation zone around the Chernobyl nuclear power plant, where anomalies, armed groups and mutants act outside the law framework. Movement in this territory depends on food supplies, the level of radiation, the number of cartridges and relations with other characters. Plot tasks can be performed in different ways using research, shootings and dialogs. The environment is a constant danger, which requires attention to details, and not following the finished routes.

item.title: The Siege and the Sandfox
item.description: Game Description The Siege and the Sandfox - this is exciting fantasy steam -metrousing, in which you will find a dangerous adventure in the besieged kingdom. You will become a legendary sandy fox, master of parkour and secrecy, and go in search of evil hiding in the sands. It is necessary to explore the palace and ancient dungeons, using all your skills to find out where the source is located. Run, jump, slide, balance and swing to go through a complex world filled with useful objects, new equipment and skills.

item.title: Tower of Babel: Survivors of Chaos
item.description: Game Description Tower of Babel: Survivors of Chaos puts a gamer in the face of endless streams of hostile creatures. Subjects develop new skills and strengthen their capabilities. The main task is to climb inside the tower, striving for its top to find the fulfillment of personal, most secret desires. This desire requires a clash with continuous opposition, sometimes at a very expensive price, and adaptation of its state to battle.

item.title: Villages and Dungeons
item.description: Game Description Villages and Dungeons is a Roguelite card, where the compilation of a set lays a strategic foundation. Players have to study the procedurally created dungeons, participate in a series of events and withstand opponents with various tests. Each journey offers a unique configuration of circumstances that have not previously met, since the decisions of the gamer directly affect the development of each batch. The central gameplay is built on strategic selection of cards and their tactical placement.

item.title: Galaxy HighWays
item.description: Game Description Galaxy Highways puts a player at the head of a star pilot after the discovery of alien gate to mankind led to the destruction of the Earth. The surviving representatives of civilization founded the colony of the last hope - a settlement, which is constantly threatened by the same alien force, striving to detect it. As a pilot of the special forces, the main function is to protect the colony by completing tasks, including attacks on enemy attitudes, the defense of friendly caravans and the seizure of aliens for research.

item.title: Monster Battles
item.description: Game Description Monster Battles is a tactical auto-batler with equipment control. In this project, participants collect, unite and strategically place a group of creatures for upcoming fights. These creatures are purchased in a special store and then are placed on a certain battlefield before the start of an automatic fight. An effective selection and location of a variety of combat units forms the basis of the game cycle. In Monster Battles, building a successful detachment requires thoroughly accounting for the features and belonging of the collected creatures.

item.title: Blacksmith Master
item.description: Game Description Blacksmith Master is an exciting simulator in which you can control your own blacksmiths, starting with mining and precious stones to the design and sale of finished products. Your task will be tortured everything - from weapons and armor to instruments and kitchen utensils - to earn on your craft and become a real master of blacksmithing. Here you can lead your own medieval blacksmith and you will control the entire process: the extraction of resources, their processing and production and sale of finished products.

item.title: House of Legacy
item.description: Game Description House of Legacy starts at the moment when the rebels overcome the city defense, which forces the player to lead the remaining relatives in wanderings, promising many difficulties. They find a shelter in the county center, the last uninhabited corner, which is not affected by the embarrassment, where the foundations of the new dynasty are laid. This journey becomes a starting point for the formation of a weighty dynastic influence that can resist the world transformed by straightforwardness.

item.title: Cubic Odyssey
item.description: Game Description Cubic Odyssey is a large -scale project with an open setting that combines the elements of research, survival and creativity. Users move according to procedured planets, interact with a variety of ecosystems and fight with the upcoming force known as red darkness. In the universe there are planets with a changing environment, ancient ruins and settlements inhabited by NPC fraction. Each place is complex tasks and opportunities that require strategic resource management and adaptation.

item.title: Maltese's Fluffy Onsen
item.description: Game Description Maltese’s Fluffy Onsen is a simulation where players manage a fauna establishment. This gameplay takes place at the bottom of the screen, allowing you to do other things at the same time. The main task is to provide a service to these animal visitors, facilitating their transition to a state of rest. Gamers are installing customizable temperature baths and dedicated relaxation areas for a diverse clientele. Inside the Animal Spa game, you have to organize a bathing area to satisfy the needs of animal guests.

item.title: Once Upon a Mind - A Little Too Friendly
item.description: Game Description Once Upon a Mind - A Little Too Friendly tells about the 23 -year -old Emily who moved to Brooklyn in search of a calm life. A cozy apartment, work in a small cafe nearby and a friendly hostess create a feeling of stability. Everything seems simple and understandable, until anxious changes appear in the usual routine. Details are gradually opening in small things that are difficult not to pay attention to.

item.title: The Precint
item.description: Game Description The Precint is a police officer single -user simulator that immerses gamers into the lively urban environment of the 1980s. Having entered the place of Officer Nick Cordell Jr., users are traveling as a beginner who recently graduated from the police academy. Against the background of Averno City, an active life is in full swing, a wide range of procedured crimes is presented in it, from minor violations of the rules of the road to large robberies of banks.

item.title: Chambers
item.description: Game Description Chambers Simits a gamer in a role -playing shooter with a wild West setting with its own features. The plot puts the protagonist in the world, split by the war for a drink, where the antagonists, known as the Reds, seized power. These enemies divided the territory into separate zones - cameras. The main character moves around this world in search of a specific coffin. An unusual environment combines the elements of the western with gloomy humor and horror.

item.title: Ketz: Galactic Overlords
item.description: Game Description KETZ: Galactic Overlords is a game in a science fiction setting, where gamers participate in the Rowli-hord survival with RPG elements. Each gamer chooses a character and collects items to create unique assemblies using the possibilities received from galactic leaders. These gamers overcome tireless clashes, trying to survive and understand why these powerful figures provide assistance. In Ketz: Galactic Overlords, users improve their combat capabilities through specialized systems. Progresses implies an improvement in the resulting equipment.

item.title: Ultimate Fishing Simulator 2
item.description: Game Description Ultimate Fishing Simulator 2 - fishing simulator, offering to participate in a huge number of tests and demonstrate many different techniques. Use a wide set of tools and gear: feeder, overlap, spinning, classic float and much more. Continuation of the game significantly improves the graphic component, adds many mechanics, tools and improves all aspects of the gameplay. More and better - the basic principle of Ultimate Fishing Simulator 2.

item.title: Ascension
item.description: Game Description Ascension invites the gamer to try on the role of a young follower, the last chance for a community that has been in a distress. Once on the other side of the portal, this character takes on the reins of government. The paramount goal is the revival of the order, honing alchemical skills and moving along the path to the highest form of being; This path is associated with the need for a competent disposal of stocks and balanced tactical moves.

item.title: Dino Path Trail
item.description: Game Description Dino Path Trail shows the world where dinosaurs survived to the era, similar to the wild West, setting a person to survive in this altered land. The main goal includes the search and salvation of a stolen sister through the intersection of various lands full of dangers. The chances of surviving are strongly dependent on the solutions and actions of the player as part of the structure of this action-rowlaine, where it is necessary to repulse predators, hostile people and elements.

item.title: Revenge of the Savage Planet
item.description: Game Description Revenge of the Savage Planet throws the player into alien locations. The character turns out to be thrown on the edge of the space by the former corporate employer. The central task is to move around alien territories, collecting resources and finding improvements to organize home and revenge the corporation, guilty of its position. The study of the area includes the detection of hidden objects and the interaction with the environment.

item.title: Rift Riff
item.description: Game Description Rift Riff throws gamers into the cracks between worlds to battle monsters and collect valuables. Gameplay is built around tower defense, requiring careful placement and control of structures. Before the start of the mission, you will have to determine a set of defense structures and then build them on the map at the designated points. A key aspect of Rift Riff is selecting defensive structures to counter enemy types and their attacks.

item.title: Cash Cleaner Simulator
item.description: Game Description Cash Cleaner Simulator immerses a gamer in the role of a specialist in processing illegal means for criminal structures. The character accepts orders from figures of the criminal world, which need to be returned to finances without traces of their origin. Deliveries come in various packages, demanding to extract currency, determine the presence of contaminants like blood or dirt, as well as weed out false banknotes before the main procedure.

item.title: Chronomon
item.description: Game Description Chronomon combines elements of monsters care and the simulation of the farm. Players find themselves in the world after a disaster, where they have to catch unusual creatures, improve their skills and help in restoration. Communication with the settlers and step -by -step battles complement the process of arranging their own allotment of land, and the main task is to form a detachment of pets and control of resources in the proposed conditions.

item.title: Dice with Death
item.description: Game Description Dice with Death provides a script where the protagonist has already died. Instead of an immediate transition to another world, the essence known as death offers a competition. This competition forms the basis of activity presented in the Roguelike format with cube collection mechanics. The gameplay requires a direct confrontation with death in step -by -step strategic meetings. The goal lies in successful rivalry with this mythical opponent through thoughtful bones of bones.

item.title: Doloc Town
item.description: Game Description Doloc Town - this is a farm simulator in the conditions of post -apocalypse. The player accepts the role of a beginner whose task is to build an existing economy in the desert territory. The environment pushes to the study of its predominantly unexplored areas. Key activity includes the landing of cultures, the construction of the necessary structures and the consistent search for information about the past of this changed world.

item.title: Spirit of the North 2
item.description: Game Description Spirit of the North 2 allows the gamer to manage a fox as part of a third -person adventure. The scene is the ancient world full of ruins, where the red -haired heroine is in isolation, far from the native edges. Accompanied by a wise companion-warrior, the protagonist goes in search of missing guards. The main task is to free these creatures from the influence of a shaman named Grimnir, as well as in the return of the fox home.

item.title: Tank Squad
item.description: Game Description Tank Squad transfers players during the Second World War, to the most intense territories, whose fate will affect the outcome of the clash. The user will visit the role of captain of the tank detachment, taking part in the iconic battles of that time. Scenarios will include historical battles for a single -user or cooperative passage of three participants at the same time. In the multiplayer, each gamer is able to control their own team, or unite among themselves and become a separate crew member.

item.title: The Midnight Walk
item.description: Game Description The Midnight Walk invites on a shadow journey around the world where fire and darkness are found. Title is an adventure based on dark fantasy and manual work. In the role of Pogorelets, gamers unite with Potbo, a Fund-Fund with an inexhaustible flame in order to navigate in a world full of dangers. Along the way, users should outwit terrible monsters who seek to extinguish the light, adding a tense layer to an already terrible environment.

item.title: Tower Dominion
item.description: Game Description Tower Dominion proposes to combine the construction of the landscape with the protection of the citadel from alien forces as part of Roguelike strategy. The commander (this gamer) must protect the territory from constant raids of arthronids. The gameplay implies the creation of fortifications and control over the battlefield itself during skirmishes. Each confrontation poses new tasks due to procedural generation that affects the arising difficulties. Success depends on changes in the protective orders and competent use of available funds against the advancing enemy detachments.

item.title: Vambrace: Dungeon Monarch
item.description: Game Description Vambrace: Dungeon Monarch weaves together multiple genres to create a tapestry of strategy and decision-making that keeps players on their toes. It is based on the role of the monarch - a figure chosen by higher powers to protect the dungeon from invasion. The Dungeon is not just a place, it is a realm of wealth and power, coveted by those who think they can lay claim to its treasures.

item.title: Yes, Your Grace 2: Snowfall
item.description: Game Description Yes, Your Grace 2: Snowfall puts players in the role of the monarch of the crumbling kingdom. They have to manage this cinematic game in the management of possessions. The key task is to find the balance between the needs of the subjects and the resources of the state. Well -being or collapse depends on the decisions made. The throne room becomes a place for a series of petitioners who bring trouble, help or entertainment in the world of Slavic folklore.

item.title: Hordes of Hunger
item.description: Game Description Hordes of Hunger offers a script where a gamer has to control a world, a heroine whose task is to protect his native lands. A certain essence, known as a beast, came out of the sea with her hordes, starting an invasion, comparable to a living starvation, devouring everything around. The world becomes the main obstacle to this unstoppable invasion of monsters in the conditions of dark fantasy. The project immerses in three -dimensional battles, where the main goal is to survive under the onslaught of the ongoing waves of opponents.

item.title: Teddy's Haven - A Fantasy Inspired Shop Simulator
item.description: Game Description Teddy’s Haven - A Fantasy Inspired Shop Simulator puts the player in the role of the owner who controls a small store on the periphery of the mysterious island. The shop specializes in the sale of potions, weapons and various magic wonders for a variety of clientele. Among the buyers are adventurers preparing for campaigns, magicians in search of rare components and other mystical creatures. The main cycle of classes is to replenish the shelves, manage the inventory, set up each aspect of the interior and hiring employees.

item.title: Trench Tales
item.description: Game Description Trench Tales is a game project that introduces gamers to a dark alternative reality, the events of which take place between the First and Second World Wars. You take control of a lone fighter, transported to the strange dimension of Verdun by the actions of unknown forces. The story is told in third person, focusing on the action in this dysfunctional environment with elements of horror and dark fantasy.

item.title: Best Served Cold
item.description: Game Description The Best Served Cold puts a gamer at the Knightsp Rack, an underground bar, working during the dry law in the alternative European city of Bukovia. You take on the role of a bartender responsible for the preparation of cocktails for visitors to the institution. Intections go beyond the maintenance, including direct clashes with persons identified as criminals and the need to navigate in dangerous situations. The main actions include the investigation of the murders taking place in this environment while maintaining the work of the bar.

item.title: Drop Duchy
item.description: Game Description Drop Duchy combines the mechanics of geometric puzzles with the construction of the territory and the management of resources. Gamers use falling figures not only to clean the lines, but also for the phased construction of possessions. The task is to collect materials and the formation of troops to confront enemy armies, while each installed block contributes to the development of the kingdom on the path to the triumph.

item.title: Knights of the Crusades
item.description: Game Description Knights of the Crusades sends a player during the first crusades, where a lone knight will come to begin. It is ahead to go to the foundation and management of the holy order, choosing the Templars or creating their own fraction. The process combines real -time elements with the construction of settlements and management within the sandbox. You have to solve problems related to war, religious influence, diplomacy and strategic planning.

item.title: Freeride
item.description: Game Description Adventures in Freeride will allow you to look at the mysterious world of spirits, where players will be able to test the skills of telekinesis, taking under the control of the protagonist. In the process of passage, you will have to perform a variety of actions that affect the general story of the narrative and allow you to analyze the character and personality of the user. The game is made in the form of role adventura, where you have to explore three -dimensional locations and communicate with secondary characters.

item.title: Maze Mice
item.description: Game Description MAZE MICE is an action rogal, where the current playing time depends on the input of the gamer; Time goes forward only when the character moves. It is necessary to control the avatar inside the labyrinths, collecting a point for advancement in the locations. The accumulation of points brings experience points, allowing you to increase the hero level and open access to the choice of upgrades that change its characteristics.

item.title: Sipssassin
item.description: Game Description Sipssassin offers a gamer to devastate glasses of unsuspecting personalities, using secrecy tactics, special gadgets and near -battle weapons. A long -standing confrontation unfolds between the Sipssassins and the villains of the villains, because the latter strive for world domination through control of drinks. Your task is to methodically drain every affordable container for detecting secret opponents and disrupting their operations. This project provides 5 unique missions for execution in an arbitrary sequence, offering a nonlinear advancement in the plot.

item.title: Vellum
item.description: Game Description Vellum throws gamers into a world filled with strategic combat and decision-making. Go it alone or team up with others to overcome challenges and gain control of your journey. The main highlight of Vellum is the innovative mechanics of influencing the enemy’s development. This gives the strategy an extra layer that goes beyond simply winning the next fight. The heart beats with collaboration. Team up with friends to overcome obstacles together.

item.title: Ratopia
item.description: Game Description Ratopia is an original strategy that challenges genres thanks to a unique combination of survival, sandbox and a city construction simulator. Get ready to plunge into a huge and exciting world that will captivate you with its endless possibilities. Here you have to create your ideal city and manage it, but be careful, because every resident has its own characteristics and wealth that you must take into account. No one said that it would be easy, but with the right selection of jobs and services, you can make your residents happy, and your economy is prosperous.

item.title: Stickman Strikes: Conquer Fantasy World
item.description: Game Description Stickman Strikes: Conquer Fantasy World immerses gamer into a fantasy environment after turning into a steakman with a dragon flame. This universe accepts unusual inhabitants, allowing the style of the stickman to fit into local life. The player will have to achieve goals like capturing castles, the acquisition of land or command of a detachment in this world. The activity is not limited to battles and covers the study of the dungeons, the search for values, trade, farming and the creation of things.

item.title: Conquest Dark
item.description: Game Description Conquest Dark is an action-RPG, whose action takes place 237 years after the arrival of a black planet, the events that led humanity to the threshold of destruction. In this alternative medieval history, the legions of non -life control the fallen kingdoms, the cosmic gods are overthrown, and the ancient original people woke up from sleep. Participants in the events choose dark rituals for interacting with the forces responsible for the collapse of civilization in the setting of fantasy-united with an isometric camera and aspects of mythology.

item.title: Deadzone: Rogue
item.description: Game Description Deadzone: rogue immerses the gamer into events on board the ISS-X vessel, located in deep space, where the protagonist recovers without memories. Faced with the upcoming legions of hostile vehicles, the character is forced to enter into battles from the first person in the compartments of the ship, from machine departments to the Kardzer. Survival depends on the movement of these locations and collisions with numerous mechanical opponents.

item.title: Gloamvault
item.description: Game Description GloamVault combines a chaotic excitement of monsters and terrible depths of the dungeons. In the role of an resurrected evil wizard, you have to go through the procedurally generated dungeons, hunting more than 500 monsters. In this world, you are not just fighting - you fascinate creatures and replenish your growing army to go further into the fatal depths of the dungeons. Your party can have no more than five monsters, so you will have to choose wisely and use your dark forces to merge them, creating stronger and unpredictable minions.

item.title: gogh: Focus with Your Avatar
item.description: Game Description Gogh: Focus with Your Avatar combines focus tools and simulation gameplay mechanics, allowing you to create a character and design a location. Gamers interact with a virtual hero and a companion creature in a variable room. This project includes time management tools in addition to customization capabilities. The main task is to help with work sessions through a combination of these elements of the simulation game. In gogh: Focus with Your Avatar, a person arranges his own room by arranging furniture, choosing decor and choosing a palette.

item.title: Kiborg
item.description: Game Description Kiborg provides a script where it is necessary to take control of the personality imprisoned in the prison of the future. Sentenced to 1300 for other people’s crimes, the main character falls into a system where death means only restoration of the body and further serving of the deadline. The only chance of freedom is to participate in the brutal event of The Last Ticket, where you need to break into the shuttle on the roof of the building, fighting with crowds of other convicts.

item.title: Motogp25
item.description: Game Description MotogP25 immerses players in the atmosphere of the 2025 motorcycle season. Gamers choose pilots and compete on the routes of the official calendar using motorcycles modeled for the current championship. The project has a system of judges MotoGP Stewards to control the tracking on the track during the races, and the sound support is recorded from the real bikes participating in the championship. Gamers interact with MotogP25, building a racing career.

item.title: Starvaders
item.description: Game Description Starvaders a combination of a mechanic of collecting a deck and step -by -step battles on the field in the setting of an alien invasion. The gamer takes control of the combat vehicle to fight the aliens with the help of compiled cards. The process moves through roguelike style visits, which requires adaptation. The task is to defend the Earth through the thoughtful use of maps and the placement of detachments on the field.

item.title: Age of Reforming: The Frelands
item.description: Game Description Age of reforging: The Frelands is a cruel world of the Middle Ages in an alternative world where magic exists, and the gods are quite real and if they are enough to pray and make generous gifts, they can even bless the asking person. There reigns tyranny and lawlessness, and survival is being built in trade. The more successful the seller, the easier he lives, the rest was terribly unlucky.

item.title: Path of Kung Fu
item.description: Game Description Path of Kung Fu throws you headlong into the world, filled with intrigues of martial arts. You start like no one, a nameless face in a huge crowd of supper Kung fu. But this is not some pre -destined path - you yourself determine your fate. Forget about hard classes and linear plot lines. Path of Kung Fu allows you to go to the sandbox overflowing with capabilities. Hundreds of martial arts techniques are waiting for them to master.

item.title: Wizordum
item.description: Game Description Wizordum is a first -person retro -player in which gamers assign the role of a magician going to search for a chaos source. The Title combines the elements of the classic shooters of the 90s and modern gameplay mechanics. Users move around the world of terrabrum using various spells and magic objects to combat enemies and overcoming obstacles. The gameplay focuses on research and battles. Users should strategically use their arsenal of spells to defeat a number of enemies, each of which has unique habits and methods of attack.

item.title: Badlands Crew
item.description: Game Description Badlands Crew transfers to the gamer control over a combat vehicle in the world of lawlessness that arose after a global catastrophe. Key tasks include the construction of transport, its modification and use against hostile groups for the search and salvation of the survivors. You collect your mobile fortress from individual components, selecting elements such as flamethrowers, sniper turrets, rate of fire machine guns, observation tower and medical points.

item.title: Kingdom's Deck
item.description: Game Description Kingdom’s Deck presents a card-based experience that combines city building with nightly repelling attacks. Gamers will become rulers of the lands, faced with the task of expanding their personal possessions and at the same time ensuring the safety of the inhabitants from enemy attacks. Gameplay focuses on deck building and the strategic placement of these assets to control and develop a power. The main actions alternate between the construction of structures during daylight hours and the organization of the defense of fortifications at nightfall.

item.title: Necrophosis
item.description: Game Description Necrophosis is not a typical horror with jumping. This first -person puzzle throws you headlong into a nightmare, blurring the boundaries between reality and the world created on the basis of our gloomy fears. The alarming atmosphere hangs with a heavy load, being a permanent companion when you move through landscapes, smelling of decay. Do not expect the story to be given from the spoon. Here, the narrative unfolds like mysterious poetry, and each puzzle - as a verse, whispering secrets.

item.title: Survivalist: Invisible Strain
item.description: Game Description Survivalist: Invisible Strain - continuation of the game Survivalist. Events take place near Vancouver in Canada. The zombivirus epidemic has been going on for 10 years. People managed to erect settlements, well -guarded from revived dead. However, the defense of the shelters fell for unknown reasons. The survivors go to the hill, hoping to build new outposts. In the game, the survivor: an invisible strain can create your own community.

item.title: Phantom Brave: The Lost Hero
item.description: Game Description Phantom Brave: The Lost Hero introduces Marona, a young girl with the ability to communicate with the spirits of the departed. She travels through the oceanic game world of Ivoire with the ghost Ash, assisting residents along the way. Their travels are interrupted by an attack by a fleet of ghost ships, leading to Marona’s separation from Ash. This event kicks off her campaign against the sea aggressors.

item.title: SpellroGue
item.description: Game Description SpellroGue immerses players in a world captured by corrupted hollowers. You pick up weapons, but not blades and bows, but powerful spells, fed by unpredictable mana cubes. In this step -by -step game, based on the construction of the decks, spells are pronouncing the manipulation of these cubes. The desired combination will fall out, and you will release fire balls, earthen walls or ark explosions. But the bones are unstable.

item.title: Hollywood Mogul 4
item.description: Game Description Hollywood Mogul 4 — это текстовый бизнес-симулятор, ставящий человека во главе киностудии. Система позволяет создавать кинофильмы и мини-сериалы на основе библиотеки из более чем 14 000 исходных материалов или собственных идей. Ready -made paintings can be planned for global film distribution or for distribution through streaming service. The process includes the formation of accurate budgets, the conclusion of agreements on rental in 19 foreign territories and the management of advertising expenses.

item.title: Oppidum
item.description: Game Description Oppidum takes the player to the island of Insul, where they will have to master the mechanics of survival alone or in a team of up to four people. The characters find themselves in a land of widespread decline due to a deep-rooted corruption that has fractured the local society. Key gameplay elements include setting up a central camp, systematically gathering supplies scattered throughout Insul, and navigating its varied zones.

item.title: Sunderfolk
item.description: Game Description Sunderfolk is a cooperative role -playing adventure designed for joint passage on one screen. This tactical adventure is designed for a team of up to 4 people traveling together around the Sunderlands world. Title uses personal gadgets as the main interface for gamer commands and information management, instead of familiar controllers. A special program provides this connection by collecting all functions on the display of each smartphone. The company is going to overcome trials in the general virtual world.

item.title: CyberCorp
item.description: Game Description CyberCorp is a top-down shooter made in a cyberpunk setting. The gameplay is aimed at dynamic shooting and looting. As the main character, you will have to fight for the future of humanity. Both single player campaign and co-op play are available. Events take place in the 25th century. CyberCorp Corporation has learned to create robotic human bodies by transferring the consciousness of living people into them. The first subjects were the military.

item.title: Darkwater
item.description: Game Description Darkwater gives gamers to command a submarine, which ended up in an ice trap on a foreign planet. This is a cooperative horror, designed to work from 1 to 4 people. Survival implies navigation in a hostile environment, clashes with enemy courts and underwater life forms, as well as an active search for resources necessary for further work of submarine. Success depends on the implementation of the necessary actions for existence in underland conditions.

item.title: Escape the Mad Empire
item.description: Game Description Escape the Mad Empire is a Roguelike Dungeon Crawler, promising a mixture of tactical battles and base control. Players collect a detachment of heroes whose survival depends on strategy and resourcefulness. The combat system requires an attentive approach. Each move, each action has weight. Using the area, shelters and objects becomes the second nature, when users move around the battlefield with high rates. The Title is not amenable to simple classification, combining the elements of Roguelike, RPG and Base-Building into unique experience.

item.title: The Elder Scrolls 4: Oblivion Remastered
item.description: Game Description The Elder Scrolls 4: Oblivion Remastered is a large-scale processing on the Unreal Engine 5 engine, completely transforming the appearance of an open world of a cult action-RPG. Title takes 25 times more disk space thanks to comprehensively processed and improved landscape textures. Also, the mechanisms of lighting and background shading were seriously revised with the addition of volumetric effects that change the type of premises and night locations.

item.title: Farm Manager World
item.description: Game Description Farm Manager World puts you in the place of the world agricultural magnate. Build your farm from scratch in a variety of corners of Europe, Central America, and soon Asia. Grow a variety of exotic crops, each of which has special needs for the soil. Study and use fertilizers to improve soil quality and increase productivity. Use crop rotation to achieve optimal results. Grow livestock from birth or buy it directly.

item.title: Tower Unite
item.description: Game Description Tower Unite is a very unusual MMO. Here, users walk and get acquainted on a large central hub called Plaza and Island. In fact, this is such a large amusement park. At the same time, one can play here alone. The project was first made on the basis of Garry’s Mod. Over time, it turned into a full -fledged separate product. The game allows gamers to create their own creativity inside it and share with others.

item.title: BodyRecords
item.description: Game Description BodyRecords presents gameplay primarily through a body camera view. Microphones directly impact the digital environment; Sounds made by players, including speech, may attract the attention of entities. Participants move through specific locations in search of specific data. This information is necessary to determine and provide an exit route. Successful progression relies heavily on group coordination, especially when solving integrated puzzles encountered during exploration. This element of cooperation is a necessity for players seeking to overcome the challenges presented together.

item.title: Echoes of yi: samsara
item.description: Game Description Echoes of yi: samsara - an action that includes elements of Chinese culture. Gamers will take on the role of a student of the master of the sword. He was instructed to confront enemies and investigate the circumstances associated with the Jiangu tree. The narrative puts a situation where the player must decide whether to face the opening truth or go in a different way. This adventure includes a study of the world of spirits in an attempt to prevent global cataclysms.

item.title: Mirage: ignis fatuus
item.description: Game Description In Mirage: Ignis Fatuus, the city of illusions is on the verge of destruction due to mana exhausting in the world. Players take control of the cubic character of Kyubead in order to save his native lands, deciding a series of isometric puzzles. The main task is to go through 50 levels dissimilar to each other, scattered through 5 unique worlds. Each location has its own features that affect the trials that the hero has to face.

item.title: It
item.description: Game Description IT’s on the Mouse combines a cafe management with a 3D platformer, providing players with control over the main characters of Holly. Being a tiny maid, she is forced to use a special navigation method in the working environment due to her growth. The gamer has to jump and run around the tables and racks to get to customers and submit orders to them. This movement system is central mechanics for receiving applications and delivery of the desired dishes.

item.title: Polterguys: Possession Party
item.description: Game Description Polterguys: Possession Party throws eight ghostly players in a competition with an indirect confrontation. The main task is to lure opponents on the path of a stray monster. Gamers control spirits capable of instilling in ordinary objects and turning them into tools of deception. Each of 10 unique levels is filled with physical traps and the dangers of the environment. Success depends on the ability to use these elements for strategic elimination of rivals, while avoiding the creature pursuing all.

item.title: White Knuckle
item.description: Game Description In White Knuckle, gamers will have to overcome the destructive structure of the Sub-STRUCTURA 17. It is based on a mechanic based on a pulse that requires accuracy and quick reflexes. Each step matters, because one wrong movement can send a gamer to a dark abyss below. The essence is to manage resources and inventory, which is becoming more and more important as users lift their limits higher and higher.

item.title: Drive Rally
item.description: Game Description Drive Rally is an arcade game about rally races that transfers gamers during the glory of the 1990s. Having focused on speeds, skill and exciting sensations of an open road, Advencura offers nostalgic experience for fans of classic rally races. Users take on the role of a rally racer, competing in various iconic places around the world. From the dusty deserts of Africa to the snowy peaks of Scandinavia - each area offers unique trials and opportunities.

item.title: Laser Tag Massacre
item.description: Game Description Laser Tag Massacre puts the player in the script in the spirit of slasers of the 1980s. Events unfold on the night of Halloween, when a group of 5 friends is going to celebrate a holiday in a large abandoned gym. This dilapidated structure is located in the remote part of the Campinas, Brazil, which isolates the characters from any external assistance. Their plan for the usual match in the laser tag is sharply interrupted by the appearance of a hostile presence, shifting the focus from resting for self -preservation.

item.title: Synergy
item.description: Game Description synergy dedicated to survival on a hostile planet. In this urban planning strategy, players have to develop their city, face natural cataclysms and make the right decisions that will certainly have consequences. Explore this constantly changing world, preserving the happiness of the townspeople in extreme weather conditions. Gamers will control the weather, seasons, extreme conditions and natural disasters. The main goal is to build a city where residents will be happy and satisfied, respecting the natural needs of the inhabitants and living in harmony with the local fauna and flora.

item.title: Forever skies
item.description: Game Description Forever skies is an atypical survival in the world of post -apocalypse, where the player will become the captain of the airship. Unfortunately, the protagonist is the only crew member, but even this does not reduce the number of his problems. After all, he still needs food, which is practically no in the air with the exception of rare birds. And the technique tends to break, and it requires constantly replacing old details.

item.title: Lushfoil Photography Sim
item.description: Game Description Lushfoil Photography SIM is an incredibly beautiful and relaxing game in which the player can simply relax as much as he needs. She does not drive the user forward, allowing him to admire the views, relaxes the natural sounds of the noise of leaves, water or the creak of snow. If desired, you can completely turn off the musical accompaniment and plunges into the virtual world, so similar to the real one.

item.title: RuneScape: Dragonwilds
item.description: Game Description RuneScape: Dragonwilds introduces gamers to Ashenfall, the forgotten continent of the RuneScape universe where dragons have awakened. This open world experience challenges 1-4 players to survive together or alone. The gameplay is based on collecting resources, constructing buildings, developing skills and creating things. The main task is to hunt down the dragons and fight their Queen. Survival in RuneScape: Dragonwilds is constantly complicated by the threat of dragons that roam the lands.

item.title: Milord
item.description: Game Description Milord is a role -playing game about the management of medieval ownership, combined with elements of urban development. You take under direct control of the Earth, where your specific instructions determine the fate of the inhabitants and general prosperity. Preservation of reserves is a constant factor affecting all aspects of management and requiring careful planning. Through a petition system, subjects directly turn to the ruler for help, intervention or solving various local issues.

item.title: Viscerafest
item.description: Game Description Viscerafest is a dynamic shooter made in retro style. The game takes you into a sci-fi world where you have to fight alien invaders and various creepy monsters. The arsenal of weapons consists of various futuristic guns. Allows you to take the barrel in your hand to destroy enemies, shooting Macedonian style. Events take place in 3796. The main character of Viscerafest is named Caroline. She is a mercenary and a psychopath rolled into one.

item.title: Bureau of Contacts
item.description: Game Description Bureau of Contacts throws you into the digital kingdom, which is simultaneously strategic and adventurous. This is not just pressing the buttons - here you need the ability to think. An intricate story unfolds in different areas, each of which is filled with puzzles and interesting characters encountered on the way. Be prepared to reveal secrets, gaining unexpected allies and a complex choice that can decide or break your progress.

item.title: Traveler's refrain
item.description: Game Description Traveler’s Refrain talks about the wanderings of a protagonist with the name traveler in a forbidden forest who seeks to find his lost lover. It carries a special tool, Buzuki, which begins to vibrate and make sounds when approaching a certain mechanism in this closed area. The tool pronounces the words with a voice devoid of reason, indicating the traveler to find 3 destinies and thereby setting the direction to his subsequent steps.

item.title: Crashlands 2
item.description: Game Description Crashlands 2 Returns you to the crazy world of Wuanop. Flux Deibs, all the beloved intergalactic trucker, was again in a difficult position. This time forget about the transportation of goods. It is about reunite with old friends and getting new, eccentric. But these are not only calls to the old cosmic friends. We are talking about the connections that you create. Friendship with Voanop’s colorful character opens the door, and literally.

item.title: FIND ALL: Bunker
item.description: Game Description FIND ALL Bunker - coloring the monochrome world with colored inks that become available as you find various items. Events unfold both in an underground shelter and on the surface of the earth, where the threat of a nuclear explosion looms. The main task is to carefully search for skillfully hidden objects, which requires maximum care and observation from the player. The atmosphere of complete immersion is created thanks to specially selected musical accompaniment.

item.title: Hollow Survivors
item.description: Game Description Hollow Survivors is Rogue -Like Dungeon Crawler, in which gamers take on the role of one of the last rational Hollow in the world captured by terrible monsters. Then the users have to fight with the endless waves of enemies, rising to the tower, which is under the control of the ominous cult. Along the way, you will find a variety of weapons, improvements and synergistic effects that will help you survive and survive.

item.title: Hollywood Animal
item.description: Game Description Hollywood Animal is not an ordinary strategic game. Forget about the conquest of empires or the construction of huge cities. Here you are in the roaring twenties - the time when the silent movie gave way to the “talkers”, and the film studios tried to keep up. You are in the director’s chair, but not for the camera. This time you are a studio boss, solving all issues, starting from who will play in the film, and ending when the last blockbuster is released.

item.title: Into The Dead: Oour Darkest Days
item.description: Game Description Into The Dead: Oour Darkest Days transfer the player to Walton City, Texas, 1980 sample, covered by a zombie epidemic. The gamer has to lead a detachment of surviving through the dying metropolis. The key task of the gameplay is to move the wards between temporary shelters, taking care of their condition. It is necessary to find provisions, make objects and repulse constant danger from the dead who filled the streets.

item.title: Monster Energy Supercross 25 - The Official Video Game
item.description: Game Description Monster Energy Supercross 25 - The Official Video Game represents the official 2025 supercross season for players. Gamers gain access to the current list of professional racers and compete on the tracks that recreated real places of the championships. The project uses Unreal Engine 5 for its work. This technological basis allows you to implement updated mechanics associated with simulating a motorcycle control. The gameplay in the Monster Energy Supercross 25 - The Official Video Game offers physics and dynamic surfaces of tracks that change with each circle.

item.title: Promise Mascot Agency
item.description: Game Description Promise Mascot Agency offers the gamer to plunge into the life of Kaso-Machi, a damned Japanese town. The main character, Michi, is in exile and must establish the work of the agency of urban masks. Key tasks include hiring these creatures, resolving the problems that arise due to their actions, and clarifying the causes of the protagonist link. Communication with a kick, a living finger with a complex character, is also part of the gameplay while you are trying to make your agency the best in the region through the study of the world and plot events.

item.title: The Talos Principle: Reawakened
item.description: Game Description The Talos Principle: Reawakened returns gamers to the exciting world of puzzles and philosophical research. This is an updated publication - a rethinking of the original, designed to propose a deeper and more extensive experience. This is not just a remister - this is a complete processing in which new content and improved mechanics appeared, but at the same time, fidelity has remained loyal to what made the original so attractive.

item.title: Burden of Command
item.description: Game Description Burden of Command gives players a completely different idea of what projects can be in the theme of World War II. The local scale is considered here, and the focus is a small group of fighters. The gamer is given the opportunity to become the commander of this group, making important decisions in key situations. The guys have to visit hot spots around the world, from Western Europe and ending with Morocco, where the remnants of enemy forces were still based at that moment.

item.title: Commandos: Origins
item.description: Game Description Commandos: Origins depicts the origin of a specialized military group of the Second World War. This part of the series returns gamers to the origins of tactics in real time. The narrative covers the period when Jack O’Hara, Green Beres, met his five comrades, forming a detachment, which was entrusted with tasks that were considered too dangerous for ordinary forces. Players have to lead this detachment in the Title Commandos: Origins, coordinating the actions of the green beret, sapper, sniper, driver, marine and spy.

item.title: Gedonia 2
item.description: Game Description gedonia 2 invites gamers to the post -apocalyptic world, where the hero goes in search, full of secrets and discoveries. In this adventure game, created against the background of desolation, an atmosphere that has a study reigns. Users will move through various landscapes, from barren wasteland to flourishing forests, each of which has its own set of problems. Interaction with the environment becomes a key part of the experience, because every corner can hide a new surprise or a hidden threat.

item.title: Used Cars Simulator
item.description: Game Description In Used Cars Simulator you will plunge headlong into the world of buying, selling and everything in between. You’ll search for cars, from shiny, barely used to salvaged, salvaged ones, trying to estimate their value before they land on your lot. Every decision you make matters - will you sell this car to make a quick buck, or restore it to its former glory to make a bigger profit?

item.title: Armored Brigade 2
item.description: Game Description Armored Brigade II features real-time 3D tactical combat focused on combined arms operations during the Cold War, spanning 1965–1991. The project uses an extensive database and large terrain maps recreated from real European locations. The control process allows for both real-time with pause and turn-based formats, combining strategic depth with accessibility for beginners. The title offers a detailed simulation environment suitable for gamers of varying skill levels looking for authentic period-era combat.

item.title: Junkyard Builder
item.description: Game Description Junkyard Builder puts gamers in charge of an abandoned junkyard full of potential. The key is to transform unwanted items into valuable resources with your own hands. You will have to travel to different locations and inspect the area in search of materials suitable for restoration and sometimes unique finds. The process revolves around the restoration, systematic waste disposal and day-to-day management required to operate a waste sorting facility to eventually build a large scrap metal business.

item.title: Locomoto
item.description: Game Description Locomoto instructs the player the role of a train conductor as part of the adventure-symptulator of life, focused on railway travels. Key classes include operation, management and setting up the composition itself. Gamers are direct responsibility for passengers sitting in their locomotive. The main task is to safely deliver these diverse personalities to the places they need through various locations under the Low Fai soundtrack during the path, while providing travelers during the trip is of paramount importance.

item.title: South of Midnight
item.description: Game Description South of Midnight is not a typical adventure action. Of course, there is a study and battles here, but this game plunges into the southern folklore, erasing the boundaries between real and mythical. This is an experience that breaks out of the usual genre mold. You play for Heisel, moving along the shadow underground of the deep south. This is a beautiful but disturbing place where the destroying landscapes whisper the secrets of the past.

item.title: Kadomon: Hyper Auto Battlers
item.description: Game Description Kadomon: Hyper Auto Battlers calls the gamarines into a world filled with more than 180 creatures who need to collect, fight and develop. The Title combines the elements of autoboeviks, rogeliks and card battles, allowing users to develop unique strategies. The purpose of the game is to assemble the KDOMON team, each of which has various abilities and types in order to pass more and more difficult tests. As you pass, you will encounter powerful bosses and open rare monsters with special abilities.

item.title: Voiceatc Simulator
item.description: Game Description Voiceatc Simulator is a simulator that puts a player in the role of an air traffic controller, where voice communication serves as a main tool for managing aircraft. The main gameplay is to build arriving sides for landing and their maintenance on strips created on the basis of real airfield schemes. You give oral teams for vectoring, changing the echelon, adjusting speed and execution of transitions, effectively controlling the sky.

item.title: Babushka's Glitch Dungeon
item.description: Game Description Babushka’s Glitch Dungeon offers the player to do methodical cleaning of a huge magical basement. Armed with a broom, the heroine sweeps dust, confronts the monsters and destroys insects surrounded. The protagonist also masters bright witch’s magic, fundamentally changing established rules. The study of the world involves the solution of puzzles and the detection of hiding places, while each creature has a unique mechanics that requires a special approach to overcome it.

item.title: Tetris The Grand Master 4 -Absolute Eye-
item.description: Game Description Tetris The Grand Master 4 -Absolute Eye - marks the continuation of the TGM series, originating in the arcade halls. This fourth part goes after a 20-year break between the main parts of the series, representing new elements in the established formula. The project contains content designed both for beginners unfamiliar with the specific style of the series, and for gamers with extensive experience. Tetris The Grand Master 4 -Absolute Eye offers several passage options, including recently introduced ASUKA and Shiranui options.

item.title: Maestro's Cold War 2
item.description: Game Description Maestro’s Cold War 2 puts players at the center of a global rivalry defined by opposing political systems. There are two main forces operating on the world stage, the USA and the USSR, drawn into an ideological confrontation backed by significant nuclear arsenals. A direct military confrontation between these parties has the potential to cause widespread destruction, changing the course of civilization. Participants choose one of two superpowers to govern while navigating this tense international environment.

item.title: Roman Triumph: Survival City Builder
item.description: Game Description Roman Triumph: Survival City Builder can be attributed to the simulators of the colony and real -time strategies. There are also survival elements in the indie project. He has high reigree due to the random generation of cards. The gamer here is offered to establish a settlement and help it develop to a full -fledged city. At the same time, it is necessary to monitor the needs and mood of the townspeople.

item.title: Sephiria
item.description: Game Description Sephiria is a combination of equipment management, battle and research. Users manage a rabbit who is instructed to change the fate of the mystical tower standing on the verge of destruction. As they pass the procedured levels, gamers face creatures with unpredictable motives. These animals can offer help, look for it or pose a threat. The decision about who to trust and how to interact with these characters will be able to significantly affect the course of the game.

item.title: The Last of US Part 2 Remastered
item.description: Game Description The Last of US Part II Remastered goes to the PC and transfers the narrative experience of the Naughty Dog to a new platform. Players fall into a world where survival intersects with personal revenge, following the main characters of Ellie and Abby along the interconnected plot lines. The game takes place in the post -pandemic landscape and transfers participants in territories, transformed infection and human conflicts. Jackson, Wyming, serves as an initial background on which the characters are in the framework of the survivor community.

item.title: Elroy and the Aliens
item.description: Game Description Elroy and the Aliens is set in an alternate version of the 1990s. In the story, Elroy and Peggy search for their long-lost father while unraveling mysteries involving ancient alien technology, sentient robots, and the paranormal. The scenario moves across two planets and more than 60 locations, and features more than 60 heroes with unique characters. The title combines humor and emotion, exploring themes of family, loss and perseverance.

item.title: Lurking Danger
item.description: Game Description Lurking Danger is a survival horror gaming experience where two waitresses, Elena and Regina, become embroiled in the mystery of a regular customer’s disappearance. Their investigation quickly moves into an altered reality, where familiar places are distorted and familiar logic ceases to work. Gamers will have to face a hostile environment alone or using local co-op in split screen. The key goal is to locate the missing person while simultaneously dealing with threats to the transformed reality.

item.title: Godstone
item.description: Game Description Godstone users will make their way through dark dungeons filled with monsters. 5 different sorcerers are available for a choice, for which you can go to study the ruins of Wiritian. The main task for the protagonist will be the search for a valuable divine stone, which is lost in the depths of gloomy catacombs. The game is an atmospheric dungeon-crawler with elements of the Rowl, where you need to wander the character through two-dimensional locations with the side of the side.

item.title: Pocket City 2
item.description: Game Description Pocket City 2 makes it possible for players to build cities, and then study their first -person creations. The process starts from the laying of roads, the markings of sections for residential, commercial or industrial needs and the construction of the necessary objects on the map. Control over the economy implies monitoring of stocks, profit and a thoughtful placement of special structures, access to which opens as they move.

item.title: Within the Cosmos
item.description: Game Description Within the Cosmos is a first -person science fiction role -playing advent of which takes place in 2278. Gamers wake up in a secluded star system, where they face a split human society. This society fights with a growing threat from androids, which leads to serious stress. The background is the star system of Adallio, where users were once part of a mission launched by the united space agency of the Earth.

item.title: Emissary Zero
item.description: Game Description Emissary Zero is a title in which a group of people under cover of darkness enters an unfamiliar building. With minimal tips from a remote manager, they are looking for something called the moon, hoping to leave him intact. The structure is unpredictable, it shifts as they move, forcing them to navigate in space, which refuses to be understandable. Each sound alone becomes a potential threat; Together, coordination becomes both a tool and a risk.

item.title: inzoi
item.description: Game Description Inzoi is a life -symbol game in which gamers assign the role of the creator and observer in a detailed virtual community. In a dynamic environment, users can interact with various characters known as Zoe. These characters are not connected by actions recorded in the script, but act of their own free will, controlled by more than 400 mental elements that form their behavior and solutions. Result? A constantly developing world in which rumors spread, trends and even diseases appear.

item.title: Break The Empire
item.description: Game Description Break The Empire is an action rogal, where the goal is to get to the capital and eliminate the emperor. Gamers have to choose one of the 6 heroes, each has six unique spells and six passive castomization skills. Additionally, 12 common abilities are available for any build, which allows you to try different approaches to the main task - the destruction of the imperial system. The battles include the irreversible death of the hero, which increases the rates of each solution and forces to start again after failure, and the environment is interactive: the fire spreads along the grass, the water surfaces can be frozen, and it is easy to fall into the abyss.

item.title: Inayh - Life after Gods
item.description: Game Description Inayh - Life after Gods describes the journey of a lone warrior on split setting. The remnants of the once prosperous civilization now serve as a battlefield for warring groups, each of which fights for dominance over the ruins. Inaya, an orphaned exile, is looking for her lost tribe, faced with inexorable opponents and revealing forgotten truths. Its path runs through hostile landscapes, abandoned buildings and hidden shelters, where dangers and opportunities exist nearby.

item.title: Grit and Valor - 1949
item.description: Game Description In Grit and Valor - 1949, gamers will take control of an elite squad of mechs during an alternate history of World War II. It is 1949 and Europe is deeply scarred by the ongoing war. The Axis forces, using terrifying ‘Mechs, virtually crushed the resistance. Users lead their squad into this dangerous world to turn the tide by deploying destructive EMP weapons deep in enemy territory. Every mission in Grit and Valor - 1949 forces gamers to think on their feet as they control their swords in dynamic, real-time combat.

item.title: Device Doctor Simulator 2024
item.description: Game Description Device Doctor Simulator 2024 puts the gamer in the role of a repair expert. The meaning of the title is to diagnose and repair various digital gadgets. As a user, you find yourself in a workshop filled with broken devices that require attention. In the gameplay you will have to understand how the devices function and apply solutions to restore their functionality. Each scenario represents a different task, ranging from simple tasks such as replacing a screen to more complex problems involving hardware or software failures.

item.title: Kaiserpunk
item.description: Game Description Kaiserpunk throws you headlong into an alternative XX century, instructing to build an empire from scratch. This is not Grandfather’s Urban planner - Title offers a grandiose strategy, demanding from you to win a vast card, while preserving the residents happy, and the factory - working. Does it sound like a high task? This is true. Forget that you can just put at home and finish it on this.

item.title: LOOK OUTSIDE
item.description: Game Description Look outside is an RPG in the Survival Horror genre, the action of which completely unfolds in one residential building. After an inexplicable event, people who looked out turn into altered creatures, which leads to a collapse of society. Look Outside sets the players to search the building in search of food, supplies and tools. During the study, interaction with various inhabitants occurs - both people and nonhumans. Resource management plays a key role.

item.title: Urban Jungle
item.description: Game Description Urban Jungle gives users the opportunity to turn ordinary residential premises into bright vegetable sanctuaries, without straining in a gameplay. The project invites enthusiasts to experiment with the placement of plants in compact apartments, creating personal green corners without typical care worries that accompany gardening in the real world. Users use the main mechanics of strategic decoration, determining the optimal position for each plant variety in order to maximize the level of comfort in digital living space.

item.title: Asylum
item.description: Game Description Asylum-an adventure indie-chorror in the first person, immersing a gamer into a mystical, frightening atmosphere.
