item.title: Stellaris
item.description: Game Description Stellaris is a global strategy that allows you to play online with a friend on a pirate, using all available network features for free. You can fight online online or compete locally. Participants will have to explore space, rule a power, engage in military craft and resolve diplomatic issues. The universe in Stellaris is randomly generated. Each player takes control of one of the interstellar empires. Using the opportunity of a free online game, opposing factions need to achieve victory in two ways: win on points, or destroy all enemy troops.

item.title: Stellaris
item.description: Game Description Real-time strategy -Stellaris - immerses us in outer space, where we become kings of the galaxy from the very first minutes. The gameplay surrounds you with a huge number of ships and their types. For example, merchant spaceships will travel between different planets and sell/buy resources, reconnaissance ships will be able to explore new distances, and construction ships will help occupy - for friendly purposes - a new planet and recreate an entire empire on it.

item.title: Street Legal Racing: Redline
item.description: Game Description Street Legal Racing: Redline is a car mechanic simulator that allows you to assemble a car completely from scratch. At the same time, street racing with assembled vehicles is available. New parts can affect the characteristics of the car, which are responsible for acceleration, handling and maximum speed. Street Legal Racing does not provide package upgrades. The rider must install each individual part himself. The game has many features:

item.title: Offworld Trading Company
item.description: Game Description On the pirateOffworld Trading Company you can play online for free, competing with a friend or company. An online Internet connection and the ability to play on a shared screen are available. The project is made in a sci-fi setting, allowing you to explore Mars. The difference between Offworld Trading Company and many other RTS is that there are no battles between participants. Victory is achieved only through economic skills and diplomacy.

item.title: Wayward
item.description: Game Description Wayward is an open-world survival game that you can play for free online as a pirate with a friend or players from all over the world. Locally or online, you need to go explore vast territories to find treasures. Online play allows you to compete and play cooperatively. Game mechanics include turn-based battles and roguelike elements. Wayward’s gameplay is based on exploration and survival. You can travel to 4 different continents.

item.title: Wayward
item.description: Game Description Survive in the wild in Wayward, traveling around the open world. The protagonist has no basic specialization, as he passes, he pumps skills and becomes capable of everything. To get new characteristics, you have to interact with objects and the world around you. You have the opportunity to play as you want. The world is endless and generated randomly. Objects, chests, opponents, dangers, dungeons and tasks are also created by chance.

item.title: Don't Starve Together
item.description: Game Description Don’t Starve Together is an open-world survival simulator that allows you to join forces with a friend as a pirate for free to fight, farm, build and explore procedurally generated locations, or participate in online confrontations over the Internet. Players find themselves in the vast wilderness, where, as night falls, the local fauna becomes incredibly bloodthirsty. The only thing monsters are afraid of is fire. A torch or fire is an indispensable weapon against night creatures.

item.title: Don't Starve Together
item.description: Game Description Don’t Starve Together is a survival simulator in an unknown world, where our character, pre-selected in the editor, wakes up and immediately goes to look for firewood, because Maxwell said so. The game is cooperative, since the story passage is divided into 2 parts. The first is survival. It is built on three phases of the day: day, evening and night. During the day, your character calmly survives, collects items, crafts new ones, eats and carries out orders for Maxwell.

item.title: Ice Lakes
item.description: Game Description You can play the fishing simulatorIce Lakes online with a friend, doing ice fishing for free on a pirate site, or compete online online in a variety of modes. The gameplay is a sandbox in which each player can do whatever they want. The possibility of free online play allows you to customize gear, select fishing rods, nets, boats and much more. Seasons, weather conditions, time of day and topography affect the fish in lakes.

item.title: SpeedRunners
item.description: Game Description SpeedRunners is a dynamic 2D platformer that allows you to play online with a friend or in the company of four people. You can play pirated for free both online online and using a local connection. Mechanics allow you to run, jump, dodge enemy attacks, use a wide arsenal of weapons and much more. The online game is based on confrontation, where the main goal is to throw opponents off the screen.

item.title: Twilight Struggle
item.description: Game Description On the pirateTwilight Struggle you can play online for free with a friend, taking control of the USA or the USSR. Players can compete online online or locally. Events take place during the Cold War. Multiplayer and single player campaign are based on historical events. The gameplay allows you to plan an offensive strategy, achieving world domination. The possibility of free online play, each new session poses different conditions and tasks, increasing the replayability of the project.

item.title: DARK SOULS 3
item.description: Game Description DARK SOULS 3 - continuation of the hardcore action with role-playing game elements. On the pirate DARK SOULS 3, you can play online with a friend for free, fighting each other online online and invading other people’s worlds to demonstrate your superiority. Multiplayer also allows you to view clues left by adventurers around the world. DARK SOULS III takes place in Lothric. The protagonists need to return the lords of ash to their thrones.

item.title: DARK SOULS 3
item.description: Game Description The gameplay ofDARK SOULS 3 provides all the same opportunities that were in the second part. For us, a third-person slasher with elements of stealth and survival remained at the same level in terms of combat, but the entire combat system was made more dynamic. So much so that sometimes we don’t have time to jump away to recharge our skill, and they already kill us. The real hassle and face of the game genre is difficulty at every turn.

item.title: Tower Unite
item.description: Game Description Tower Unite - a virtual party for playing together on the Internet online, or for single play. Together with a friend or other players, you can play pirate online, participating in different types of competitions. Once in a huge shopping complex with entertainment, you are offered to try out every attraction or challenge other players completely free of charge. A total of 22 types of arcade competitions are available.

item.title: StarsOne
item.description: Game Description StarsOne is a unique online game that allows you to play online with friends or other players from around the world. You can download the game for free and play it pirated without paying a penny for a subscription or additional content. The game supports the possibility of free network play via the Internet online, so you can always find a partner or opponent for joint adventures. Explore randomly generated planets, develop your own industry, engage in trade, establish colonies and unravel the mysteries of space.

item.title: Kill to Collect
item.description: Game Description Kill to Collect is a top-down action game that can be played online online, competing with a friend or teaming up to complete a single-player campaign. All multiplayer content is available for free on pirate sites. You can play online or fight on one device. The setting is made in the cyberpunk genre. The free-to-play feature allows you to team up with up to four people to clear futuristic, procedurally generated maps.

item.title: Enter the Gungeon
item.description: Game Description Enter the Gungeon is a scrolling shooter that you can play for free with a friend, teaming up on a pirate to go through all the obstacles available in the story campaign online together. The goal is to get to the legendary treasury of the Gungeon. The path is not easy, but using the opportunity of a free online game, together with your partner you can overcome all the traps and defeat the fierce bosses.

item.title: Enter the Gungeon
item.description: Game Description InEnter the Gungeon you will remember such a genre as bullet hell or “hell of bullets”. The main characters explore the Gungeon and try to find a legendary artifact - a weapon that can kill the past. To do this, you need to fight your way through hordes of monsters and defeat formidable bosses. Loot, secrets, penny-pinching merchants and shopkeepers, new equipment and more loot - the recipe for a good game.

item.title: Hot Dogs, Horseshoes and Hand Grenades
item.description: Game Description The gameHot Dogs, Horseshoes and Hand Grenades can be called a full-fledged weapons simulator. You need to go to the training ground, which contains a huge selection of different firearms: pistols, machine guns, shotguns, rocket launchers, grenades, etc. You can use any available ammunition, training on targets and taking the highest positions on the leaderboard. Afterwards you can go and set off fireworks. Targets can be not only static within the walls of a gray pavilion, but also moving in open space.

item.title: Modbox
item.description: Game Description Modbox is a multiplayer sandbox with the ability to play online with a friend on a pirate for free or connect online with players from all over the world. The gameplay is based on physics and destruction. Network play is available in splitscreen mode. You can play cooperatively and compete with each other. The free online play feature includes matches for up to 4 people and supports cross-platform play.

item.title: CHKN
item.description: Game Description SandboxCHKN allows you to explore a fantasy world with a friend or alone. For free on the pirate CHKN, players can take part in all online competitions by connecting online via the Internet. If you play online, you can travel in a cooperative adventure, or enter into confrontation, demonstrating your superiority in the arena - the possibility of free online play allows you to express yourself in any form.

item.title: Hyper Light Drifter
item.description: Game Description Hyper Light Drifter can be played online for free as a pirate, playing through the campaign online or on one screen. The gameplay is fast-paced action with role-playing elements. At the center of the story is a hero nicknamed the Tramp, aka Drifter. In battle, you will have to use technologies long forgotten by the inhabitants of the future world. The online game Hyper Light Drifter allows you to travel together through the ruins of civilization.

item.title: Of Carrots And Blood
item.description: Game Description Of Carrots And Blood is a twin-stick shooter in which you can play online with a friend, fighting together for free on a pirate ship with enemies or competing with each other online. The gameplay contains elements of survival and bullet hell. The possibility of free online play offers the opportunity to fight with a huge crowd of mutants in a company or alone. Despite its cute cartoon style, the project stands out for its abundance of blood and violence.

item.title: Congo
item.description: Game Description Congo is a top-down shooter that you can play online with a friend, going through a rich story campaign together on a pirate ship for free. Using the Internet online, you can form a team with other players to fight an army of demons. Events develop in the thickets of the Congo. The network game is aimed at interaction between partners. It is necessary to cover your comrades while holding back waves of enemies.

item.title: Moon Hunters
item.description: Game Description On the pirateMoon Hunters you can play online for free with a friend, going on a co-op journey online together. Game mechanics rely on role-playing elements and dynamic real-time combat. The project contains roguelike elements. therefore the environment is randomly generated. The possibility of free online play allows you to join a company of up to four people. Each new race creates a unique myth, which is written by the players themselves.

item.title: Ultimate Chicken Horse
item.description: Game Description Ultimate Chicken Horse is a team platformer that you can play for free online as a pirate with a friend, participating in a variety of cooperative or competitive modes over the Internet online. Each player chooses an animal character. The goal in Ultimate Chicken Horse is extremely prosaic and simple - you need to build a platform and move towards the finish line. At the same time, you need to overcome obstacles and score points.

item.title: E.T. Armies
item.description: Game Description E.T. Armies is a first-person shooter that you can play with a friend online, going through a story campaign together online. Events take place in the distant future, when the Earth is in ruins. A new nation grew out of the remains of a previous civilization. All the new generation needs is war. People are fighting for the remaining resources. Humanity left the planet, but not everyone was able to do so.

item.title: Bus Simulator 16
item.description: Game Description Bus Simulator 16 is a bus simulator that allows you to play online with a friend for free on a pirate, driving 13 types of transport, including the famous Mercedes-Benz and MAN bus models. Alone or together with friends online, you must follow traffic rules, transport passengers through five developed areas, adhere to a schedule, and much more. Two-door, three-door and articulated transport models are presented. A network game is aimed at confrontation or cooperation between participants.

item.title: Stardew Valley
item.description: Game Description Stardew Valley is a farming simulator that allows you to play as a pirate with a friend. A local connection and the possibility of online co-op are available. All network functions are available for free. Game mechanics allow you to develop your own farm in the Stradju Valley. Alone or in a group, you need to turn the desert into a real blooming garden. With only one tool in hand and almost zero money in your pocket, you need to build a new life.

item.title: Stardew Valley
item.description: Game Description Stardew Valley is a sandbox simulator with pixel graphics and multi-platform support, but with a well-thought-out system for earning money and maintaining game balance for the player. The beginning of the game shows how our hero first comes to an abandoned farm, which he received from a deceased relative. Since the protagonist does not mind making money by planting and selling vegetables and fruits, he decides not to sell the farm, but to start equipping it.

item.title: Grim Dawn
item.description: Game Description Grim Dawn can be played for free on pirates online with a friend or random players. An online Internet connection is available, which allows you to go through the story campaign together. Gloomy Dawn is an action role-playing game. The gameplay centers on collecting loot, armor, potions, weapons, gold, etc. Free online play includes crafting, allowing you to collaborate on new tools and weapons. The project is inspired by the mechanics of Titan Quest, from which it absorbed many elements and significantly improved them.

item.title: Grim Dawn
item.description: Game Description The gloomy dawn inGrim Dawn showed that the fabric of the created universe was too weak, so Cairn accepted robbers, bandits, magicians and a bunch of all kinds of creatures and undead into its embrace. Dark times have come to the territory of Cairn. But after that, people did not give up trying to attack their enemies, and called aliens into the world. They opened portals for them and let in several individuals to receive ether.

item.title: Obliterators
item.description: Game Description Obliteracers - dynamic races designed for competitions on the Internet online. You can play online for free with a friend or fight on a pirate for up to 16 players at the same time. You need to get behind the wheel of fancy futuristic cars and rush across the surface of various exotic planets. Transport is represented by realistic physics. Each car handles differently and contains unique characteristics.

item.title: Aseprite
item.description: Game Description The program** aseprite** provides users with an extensive range of settings that allows you to create two -dimensional animations, springs or graphics for any games. Layers and frames can be used in the form of separate concepts to make your own sprouts. Indexed colors, RGBA modes are provided to the user, thanks to which animated or static images are drawn. After completing the work, the program will save work in GIF, PNG and other options.

item.title: Plague Inc Evolved
item.description: Game Description Plague Inc Evolved allows you to play online with a friend as you try to cope with a global pandemic. Versus mode is available via the Internet online and cooperative. The pirate Plague Inc Evolved supports cross-platform for free. The gameplay is strategy and simulation elements. It is necessary to destroy the entire world as Patient Zero. Using the opportunity of a free online game with a partner, do not let people solve the main questions in the field of medicine.

item.title: Toy Soldiers: Complete
item.description: Game Description Toy Soldiers: Complete immerses gamers in a familiar atmosphere where toy soldiers wreak havoc to the fullest potential. The ability to play online with a friend on a pirate allows you to move away from the usual single-player campaign and challenge other users to test your own skills. This is no longer the usual reflection of waves, but a full-scale battle, where, with the option of online gameplay over the Internet, every piece of territory will have to be conquered.

item.title: Dying Light: The Following
item.description: Game Description Dying Light: The Following is an add-on to the survival horror game Dying Light, which was released in 2015. In this add-on you will find a new location, new weapons, new gameplay elements and a new difficulty level. You will also have the opportunity to play online for free with a friend over the Internet, even if you have a pirated version. This is a great way to play a fun and scary game online.

item.title: Dying Light: The Following
item.description: Game Description Dying Light: The Following provides the players with an extensive game world, a large arsenal of weapons, modifications, secondary and plot tasks, as well as dozens of gameplay hours. Visit in the post-apocalyptic world, teeming zombies and other bloodthirsty creatures in the action of the first person. Pour blood in epic battles! Use dozens of ways to kill zombies, as well as interact with surrounding objects that allow the enemies to eliminate opponents.

item.title: Rise of the Tomb Raider
item.description: Game Description On the pirate version ofRise of the Tomb Raider you can play online with a friend for free. Rise of the Tomb Raider continues the storyline of the previous part. In addition to the story campaign, you can play online online, competing with players around the world. This time, Lara Croft goes to Siberia to find an oasis of immortality. Once again she will be opposed by members of the Trinity Order.

item.title: Rise of the Tomb Raider
item.description: Game Description Our task inRise of the Tomb Raider is to get ahead of your enemies, go on your first expedition and watch interactive videos, of which there are at least 1.5 hours of gameplay in the game. Lara Croft goes to the unknown world of the city of Kitezh. A secret organization called “Trinity” is also heading there. The principle of the game about Lara is an adventure game mixed with the adventure romance of the first journey, in which we kill with a bow, collect important items, and sometimes survive in the wild.

item.title: NARUTO SHIPPUDEN: Ultimate Ninja STORM 4
item.description: Game Description Familiar to many fans of the Naruto series,NARUTO SHIPPUDEN: Ultimate Ninja STORM 4 transcends the fighting game genre, taking the game to the next level. In the final part, we will find out who will win in the confrontation between Naruto and Sasuke. We will learn a lot of details about the 4th Shinobi War, and also go over some aspects of the anime that were missed in previous parts.

item.title: XCOM 2
item.description: Game Description XCOM 2 is a turn-based tactical strategy in which you can fight with a friend on a pirate or play for free online with other participants. Co-op missions are available and the opportunity to arrange a full-scale battle over the Internet online with different players from all over the world. Compared to the first part, the gameplay has not changed much. The mechanics combine elements of TBS and RPG, and the possibility of free online play includes control of one of the presented races, which have unique abilities and battle tactics.

item.title: XCOM 2
item.description: Game Description Twenty years ago, people signed an act of complete surrender of the earth to the aliens. Another civilization has shown that there is no hope for salvation, and therefore alien invaders have taken over the entire planet. At the beginning ofXCOM 2 we are shown a video from the current ruler of the planet (in fact, this is a staged, drawn character, he is controlled by aliens), who says that today is the day when the aliens captured us, and the earth plunged into peace; Today we celebrate 20 years of freedom.

item.title: Fortified
item.description: Game Description Fortified is a tactical shooter with the ability to play online with a friend for free on a pirate, taking part in dynamic shootouts online online. The action takes place in 1950, when the Martians arrived on Earth with the further enslavement of humanity. Multiplayer Fortified is designed for four people. Together with your partners, you will need to destroy hordes of enemies using a wide arsenal of weapons from the Cold War.

item.title: Infinitesimal Point
item.description: Game Description Infinitesimal Point is an action-adventure game that gives you the opportunity to play online on a pirate for free. You can team up with a friend to go through an intense single-player campaign online. The story of Infinitesimal Point begins with the main characters being transported to another dimension after a brutal attack. In this world, danger awaits at every step. Online play allows teammates to go through many challenges and fight a huge crowd of monsters.

item.title: American Truck Simulator
item.description: Game Description American Truck Simulator is an American truck driver simulator that allows you to play online with a friend to transport cargo over long distances. Using an online Internet connection, you can explore the United States together. The project was developed in parallel with the game Euro Truck Simulator 2. The main emphasis of the gameplay is on realistic controls and heavy transport physics. Each of the 9 trucks presented for free on the pirate site has unique characteristics: Kenworth T680, Peterbilt 579, Kenworth W900, Peterbilt 389, Volvo VNL, International LoneStar, Mack Anthem, Western Star 49X and Freightliner Cascadia.

item.title: American Truck Simulator
item.description: Game Description American Truck Simulator doesn’t have the typical pick-up-and-drop-off. This is a strategic and economic simulator rolled into one: we will upgrade our trucks, buy new ones, decide which contracts to take on and what to leave aside. An important component in the process is the driving itself, because it is done in the first person, from the driver’s cabin. Compliance with all traffic rules is the basis and responsibility of every driver.

item.title: Cobalt
item.description: Game Description Cobalt is a two-dimensional platformer that gives you the opportunity to discover the secrets of a space colony together with a friend. You can play Cobalt on the Pirate for free online, going through various tests together over the Internet online. The key mechanic is time dilation. Multiplayer allows you to go through a campaign together to answer the most important question: what happened to humanity? An equally important question is why ride a space hamster?

item.title: Blood and Bacon
item.description: Game Description Blood and Bacon is a co-op shooter that you can play online with a friend. Several types of multiplayer competitions are available for free on the pirate market, allowing you to fight online on the Internet. The gameplay is a classic FPS. Network play allows you to fight in both day and night locations. There are 35 enemies and several unique bosses with their own individual attack patterns. Intermediate minibosses appear every 10 levels.

item.title: LEGO MARVEL's Avengers
item.description: Game Description LEGO MARVEL’s Avengers brings the brick-and-mortar superhero action back to consoles and PC. In this game you can play online with a friend on a pirate, which allows you to immerse yourself in the world of Marvel for free. The online game features combat and puzzles that recreate epic moments from the Cinematic Universe. You’ll be able to build, destroy, and explore seven hub worlds, including New York and Sokovia, in exciting online adventures.

item.title: Move or Die
item.description: Game Description Move or Die is a casual adventure designed for online competitions. You can play online with a friend, or use a local connection for free on a pirate. A special feature of the gameplay is that the rules change every 20 seconds, so the possibility of a free online game invites each participant to express themselves to the maximum in order to adapt to fleeting game processes. The online game Move or Die tests the strength of the participants' relationships!

item.title: Crashlands
item.description: Game Description Crashlands allows you to play pirate alone or with a friend online. The cooperative is also available online. The indie title itself is an open-world survival simulator with role-playing elements. It uses 2D hand-drawn graphics. The camera is located at the top and at an angle. The large map is divided into 3 continents, which consist of several biomes, and is inhabited by 4 races. Crashlands has a plot that is presented with humor.

item.title: Homeworld: Deserts of Kharak
item.description: Game Description On the pirate version ofHomeworld: Deserts of Kharak you can play online with a friend completely free of charge, competing in confrontation modes online. The strategy takes place on the surface of the planet Kharak. It is necessary for a ground-based aircraft carrier to collect resources, train an army, study technologies and engage in battle with the enemy. Network play allows you not only to fight with your opponent, but also to complete joint missions in co-op.

item.title: Scrap Mechanic
item.description: Game Description On the pirateScrap Mechanic you can play online for free with a friend, building your own unique world. Allows you to join forces locally or online online. Alone or together with partners, you need to explore the open world, collect resources, build and fight off waves of farm bots. The online game focuses on the creative side of gameplay, mixing construction with survival elements. Each member of Scrap Mechanic takes on the role of a robot mechanic, setting out to explore the picturesque landscapes of a fictional world.

item.title: Scrap Mechanic
item.description: Game Description Scrap Mechanic is a multiplayer engineering sandbox that offers you to design various mechanisms and compete with friends. The game world revolves around a mechanic who maintains robots on an agricultural planet. He makes sure that they are working properly: that they are cultivating the land on time, sowing, collecting raw materials, which the hero then sends to the central planets, where people live ordinary lives. But one day the spaceship crashed, and the robots around went crazy.

item.title: Darkest Dungeon
item.description: Game Description Darkest Dungeon is a hardcore RPG with roguelike elements that allows you to team up on a pirate ship with a friend to play online for free or compete with other players online. The project stands out for its dark artistic execution in the Gothic style. The main mechanic is that the style of gameplay directly affects the emotional balance of the heroes. This parameter is called Stress. You have to assemble your team, where each participant has unique skills and abilities.

item.title: Darkest Dungeon
item.description: Game Description Turn-based strategy with a side view -Darkest Dungeon - developed in a dark style and with rogue-like elements. A huge number of characters will not let you calm down until everyone on the playing field creates the perfect combination for victory. Each battle with opponents is a fascinating tactical adventure, where victory is 80% knowledge of the game and 20% knowledge of logic. Your characters are ordinary people with extraordinary health.

item.title: Feed and Grow: Fish
item.description: Game Description Feed and Grow: Fish is a multiplayer simulator of the underwater world, which you can play for free as a pirate online with a friend, alone, or compete on the Internet online with random players. The exploration features an ocean where participants, in the role of a sea creature, must survive in a harsh underwater environment. It is necessary to feed on local flora or fauna in order to grow into a larger individual.

item.title: Whos Your Daddy
item.description: Game Description Whos Your Daddy is a fun dad simulator that you can play online with a friend. Pirate players connect to a dedicated server for free when playing online on the Internet. The bottom line is that one takes on the role of the father, and the second - the baby. It is noteworthy that both stand out for their obtuseness. As a result, the possibility of free online play offers hapless couch potatoes to survive until the end of the day: dad needs to not go crazy, while the baby needs to be more mischievous.

item.title: River City Super Sports Challenge All Stars Special
item.description: Game Description River City Super Sports Challenge All Stars Special is a sports competition that offers the opportunity to play online over the Internet. You can take part in four different disciplines for free on Pirate. You can play online with a friend on the same screen or compete with random people. Competitions are presented with survival mechanics. You need to use wooden swords, dumbbells, bombs and many other improvised means.

item.title: Reign Of Kings
item.description: Game Description Reign Of Kings is an open-world survival game designed to play online with a friend, fighting together on the Internet online, or on a pirate platform for free, participating in confrontations with random players from all over the world. Online play allows you to hunt wild animals, obtain resources, build a base, create armor, etc. Free online play includes creating your own guilds. You can declare war on different factions and associations.

item.title: The Mean Greens - Plastic Warfare
item.description: Game Description The Mean Greens - Plastic Warfare is an arcade shooter about toy soldiers, in which you can play online as a pirate for free, fighting with a friend or an entire team. A cooperative mode is available online on the Internet, allowing you to unite against artificial intelligence or a common enemy. Mechanics allow you to run, jump, shoot, use cover and the environment. The online game is aimed at confronting two plastic armies: green and brown.

item.title: Dirt Rally
item.description: Game Description Dirt Rally gives players the opportunity to play online for free and compete against a friend in exciting rally racing. Go to competition stages in different terrains and weather conditions, and test your skills behind the wheel of cars of different decades and classes. The game provides a unique opportunity for free online gaming on the Internet. Initially, Dirt Rally had 36 stages in three locations, but with the release of updates, even more opportunities appeared.

item.title: HELLDIVERS
item.description: Game Description On the pirateHELLDIVERS you can play online with a friend, taking part in all multiplayer modes for free. By controlling the Hell Marines, you can take part in intense battles over the Internet, online or locally. The Marines are an elite force protecting Super-Earth from an alien threat. Alone or in a team, you need to become a participant in an intergalactic war. HELLDIVERS multiplayer includes a Proving Grounds that allows you to play campaign missions with various modifications.

item.title: Zombie Vikings
item.description: Game Description InZombie Vikings, up to four players can team up online to experience an action-packed campaign together. You can play pirate for free online, fighting in co-op with a friend or random players. The story centers on zombie Vikings who set off in search of the lost eye of Odin himself. As you might guess, Loki himself stole the eye. The online game Zombie Vikings allows you to go through the storyline in the company, fighting numerous monsters and creatures of darkness.

item.title: Nuclear Throne
item.description: Game Description Action roguelikeNuclear Throne immerses you in a post-apocalyptic world, where you can go for free on a pirate ship with a friend. You can play online, overcoming traps and obstacles together. Using the Internet online, you can interact with a partner, exchanging resources or covering a friend’s back. The gameplay is distinguished by intense shootings and high dynamics of what is happening on the screen. The online game invites you to team up with a partner to become the last hope of all humanity.

item.title: CITYCONOMY: Service for your City
item.description: Game Description CITYCONOMY: Service for your City invites players to plunge into the world of municipal management. You can play this exciting online game online with a friend for free, even on a pirate site. You will become an operator of the city service, which is responsible for the functioning of key departments. You will have to work online via the Internet, performing important tasks on which the life of the city depends.

item.title: Rainbow Six: Siege
item.description: Game Description Rainbow Six: Siege is a tactical shooter that allows you to compete with a friend or random players online. Rainbow 6: Siege gives you the opportunity to play online for free on pirates in asymmetrical matches between attack aircraft and defenders. Network play takes place in a limited space. The main feature is that the buildings are completely susceptible to destruction. You can blow up walls, ceilings, furniture, etc.

item.title: The Isle
item.description: Game Description The island on whichThe Isle takes place has a rich and varied environment that is randomly generated. All artifacts, items and events will be located in different places with each new launch. Players must team up to effectively explore the area, which contains many secrets, including various quest items that further advance the plot. The map contains an area of ​​16x16 square kilometers. Multiplayer survival game The Isle allows you to play with three different factions in three different modes:

item.title: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six Siege
item.description: Game Description A new installment in the first-person shooter,Tom Clancy’s Rainbow Six Siege is a game of multiplayer destruction. We will not just destroy the map to which we and our friends were sent, but we will build traps, plant a bomb, and all this at a distance of a bow shot. The technical equipment of the new part is made specifically so that you can blow up everything in the open location of each level.

item.title: Just Cause 3
item.description: Game Description The pirate version ofJust Cause 3 offers the opportunity to play online for free with a friend, exploring the Mediterranean island of the Medici and blowing up everything online online. You can play cooperatively or compete with each other. Online play allows you to arm yourself with a huge variety of weapons and explosives, blowing up everything in your path, from cars to buildings. The main character of the plot is Rico Rodriguez, whom the government sends to the dictatorial island of General Sebastiano Di Ravello.

item.title: Just Cause 3
item.description: Game Description Just Cause 3 is a continuation of the famous franchise about the adventures of a specially trained agent named Rico Rodriguez. This part of the series did not deviate from the style and genre of previous games in the universe where the mercenary nicknamed “Scorpio” lives. The end of the trilogy is made with the same driving action, open world, a large number of tricks and devices available in the protagonist’s arsenal, and an adventure plot in which the fate of an entire state will be at stake.

item.title: Mordheim: City of the Damned
item.description: Game Description Mordheim: City of the Damned provides the opportunity to compete online on the Internet, participating in various multiplayer modes for free on pirates. You can play with a friend, fighting in co-op or against random people. The game mechanics are action with a touch of tactical RPG. The action takes place in the Warhammer Fantasy universe. The setting is reminiscent of Renaissance Europe. It is necessary to go to the streets of the city of Mordheim, fighting among themselves for fragments of the stone of distortion.

item.title: Knight Squad
item.description: Game Description Knight Squad can be played online with a friend, participating in a variety of online competitions over the Internet. On Pirate you can fight with 8 players at the same time for free. Each player chooses his own knight and equips himself with fun weapons. The online game is represented by many different competitions. Football fields, railways, ice skating rinks and much more are available. The possibility of free online play allows you to fight in teams, participating in confrontations against a group of other knights.

item.title: Life is Feudal: Your Own
item.description: Game Description InLife is Feudal: Your Own you have to survive alone or play online with a friend, exploring the vastness of the medieval open world. PvP content is available, allowing you to fight other players for free on a pirate. The gameplay is a feudal lord simulator with survival elements in the open world. item.title: Dispatcher

item.title: The Incredible Adventures of Van Helsing 3
item.description: Game Description InThe Incredible Adventures of Van Helsing 3 you have the opportunity to play as a pirate online with a friend for free, together explore the dark locations of Borgovia via the Internet online. The online game Van Helsing 3 allows you to play through the story campaign together. You can participate in confrontations, fighting with players from all over the world. There are 6 classes available to choose from.

item.title: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt
item.description: Game Description The legendary third-person slasher series -The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt, which tells us the story of Geralt of Rivia, who becomes one of the few characters in the central series of action-packed books. We start the game remembering the events of the second part. But let’s not talk about them. Our hero is a born killer, capable of killing and ending the lives of thieves, criminals, assassins, kings, leaders, generals and monsters living throughout the map.

item.title: Project CARS
item.description: Game Description Project CARS is a car simulator that allows you to play online with a friend, as well as compete with other players online online. You can use the Pirate to participate in local competitions or take part in championships, competing with the best racers from all over the world. The project includes all modes, tracks, tournaments, cars and add-ons for free. The main emphasis is on realistic physics and individual behavior of each car.

item.title: Software Inc.
item.description: Game Description Software Inc. - An economic simulator that allows the development of a company engaged in the development of software. Initially, it is required to build an office building, buy inexpensive equipment and hire several employees, distributing tasks between them. To get funding, at first the newly made team will take on third -party projects and various simple tasks. As the budget becomes more, the staff will be more experienced and new faces will come, it will also be possible to engage in the external design of the facade, build beautiful paths and decor items to give the office a presentable look.

item.title: Exanima
item.description: Game Description Exanima is a representative of the category of isometric role -playing games on a PC, in which the camera is fixed above the character, but it can be brought closer to detailed examination of objects and objects, as well as deleted, for more convenient battles. This project operates the theme of the gloomy Middle Ages, so the arsenal of a character managed by a player consists mainly of long -tier -fingered and remote weapons (bows, crossbows, throwing spears).

item.title: Kerbal Space Program
item.description: Game Description Kerbal Space Program is a space sim designed for solo exploration of the universe or a shared campaign through the Internet online. The Kerbal Space Program allows pirates to play for free online with a friend, exploring a fictional solar planetary system. It consists of five large and two dwarf planets. The main action takes place on the continent of Kerbal. The inhabitants of this planet are little green men.

item.title: Kerbal Space Program
item.description: Game Description In the space simulatorKerbal Space Program the player will lead the Kerbal race exploring the vastness of space. Be the one who guides them towards a brighter future, inventing new technologies, constructing many new mechanisms and helping in the exploration of the galaxy. Start your journey in one of three modes. In “Career” you will need to monitor the education and training of your charges, as well as help in modernizing their devices.

item.title: Son of Nor
item.description: Game Description On the pirateSon of Nor you can play online with a friend for free, competing on the Internet online in various multiplayer modes. A special feature of the gameplay is the ability to terraform. You can change the environment using different abilities. The online game allows participants to use telekinetic skills, subjugating the entire dynamic environment of the locations. All players take on the role of the Sons of Nora.

item.title: Verdun
item.description: Game Description On the pirateVerdun you can play online for free with a friend on the pirate, together taking part in realistic combat operations from the First World War. On the Internet online you can play in co-op or fight with each other. Verdun takes place from 1914 to 1918. The main events take place in Verdun in 1916. The possibility of free online play allows you to fight in modes such as Frontline, Attrition, Deathmatch and Squad Defense.

item.title: Dungeons 2
item.description: Game Description On pirateDungeons 2 you can play online for free, competing with a friend or other players online online. The gameplay is a strategy game with RPG elements, filled with a lot of humor and various multiplayer content. Mechanics contain management. it is necessary to manage troops and resources. Multiplayer Dungeons 2 allows you to traverse dungeons in co-op or fight in versus battles. The main antagonist and, at the same time, hero is the Dungeon Lord.

item.title: Crypt of the NecroDancer
item.description: Game Description Crypt of the NecroDancer is a hybrid of a rhythm game and a simplified roguelike. It has a single player mode and multiplayer, which is available online online. You can also play Pirate with a friend online. The indie project uses 2D pixel graphics and a top-down view. The title is made in a fantasy setting. The product “Crypt of the Necrodancer” has atypical gameplay. In one turn, you can move a character, use an item, strike, and so on.

item.title: Grand Theft Auto 5
item.description: Game Description GTA 5 has received dozens of awards for its open world, and almost the most expensive multi-platform project in history isGrand Theft Auto V. The story opens before us in the same fictional state - San Andreas, made 1 to 1 as Southern California. We play as three robber friends who have spent their entire adult lives stealing cars, robbing small shops and people on the street. One day someone decides to get involved in organized crime, which they have been fighting for the last 5 years.

item.title: Mortal Kombat X
item.description: Game Description Mortal Kombat X is a fighting game that allows you to play online with a friend on a pirate or fight for free with other players online. You can fight together on a shared screen in versus mode. Free online play features include several classic tower challenge matches, as well as Clan Feuds, where players choose the faction they fight for. At the end of the week, the best clan with the most victories is determined.

item.title: Square Heroes
item.description: Game Description On the pirateSquare Heroes you can play online for free, fighting with a friend or a whole group of players. Intense tournaments are presented, available online online or in single player mode, where one player fights against artificial intelligence. The online game is built around the Galactic Tournament. Having chosen your hero, you need to open a wide range of weapons and upgrade the hero’s abilities. You can fight with friends locally.

item.title: Running With Rifles
item.description: Game Description Running With Rifles is a tactical shooter that allows you to compete online for free on a pirate or play online with a friend, fighting in co-op mode against a common enemy. Network play supports cross-platform. The gameplay is an isometric action game with RPG elements. Each participant plays the role of an ordinary soldier, carrying out orders to destroy enemy troops or defending their lands from terrorists.

item.title: Dark Souls 2: Scholar of the First Sin
item.description: Game Description DARK SOULS 2: Scholar of the First Sin takes the dark atmosphere and addictive gameplay to a whole new level of quality. As before, you, in the role of a wandering soul, have to wander through a dark and mysterious world, use tactics during battle even with simple opponents, and always remain on guard, since danger comes from everywhere - these are the rules of this eerie world.

item.title: Elite Dangerous
item.description: Game Description Elite Dangerous is an online multiplayer game, the third part of the “Elite” franchise, which began in 1984. The player is given complete freedom to explore and travel, and has the opportunity to influence the storyline. The action takes place thousands of years later in the distant future on the territory of several million star galaxies. Most of the stars, planets, asteroids and other cosmic bodies that exist in the real world.

item.title: Nightside
item.description: Game Description In theNightside strategy, you can play online with a friend, fighting with each other, or in co-op for free on a pirate. You can go through the story on one device or compete online online. You can take control of four unique races. Each fights with an individual type of weapon, units, uses its own battle tactics and much more. The gameplay of Nightside develops in real time. Events take place on a distant planet, where races fight for the valuable resource green ice.

item.title: War For The Overworld
item.description: Game Description The pirate version ofWar For The Overworld allows you to play online with a friend for free, teaming up to explore dark dungeons. Using the Internet online, you can set up your own lair, hire minions and launch an attack on the enemy base. The gameplay is built on classic RTS mechanics, adding elements of role-playing adventure. The action takes place in gloomy dungeons filled with dangerous crypts, traps, obstacles and numerous enemies.

item.title: Bloodsports.TV
item.description: Game Description Bloodsports.TV is a dynamic MOBA aimed at playing online with a friend or random players from all over the world. You can play the pirate game online for free or fight alone with bots. The action takes place in post-apocalyptic Sweden. The online game places players in the territory of a missile base, where they must protect developments from criminals and bloodthirsty monsters. The project is a spin-off of Hero Defense.

item.title: theHunter: Primal
item.description: Game Description theHunter: Primal is an open-world survival game that you can play online with a friend to fight bloodthirsty dinosaurs for free on a pirate. You can survive on the Internet online with random players or play in solo mode. Each participant takes on the role of a Trailblazer. The action takes place on the planet Primal Eden. TheHunter: Primal online game allows you to explore a huge area of ​​24 square kilometers.

item.title: Ethereum
item.description: Game Description Etherium is a real-time strategy game that offers you to fight online over the Internet for one of three empires fighting for the valuable resource Etherium. For free, you can play pirate online with a friend, joining forces against common enemies or fighting in intense confrontations. Etherium is a rare resource that has been discovered on several planets. It gives unlimited possibilities to its owners. The possibility of free online play includes base development, control of infantry, tanks and air forces.

item.title: Battlefield Hardline
item.description: Game Description Battlefield Hardline gives you the opportunity to compete online online, participating in various multiplayer modes. For free, you can play pirate online with a friend or enter into confrontations with random people from all over the world. The Battlefield Hardline network game is represented by such disciplines as Hijacking, Blood Money, Robbery, Capture and Team Fight. The additions are Crime, Robbery, Darkness, Escape and Betrayal. The gameplay is a tactical first-person shooter.

item.title: Zombie Kill of the Week - Reborn
item.description: Game Description Zombie Kill of the Week - Reborn is a dynamic zombie shooter with platformer elements that you can play online on a pirate for free with a friend. The gameplay allows you to go through the campaign either alone or join forces with a partner online. Finding yourself in the vastness of a post-apocalyptic world, you need to survive at any cost. A wide arsenal of firearms is presented.

item.title: Chicken Invaders 5 COTDS
item.description: Game Description Chicken Invaders 5 COTDS is the fifth episode of the franchise of the same name, which introduces the opportunity to play online with a friend using an online Internet connection. Local co-op and versus mode are available for free on Pirate. The main missions are tasks to find artifacts. Online play in Chicken Invaders: Cluck of the Dark Side allows participants to join forces to search for important objects on various planets.

item.title: Automation - The Car Company Tycoon Game
item.description: Game Description Automation - The Car Company Tycoon Game is the simulator of the owner of the car concerns. A good product if you like to disassemble and redo cars in your own way. To design a car starting from the engine and ending with the suspension, body, as well as other parts. In this game there is a company where we will be the head of the campaign for the production of machines and will be part of the market from the end of World War II and now on our days.

item.title: Cities: Skylines
item.description: Game Description The city-planning simulator -Cities: Skylines - is in the best traditions of the real game, in which its own physical laws were created to transfer them into gaming reality. On the territory of your new city, it will be taken into account that the profile road is built in one way, and the road at the airport - in another. It will count if you correctly lay the pipeline for the heating system, and also if you can show people that they live in a real paradise, and not just a metropolis where they want to buy them at the expense of shopping centers.

item.title: Zombie Army Trilogy
item.description: Game Description Zombie Army Trilogy is a multiplayer first-person shooter that you can play online with a friend, or cooperate with players around the world. On the pirate platform, 4 fighters can unite for free by connecting via the Internet online to fight the zombie army of Hitler himself. Events take place in an alternate 1940s, when, after the death of the Fuhrer, his army rose from the graves. Zombie Army: Trilogy not only features free online play, but also allows you to take on the role of all the heroes from the famous zombie franchise Left 4 Dead.

item.title: Zombie Army Trilogy
item.description: Game Description Zombie Army Trilogy - this game is a collectible gaming collection created in the style of a three -dimensional bloody shooter, which are narrated from a third -person. The plot of the game tells us about the resurrection of Hitler, who was aroused with the help of a deal with Satan. He begins to create an entire army of a zombie-soldier, which, after his death, are full of aggression, thirst for blood and revenge.

item.title: Dynasty Warriors 8 Empires
item.description: Game Description Alone, fighting thousands of enemies, and using the strategy and tactics of battles, the Dynasty Warriors 8 Empires player will be able to win all ancient China. There is no specific plot, but only scenarios, during which you can play in a certain period of time. In each of the episodes there is a separate distribution of territories, a set of heroes, which is at the start of the battle on the unification of the lands of China.

item.title: The King of Fighters 2002: Unlimited Match
item.description: Game Description The King of Fighters 2002: Unlimited Match is a dynamic fighting game in which you can play online with a friend on a pirate. You can participate in various multiplayer modes for free, competing with other players online or participating in local matches. The King of Fighters 2002: Unlimited Match improves on the graphics and mechanics of the ‘98 original. New characters have been added and the balance has been reworked.

item.title: Resident Evil Revelations 2
item.description: Game Description Resident Evil Revelations 2 is a spin-off of the cult survival horror series, the plot of which tells about the adventures of Claire Redfield and Barry Burton. You can play pirated online for free with a friend. Both online play and local multiplayer are available. Biohazard Revelations 2, like its predecessor, is represented by an episodic system. The story consists of 5 chapters. Network play consists of interactions between characters.

item.title: Medieval Engineers
item.description: Game Description Medieval Engineers is an open-world sandbox in which you can play for free online as a pirate with a friend, designing and building various architectural structures. The setting is represented by the medieval world. Openworld can be explored alone or online, teaming up with other players. You have to study new technologies and build fortresses that will help protect you from enemies. It is necessary to extract resources, as well as engage in mining operations in order to replenish warehouses with valuable materials.

item.title: Total War Attila
item.description: Game Description Total War Attila is a turn-based strategy that allows you to play online with a friend, or compete online online with random players from all over the world. On the pirate platform you can fight for free in all multiplayer modes and campaigns. Multiplayer allows you to join teams to take on common enemies. The next part of the Total War includes not only the possibility of free online play, but also offers a story campaign, the events of which develop in 395, when the division of the Roman Empire took place.

item.title: Forsaken Isle
item.description: Game Description Forsaken Isle is an adventure survival with a view of the top. You find yourself on a uninhabited island where you have to explore the surrounding territories, collect resources, build refuge and fight with a huge number of enemies. The main thing is to survive at all costs in the hostile environment of the forgotten island. Once alone with nature, you have to use all the skills to survive.

item.title: Deathtrap
item.description: Game Description Deathtrap is a tower defense game that allows you to team up with a friend or random players on a pirate for free to play online with characters of three classes: warrior, sorceress and arrow. Each hero differs in tactics and fighting style. Events take place in the world of The Incredible Adventures of Van Helsing. On the Internet online you can join teams and compete with factions.

item.title: Dying Light
item.description: Game Description Dying Light allows you to play online for free, exploring the open world with a friend. An online Internet connection is available for playing together. The Dying Light: The Following (Hellraid) project is a first-person action game with survival elements. The hero has parkour skills, which allows him to move through streets and buildings at incredible speed. You can climb onto roofs, show tricks, combine jumps with punches, etc.

item.title: Dying Light
item.description: Game Description A terrible virus grows into a global problem inDying Light. Starting from the city of Harran in Latin America, the infection is decimating the entire world, turning those infected into the walking dead. The hero must survive in such circumstances and try to correct the situation. As an undercover operative, Kyle Crane receives his most important assignment. He needs to find a guy named Suleiman in order to take away from him an important file that he stole.

item.title: Saints Row: Gat out of Hell
item.description: Game Description InSaints Row: Gat out of Hell you can play online with a friend or compete with random players online online. The gameplay is third-person action in an open world. Online play gives you the opportunity to control familiar characters from the series: Johnny Gat or Kinzie Kensington. The pirated version contains all multiplayer content and includes all add-ons for free. Exploring the demonic version of Steelport requires you to complete main and side missions.

item.title: GRAV
item.description: Game Description GRAV is a sandbox that you can play online with a friend while exploring the vast expanses of space. On the pirate route you can visit various planets for free, traveling across continents alone or with friends online. Each planet is highlighted by biomes and creatures. The gameplay allows you to collect items, build a base, hunt monsters and much more. Multiplayer allows you to both cooperate with other survivors and declare enmity.

item.title: Geometry Dash
item.description: Game Description Geometry Dash is a 2D arcade game aimed at hardcore level completion. You will take control of a unique character, which can be in the form of a geometric figure, to pass the most difficult levels and open up new opportunities in the gameplay. Here you will find more than 100 original and challenging missions, as well as the opportunity to create your own main character and share your results on the leaderboard.

item.title: Assetto Corsa
item.description: Game Description Assetto Corsa is a car simulator developed based on test drives of cars using a model of real behavior. Includes both single player and multiplayer modes. The developers presented a variety of licensed cars and tracks, which were specially digitized specifically for the race to convey maximum authenticity to their prototypes. The machines can be customized to your individual taste, because… the creators have added an extensive set of settings and support for modifications.

item.title: THE KING OF FIGHTERS '98 ULTIMATE MATCH FINAL EDITION
item.description: Game Description THE KING OF FIGHTERS ‘98 ULTIMATE MATCH FINAL EDITION is a dynamic fighting game that gives you the opportunity to play online as a pirate, fighting with a friend or random people online online. KOF 98 includes multiplayer features and all previously released content for free. Multiplayer allows you to fight as legendary fighters such as Eiji Kisaragi, Kasumi Todoh, Geez Howard, Mister Big and Wolfgang Krauser. Alternative versions of fighters are available.

item.title: BlazBlue: Continuum Shift Extend
item.description: Game Description BlazBlue: Continuum Shift Extend is a continuation of a dynamic fighting game made in anime style. You can play online with a friend, fighting for free on a pirate. Local mode and online confrontations are available. The sequel introduces several new modes, various story scenarios, additional heroes, online play and a lot of other content. The story begins after the Second War ended. The Librarium branches were completely wiped out from the face of the earth.

item.title: Dungeonmans
item.description: Game Description Dungeonmans The Heroic Adventure Roguelike - a traditional horned in which you explore the dungeons, fight with a variety of monsters and collect lutus. You have to develop your academy in order to open new opportunities and skills. Go to the adventure and take part in step -by -step battles. A fascinating fantasy story awaits you, telling about the confrontation of good and evil. Gameplay Dungeonmans The Heroic Adventure Roguelike:

item.title: Lara Croft and The Temple Of Osiris
item.description: Game Description Lara Croft and The Temple Of Osiris is a spin-off of the main Lara Croft series, aimed at online co-op. You can play online with a friend on a pirate, using all the available multiplayer functions of the project. Lara Croft and The Temple Of Osiris is a sequel to the previous game called Lara Croft and the Guardian of Light. Events are developing in Egypt. The Temple of Set, the god of chaos, was discovered.

item.title: Fight The Dragon
item.description: Game Description Fight The Dragon is a Hack and Slash game with RPG elements. You can run around the local expanses on a pirate ship alone or play online with a friend. This can be done together at the same computer or in a small group on the Internet online. The main feature of the project is that it was created by a fan community. This is an isometric and session title.

item.title: Rising World
item.description: Game Description You can playRising World online online with a friend or other players. All network functions on the pirate version are presented unchanged, so the possibility of free online play is available to all players, regardless of device. You can play online for free both through a local network and over the Internet. Gameplay-wise, the project is a sandbox where events, enemies, loot and dungeons are randomly generated. Once in the world of Rising World, you need to start with the simplest tools.

item.title: Rising World
item.description: Game Description Rising World - a game in the “sandbox” genre. Your main goal is to survive in a world that you can create yourself. Explore caves, forests, mountains and dungeons. Develop new tools to solve problems and invent your powerful technologies. You can unite with other players to create civilization, trade and fight. This world is in your hands! Peculiarities: The modified world - everything you see can be changed.

item.title: The Crew
item.description: Game Description The Crew is a racing match simulator that makes it possible to create its own unique sports car. The plot tells you about the professional racer Alex Taylore. He and his older brother were organizing illegal races. Some time later, the FBI staff found them. Police kill the founder of this event, and the brothers are imprisoned. The heroes are offered to reduce the term, but in return they will have to work in law enforcement agencies.

item.title: Motorcycle Club
item.description: Game Description Motorcycle Club is a racing arcade game with simulator elements, which provides the opportunity to play on a pirate for free online, competing with a friend in a confrontation or online online, playing in a team against other participants. Online play allows you to join teams against other biker groups. The vehicle fleet is represented by 22 brands: BMW, Honda, Kawasaki, KTM, Suzuki, Yamaha, etc. The possibility of free online play allows you to fight in three modes: Superbike, Roadster and Custom.

item.title: The Jackbox Party Pack
item.description: Game Description The Jackbox Party Pack is the first in a series of competitive party games that you can play online for free. Together with a friend or in a company of up to 100 people, participants take part in various types of competitions on the Internet online. You can play from various devices, be it a personal computer, phone, tablet, etc. Online play and single-player competitions are available. The Jackbox Party Pack includes 5 unique types of competitions.

item.title: Geometry Wars 3: Dimensions
item.description: Game Description Geometry Wars 3: Dimensions is a dynamic twin-stick shooter that gives you the opportunity to play online with a friend, competing with each other on a pirate game for free. It is possible to unite online against a common enemy via the Internet. Game mechanics develop the ideas of the previous two parts, improving balance, effects, graphics, etc. An online game designed for two players is presented, and a full-fledged story solo mode is also available.

item.title: Craft The World
item.description: Game Description Craft The World is a sandbox that allows you to play as a pirate for free online with a friend or compete with random participants online online. Mechanics include elements of colony development, crafting and god simulator. It is necessary to explore the generated locations that are inhabited by a variety of creatures. You need to build a base by collecting useful resources and tools. Allows you to build complex structures and create powerful weapons.

item.title: Craft the World
item.description: Game Description Craft the World is an adventure 2D game that combines multiple elements. You can explore the procedurally generated worlds, build locks and fortresses, fight with hostile creatures and get materials necessary for numerous crafts. Manage the dwarf tribe and lead them the way you want. The player can send his wards to extract resources, build structures or fight with opponents. But, not everything is so simple. You have to put them on, help in battles and feed them in time.

item.title: WARMACHINE: Tactics
item.description: Game Description WARMACHINE: Tactics is a turn-based strategy game in which you can play online as a pirate with a friend, fighting for free in versus or co-op mode. Over the Internet, online players will need to enter the battle for the Iron Kingdom, commanding their own army of steam soldiers. In the world of WARMACHINE: Tactics, the world of magic co-exists with high technology. Online play and single player mode available.

item.title: Gems of War - Puzzle RPG
item.description: Game Description Gems of War - Puzzle RPG is a mixture of role -playing game and casual puzzle in the spirit of “three in a row” with KKI elements. Title came to a PC from mobile devices. The project has a single and multiplayer content. There is a PVP with a rating system, online tournaments, contractions with mobs, weekly events, quests, guilds, events for several players, mini-games, a story campaign where history is given through dialogue inserts.

item.title: Bloons TD 5
item.description: Game Description Bloons TD 5 is a bright and dynamic tower defense game that allows you to play online with a friend on a pirate for free, competing in the construction of defensive towers online online. There are many different upgrades, specialists and various challenges available in which you need to destroy all enemies who have invaded the protected area. Each building can be improved. To build a base or create an item, monkeys are used, which run around the map and protect the territory from enemies.

item.title: Construction Simulator 2015
item.description: Game Description Construction Simulator 2015 is a builder simulator that offers you, together with a friend or random players, to build an entire city over the Internet online. You can play pirates online for free, or build houses alone. Network play supports cross-platform. The opportunity for free online play includes each participant controlling one of 16 construction vehicles from the LIEBHERR, STILL and MAN brands. Together you will need to dig a pit to create a solid foundation.

item.title: Never Alone
item.description: Game Description Never Alone is an adventure platformer designed to be played online with a friend. You can use the Internet connection online or go through the story locally. All network functions are included for free, and the pirate version also contains all bonus materials and modes. The slogan of which perfectly describes the entire gameplay: I’m not alone. The project is based on an Inupiaq tale called Kunuuksaayuka. You have to control the girl Nuna and her faithful arctic fox.

item.title: This War of Mine
item.description: Game Description This War of Mine is a cross-platform platformer game with elements of survival for an entire group of people. At the beginning of the game, you are given several characters to control the group, and you develop them depending on the time of day. During the day, the characters live in a house located in a city besieged by rebels. They arrange their everyday life, help each other, perform joint tasks and craft the necessary items.

item.title: LEGO Batman 3 Beyond Gotham
item.description: Game Description You can playLEGO Batman 3: Beyond Gotham online with a friend, even on a pirated version and for free. This time, Batman doesn’t just protect Gotham City, but teams up with the entire team of DC Comics superheroes and goes into space! In an online multiplayer game, supervillain Brainiac, who can shrink cities, collects miniature worlds for his bizarre collection. Players can assemble a team of over 150 DC heroes and villains, including familiar faces from the Justice League and even toughs like Cyborg and Solomon Grundy.

item.title: Toybox Turbos
item.description: Game Description Toybox Turbos is an arcade simulator in which you can take part in pirate races online with a friend, competing online for free in various multiplayer modes. The online game allows you to ride in 35 different cars. There are a total of 18 tracks available, made in unique styles. On the tracks, players will find various obstacles and boosters. Boosts include mines, machine guns, hammers and many other types of weapons that help destroy your opponents.

item.title: The Binding of Isaac: Rebirth
item.description: Game Description The Binding of Isaac: Rebirth is a remake of the game of the same name, which allows you to compete online on the Internet. You can play online with a friend, using all the features of a cooperative game for free on a pirate. The gameplay is made in the RPG genre and contains roguelike elements. The re-release has changed the graphic component. The visual style began to resemble 16-bit classics.

item.title: The Binding of Isaac: Rebirth
item.description: Game Description The Binding of Isaac: Rebirth is a remake of the original title, allowing you to embark on exciting adventures with additional innovations and improved graphics. The game has been optimized, allowing for stable FPS on most devices. The picture looks more colorful, thanks to hand-drawn pixel characters and environments that increase the quality of the visual component. The effects of shots and enemy deaths have become more detailed, creating tangible dynamics on the battlefield.

item.title: Depth
item.description: Game Description Depth is an asymmetrical multiplayer survival game in which you can explore the deep ocean as a pirate for free with a friend, connecting online via the Internet. You can travel alone or play online with partners, exploring the vast seabed in search of treasure. Bloodthirsty sharks pose a huge threat. You need to fight them or avoid them by any means. The possibility of free online play allows you to both fight predators in co-op and take part in underwater confrontations between each other.

item.title: Call of Duty: Advanced Warfare
item.description: Game Description Call of Duty: Advanced Warfare allows pirates to play for free online with a friend or offers to take part in multiplayer competitions with random players around the world. You can play online online or fight in local competitions. Call of Duty: Frontline Warfare is a first-person shooter that features both online play and a single-player campaign. The action takes place in the world of the future. The year is 2054.

item.title: Guns N Zombies
item.description: Game Description Guns N Zombies is an isometric zombie shooter. Fans of co-op can play online with a friend, and also on pirate. Co-op play is only available online. You can’t run together on the same computer here. In Guns N Zombies you need to shoot crowds of enemies in limited space. You can also install defensive turrets. Network play also allows you to do this. Events take place in a world where an apocalypse has occurred.

item.title: BlazeRush
item.description: Game Description BlazeRush is an arcade and combat racing game. In them you can fight for first place with computer opponents or compete online with other users on the Internet. On Pirate it is possible to play online with one friend or several friends at once. At the same time, users are allowed to connect at any time to an already ongoing race. The gameplay in BlazeRush is reminiscent of Rock n' Roll Racing.

item.title: Dungeon of the Endless
item.description: Game Description Dungeon of the Endless is a multiplayer roguelike that you can play online with a friend by connecting online via the Internet. A huge variety of characters are available for free on the pirate site, including Josh Ntello, various additional weapons, loot and much more. The gameplay is a strategy game with tower defense and roguelike elements, providing free-to-play online play where the goal of players is to form a team and fend off an attack from a horde of enemies.

item.title: WWE 2K15
item.description: Game Description WWE 2K15 is a wrestling simulator in which you can fight online online or participate in local confrontations with a friend. The pirate version of WWE 2K15 includes all fighters and add-ons from different leagues for free. You can play online as any famous wrestler, including Alberto Del Rio, Edge, Kevin Nash, Kane, Batista, Chris Jericho, John Cena, CM Punk and others. The network game is represented by doubles matches, deathmatches and other competitions.

item.title: Sid Meier's Civilization Beyond Earth
item.description: Game Description On the pirateSid Meier’s Civilization Beyond Earth you can play online for free with a friend or compete for world domination with other players online online. Sid Meier’s Civilization: Beyond Earth is a global 4X strategy represented by 8 factions: American Resettlement Corporation, Brazil, Franco-Iberia, Cavitan Protectorate, Panzian Cooperative, Polyastria, People’s African and Slavic Unions. Multiplayer allows you to take control of one of the parties to establish dominance in the galaxy.

item.title: Screencheat
item.description: Game Description Screencheat is a multiplayer shooter with a first-person view. You can play it online with a friend on pirate. This can also be done online via the Internet. In total, the project contains 11 maps with many landmarks. Screencheat only offers online play. Compared to other titles, the indie project stands out with its unusual concept. In it, the screen is always divided into several parts. The number of windows depends on the number of participants.

item.title: Door Kickers
item.description: Game Description Door Kickers is a top-down action game with strategy elements that allows you to team up for free with a friend on a pirate ship to play together online, going through the storyline, or to confront other players, competing online on the Internet. Having assembled your special forces squad, you need to confront various terrorist groups and organizations. The gameplay is driven by planning and tactics. It is important to be able to quickly make decisions and analyze the situation.

item.title: F1 2014
item.description: Game Description F1 2014 is a sports car simulator. You can play Pirate online with a friend. This allows you to share it over the Internet online or LAN. Having fun together on one PC is also possible. There is a split screen mode for this. F1 2014 has an official Formula 1 license. The project contains all the tracks, drivers, cars from the 2014 season. Including the Red Bull Ring track in Spielberg, Austria, and the autodrome in Sochi.

item.title: Borderlands: The Pre-Sequel
item.description: Game Description Borderlands: The Pre-Sequel is a first-person shooter that allows you to play online with a friend using an online connection, or go through the story campaign alone. All multiplayer functions are available on the pirate version, making it possible to complete the story part in the company of a partner. Events develop between the first two parts. The game starts from the Vault, and the main actions take place on the satellite of Pandora.

item.title: Rise Son of Rome
item.description: Game Description Ryse Son of Rome is an action game that allows you to team up with a friend to play online as a pirate. All network functions are available for free, as well as the ability to fight online over the Internet. Additionally, the addons Mars Chosen, Duel of Fates and Morituri Pack are presented. The main story centers on Marius Titus, a Roman soldier fighting barbarian invaders. He joins Britain to avenge his family’s death.

item.title: Damned
item.description: Game Description Damned is a first-person co-op horror game with stealth elements. Its gameplay is tailored for short online sessions on the Internet. On Pirate you can play online with a friend or with random users. Each match requires 5 participants. The gameplay here is asymmetrical. The possibility of free online play allows gamers to experience an atypical experience. In Damned, users can take on one of two roles. The goal of the survivors is to escape the level and help their teammates do the same.

item.title: METAL SLUG X
