item.description: Game Description METAL SLUG X is considered the second part of a series of Japanese titles in the Run ‘n’ gun genre. The sequel can be played alone or online with a friend, even on a pirated version. In addition to hacking on the Internet online, there is local multiplayer, which allows you to have fun together on one computer. The release contains an improved version. The developers replaced the music in it, partially redid the old locations, increased the number of enemies, added more bonuses and made many minor changes.

item.title: Middle-earth: Shadow of Mordor
item.description: Game Description The main character -Middle-earth: Shadow of Mordor - will fight Sauron and avenge his family. One day, Sauron kidnapped Talion to sacrifice him and summon Celebrimbor, the spirit of the main elf in the world of the Lord of the Rings. However, this spirit helps Talion to resurrect, gives him new abilities and sends him into battle. The protagonist’s enemies are Sauron and his dark lords: the Hammer, the Black Hand and the Tower.

item.title: Gauntlet
item.description: Game Description Gauntlet is a 3D remake of the arcade classic. The re-release of Slayer Edition allows you to play online with a friend, and this can be done even on a pirated platform. Here you can have fun locally. The co-op is also available online and in Hotseat mode. The project itself is a fantasy action game with a top-down view. In Gauntlet there are 4 characters to choose from: Valkyrie - her name is Tyra, and she can fight with a one-handed blade and throw her shield like a boomerang; Mage - the wizard Merlin, who knows 9 spells and knows how to combine them; Warrior - melee fighter Thor , capable of accelerating attacks and delivering circular strikes; Elf - marksman Questor, who prefers to set traps and fire from a bow.

item.title: Defense Grid 2
item.description: Game Description Defense Grid 2 is a 3D Tower Defense set in a science fiction setting. On this pirate game you can play with a friend over a local network. The cooperative is also available on the Internet online and on one PC on a shared screen. However, it is designed only for two gamers. The possibility of free online play increases the replayability of the project. In Defense Grid 2, the network game contains 3 modes that are not available in the single player.

item.title: Stronghold Crusader 2
item.description: Game Description Stronghold Crusader 2 is a real-time strategy game that you can play online with a friend or fight for free on a pirate battle with random players using an online Internet connection. The possibility of free online play includes managing one of several countries with its own unique army, lord, buildings, etc. The difference from previous games in the series is that online play is the main mode, while training, single player campaign and map editor are secondary modes.

item.title: Endless Legend Emperor Edition
item.description: Game Description Endless Legend Emperor Edition is a strategy game that allows you to play online with a friend and fight online with different people around the world. The pirate version includes online modes and add-ons such as Guardians, Shadows, Shifters, Tempest, Inferno and Symbiosis for free. The action takes place on the continent of Auriga in the far reaches of the galaxy. The project belongs to the same universe as Endless Space.

item.title: NARUTO SHIPPUDEN: Ultimate Ninja STORM Revolution
item.description: Game Description NARUTO SHIPPUDEN: Ultimate Ninja STORM Revolution is a fighting game with beat-em-up elements based on the Naruto universe. It offers battles with bots and fights with live opponents over the Internet online. You can also play pirate online with a friend. It also supports a mode where users sit at the same computer and fight on a single screen. NARUTO SHIPPUDEN: Ultimate Ninja STORM Revolution features free online play, a single player campaign, championships, individual competitions, free battles, and training.

item.title: Bridge Constructor Medieval
item.description: Game Description The events of Bridge Constructor Medieval take players to the distant past, when knights and castles existed in the world. The gameplay is based on physics, where you will need to build bridges to supply your lands with food and goods. Build structures that can withstand enormous weight, or, on the contrary, will not allow the enemy army to pass through, eager to capture your fortress. The campaign consists of 40 episodes.

item.title: Dead Rising 3
item.description: Game Description Dead Rising 3 is an open-world zombie action game that you can play online with a friend or compete with random players online. The gameplay includes elements of crafting and survival, allowing you to explore an entire city consisting of four districts for free as a pirate. Each area contains unique enemies and a different set of quests. It is necessary to destroy zombies using a variety of available means, including melee weapons and self-crafted tools.

item.title: Sims 4
item.description: Game Description Sims 4 is a life simulator that you can play for free online with a friend or build your life alone. Using an online Internet connection, you can build your family, make friends with your neighbors, and much more. The events take place in a small town, where each house is inhabited by unique Sims leading their own individual lifestyles. Before you start the game, you can create your own character or choose a ready-made one, with your own characteristics and character.

item.title: Lethal League
item.description: Game Description Lethal League is a competitive arcade game with fighting game elements, which provides the opportunity to play online as a pirate for free, fighting with a friend or other players in dynamic duels over the Internet online. The essence of the gameplay is to hit your opponent in the face with an anti-gravity ball. The Lethal League network game allows you to both join forces and perform in cross-matches.

item.title: Metro 2033 Redux
item.description: Game Description Metro 2033 Redux is a first-person shooter with a deep story and horror elements. The developers questioned not the simple existence of people underground, but the relationships between them. Has the main threat always been with us, in people? In the world of the post-apocalypse, we play as a character named Artem. He grew up underground, in the Moscow metro. In 2013, the world was hit by the terrible consequences of the latest epidemic.

item.title: Orbital Gear
item.description: Game Description Orbital Gear is a space shooter designed for playing together with a friend. You can play online as a pirate for free, fighting with battle mechs and traveling through the vastness of space on the Internet online. A very important mechanic is the gravity of celestial objects. By taking control of one of the robots, you can arm your character with 12 different types of weapons. Network play allows you to engage in battle with friends and random people online online.

item.title: Ultra Street Fighter IV: Arcade Edition
item.description: Game Description Ultra Street Fighter IV is a 3D fighting game that can be played as a pirate with a friend online or alone with bots. Both regular matches and rating battles are available online on the Internet. The system tries to select living opponents with approximately the same skill. The Arcade Edition is posted here. It differs from the usual one in the changed balance, the introduction of new movements and settings for old heroes.

item.title: Sacred 3
item.description: Game Description Sacred 3 changed its genre dramatically. Despite the radical changes, the project retained some of the advantages of the series, such as the ability to play online with a friend (this can also be done on a pirate account). Both local battles and those battles that take place over the Internet are supported. Network play allows up to 4 users to have fun at the same time. Despite the possibility of free online play, gamers will not be able to run around the open world together.

item.title: Mount Your Friends
item.description: Game Description InMount Your Friends you need to team up with a friend to play online, building a human tower of athletes. The humorous pirate game includes all online modes for free. An extreme sport created for real muscular athletes. Using an online Internet connection or a LAN network, you need to build a mountain of half-naked men with these same hanging ones. A real man’s and masculine sport! The gameplay does not contain any sexual innuendo.

item.title: The Room
item.description: Game Description The Room is an indie project in the mystical puzzle genre, which spawned a series of 4 sequels. Look at where it all began and what has changed in the future. The gameplay consists of exploring the secrets of a box of secrets. You need to show remarkable restraint and have a keen eye to find hidden objects on the box, for example, keys, cabinet handles, nails and other small parts, and small secret drawers to gradually unravel the puzzles found inside the compartments.

item.title: UnEpic
item.description: Game Description InUnEpic you can play a pirate game with a friend or participate in a free co-op with random players using an online connection. If you play online, then each participant takes on the role of video game lovers who set out to explore the dark dungeons. The plot centers on a guy named Daniel. He is an ordinary gamer who unexpectedly finds himself inside his favorite role-playing adventure. The possibility of free online play allows you to plunge into a world of adventure in the company of a friend.

item.title: Magic: The Gathering – Duels of the Planeswalkers 2015
item.description: Game Description Magic: The Gathering – Duels of the Planeswalkers 2015 allows you to have fun online online. You can play with a friend online, even on a pirate site. The project belongs to the CCG genre. This is a video game adaptation of the popular card board game. The product is also known as Magic 2015 - Duels of the Planeswalkers. The possibility of free online play allows you to fight with live opponents, and not just with bots.

item.title: Abyss Odyssey
item.description: Game Description Abyss Odyssey combines a simplistic roguelike, platformer and fighting game. The indie project is designed for both single play and online co-op. On a pirate site, no one forbids playing with a friend online. With each new session, locations are generated randomly. The title is inspired by Chilean culture. There are 3 characters in Abyss Odyssey: the girl Katrin, the water spirit Ponkoyu and the Phantom Monk. Initially, only the heroine is available, and two heroes need to be unlocked as you progress.

item.title: Blockscape
item.description: Game Description Blockscape is a sandbox and open-world survival simulator with a first-person view. On a pirate, you can run alone through the local open spaces or play with a friend online. Online multiplayer available. There is a Just build mode, where you can calmly engage in creativity. An indie project dedicated to building blocks. Blockscape’s goal is to start from scratch and build an empire. The possibility of free online play allows two people to achieve the goal.

item.title: Bridge Constructor Playground
item.description: Game Description Bridge Constructor Playground is a bridge construction simulator that gives complete creative freedom. Build a wide variety of structures that connect the banks and allow cars to cover distances from point A to point B, significantly saving time. The Bridge Constructor Playground campaign consists of 32 varied levels in which you build complex structures through valleys, canals and rivers. After you have built an object, it needs to pass a stress test.

item.title: Real Boxing
item.description: Game Description Real Boxing can please boxing fans. Those who prefer to fight with live opponents in such projects will be able to play with a friend online on this pirate game. Local locale is not supported, but you can fight together on one PC or online online. The title came to computers from mobile devices. It has adapted touch controls for the keyboard. A gamepad can also be used, but not all controllers are supported.

item.title: GRID Autosport
item.description: Game Description GRID Autosport is a car simulator in which you can play online with random players on the Internet online or compete for free with a friend in splitscreen mode. It is allowed to unite into teams, taking part in tournaments and championships together. Touring Cars mode has been introduced, where you can drive on night tracks. Tires in GRID Autosport tend to wear out, and the competition itself is focused on endurance.

item.title: Shovel Knight Treasure Trove
item.description: Game Description The pirate gameShovel Knight Treasure Trove can be played online for free with a friend, controlling shovel knights online online or on a shared screen. The online game consists of co-op and versus mode. The plot tells the story of Shovel Knight, who must find his beloved. He will need to fight the Order without mercy and repel the powerful Enchantress. The possibility of free online play allows you to play as one of four knights: Plague, Phantom, King and Shovel.

item.title: Sniper Elite 3
item.description: Game Description InSniper Elite 3 you can team up with a friend to play pirate online or compete in PvP matches with other players online online. A huge number of guns, equipment and equipment are provided for free. Each barrel has its own physics and weight. A special feature of the gameplay is the X-Ray Kill Cam, which effectively follows the fired cartridge. The gameplay is focused on tactics, and the possibility of free online play allows you to prove yourself as an experienced warrior, outwitting your opponents and taking an advantageous position in a confrontation.

item.title: Rise of Nations: Extended Edition
item.description: Game Description Rise of Nations allows you to play with bots or online with a friend (on pirates too). This can be done over the Internet online or via LAN. The project itself belongs to the RTS genre. It uses 2D graphics with an isometric view. A re-release of the Extended Edition is posted here. It differs from the regular release in that it contains the original and the Thrones and Patriots expansion.

item.title: Spintires
item.description: Game Description PlayingSpintires on the Internet online with other players, or competing with a friend on a pirate, you will have to explore a huge amount of prairie, racing in powerful SUVs. You can play online for free or go through a single-player campaign, gradually unlocking new types of transport or unique locations. The possibility of free online play allows four racers to compete, demonstrating their skill in controlling a powerful machine capable of overcoming extreme obstacles and passing any type of surface.

item.title: Enemy Front
item.description: Game Description Enemy Front may be suitable for those who like projects dedicated to the theme of World War II. The title allows you to fight with bots online or with live opponents online online. You can play Pirate with a friend or random users online. There is also content for single fans. This is a first-person shooter with free online play. Enemy Front makes no claims to historical accuracy in terms of storytelling.

item.title: Nether: Resurrected
item.description: Game Description Nether: Resurrected is a multiplayer shooter set in a post-apocalyptic world. On the pirate Nether: Resurrected you can play online for free with a friend. Players fight in co-op against hordes of monsters, or confront other survivors online. The gameplay is a survival game in the open world, inviting you to explore a gloomy industrial city. Ammunition is strictly limited, and each monster poses a serious threat. Online play and single player mode available.

item.title: Splatter - Zombiecalypse Now
item.description: Game Description Splatter - Zombiecalypse Now takes players into a dark, nightmare world where multiplayer turns into a real test of survival. Here you can play online with a friend, fighting countless hordes of zombies. Even on a pirate site, you can play the game online for free, exploring 16 exciting levels filled with a noir atmosphere and voiced dialogues. The streets require adaptation, and the game offers an innovative light-based combat system.

item.title: 8-Bit Commando
item.description: Game Description 8-Bit Commando is a dynamic platformer with the ability to play online with a friend. You can go through the story campaign together for free on Pirate. Local multiplayer is available and the ability to play online online with players from all over the world. The gameplay is a classic run-n-gun. You have to go through a set of different levels, constantly moving forward and destroying enemies. Both online play and single player campaign are presented.

item.title: ibb and obb
item.description: Game Description The adventureibb and obb allows you and your friend to play on a pirate ship for free online, interacting with each other. A feature of the gameplay is a funny gravity that works in several directions. Whether online or locally, players need to join forces to overcome all the obstacles and traps. In ibb and obb you will need to solve a huge number of spatial puzzles. The multiplayer mode is aimed at cooperative interaction between participants.

item.title: Tropico 5
item.description: Game Description Tropico 5 can offer not only single-player, but also multiplayer. You can play Pirate with a friend online. But this can only be done online via the Internet. This is a city planning and political simulator, as well as an economic strategy. Tropico 5 covers the period from the 19th to the 21st century. When certain conditions are met, a change in the historical period occurs. There are 4 of them: the colonial era, as well as world wars, cold wars and modern wars.

item.title: Blade Symphony
item.description: Game Description Blade Symphony allows you to play pirate with a friend online, fighting with other users with swords. In addition to battles over the Internet, battles with bots are available online. The indie project itself crosses slasher and fighting games. It uses a third-person view. There is a choice of characters and weapons. The fighting style depends on their combination. The scimitar is suitable for those who like to attack weakly but often, while the rapier is more designed for those who prefer to parry.

item.title: Wargame Red Dragon
item.description: Game Description On the pirateWargame Red Dragon you can play with a friend online for free, fighting in co-op or against other players. On the Internet online you can unite into teams to confront enemy squads. Network play allows you to collect resources, develop new technologies and destroy your opponent’s bases. The gameplay is aimed at spectacular and dynamic military battles. The possibility of free online play allows you to take control of one of several countries, be it Japan, China, North Korea, South Korea, Australia and New Zealand.

item.title: LEGO The Hobbit
item.description: Game Description InLEGO The Hobbit players can play through the story campaign online, free of charge on a pirate ship, joining forces with a friend to overcome obstacles. You can play online or play on one device. It is also possible to compete with each other online or locally on the Internet. The adventure is based on the Hobbit films of the same name: An Unexpected Journey and The Desolation of Smaug.

item.title: The Elder Scrolls Online
item.description: Game Description The gameThe Elder Scrolls Online offers you to go through a number of locations for several warring factions, playing both alone and in real time with other players. The plot tells how Molag Bal, known as the Prince of Violence, decides to take over the entire kingdom of Tamriel and enslave ordinary citizens. The gamer will have to face the forces of evil and defeat him. Throughout the game world of The Elder Scrolls Online, there are several factions available, each of which is endowed with certain properties.

item.title: Scourge: Outbreak
item.description: Game Description Scourge: Outbreak invites you to go to the near future to play online with a friend on a pirate in a completely new setting, unlike other projects. The year is 2026, and the world is at the mercy of the Nogari Corporation. They are the creators of a completely new energy source called “Ambrosia”. And there are immediately those in the world who want to get this energy for themselves.

item.title: Rogue's Tale
item.description: Game Description Rogue’s Tale is a step -by -step isometric adventure, where you have to clean a huge number of various dungeons and fight many dangerous enemies. The game will unfold in a place called Frostmourn Keep. The hero goes to the catacombs in the mountains on the edge of the world. The protagonist pursues the global goal - to defeat the current king of the fortress of ice sorrow and take his place on the throne.

item.title: Call of Duty: Ghosts
item.description: Game Description Call of Duty: Ghosts is a first-person shooter that allows you to play as a pirate for free online with a friend in multiplayer mode or go through the story campaign alone. Call of Duty: Specter is the tenth serialized installment in the franchise. A story-based game for a US Army Special Forces soldier is presented. The action takes place in a world close to the post-apocalypse. A certain hacker hacked the ONE space station and struck key cities in the United States.

item.title: Mercenary Kings
item.description: Game Description Mercenary Kings has the optimal concept for playing online with a friend on a pirate. Here, users become part of the Mercenary Kings squad - the best team to recruit on Earth. But when the partners were defeated and are now being held in a super secret base, the gamer must do everything to stop the enemies. Here, he will be confronted by members of the Claw organization. In addition to the ability to do everything alone, the user is given the option of sharing the game online.

item.title: South Park: The Stick of Truth (game)
item.description: Game Description The funny events of South Park take us into the world of the gameSouth Park: The Stick of Truth, where we play the role of a newcomer who has ambitions and a desire to build a circle of friends in a new city. As soon as we enter the game, famous fourth graders start swinging swords and casting random spells. One of these brings chaos and evil into this world, which we have to cope with.

item.title: Mars Colony: Challenger
item.description: Game Description In addition to the ability to play online with a friend on a pirate,Mars Colony: Challenger immerses gamers in the atmosphere of deep space. Events take place on a space station, which in turn is based on the surface of Mars. Here, players will have to provide themselves with conditions for a comfortable existence by monitoring the condition of equipment, monitoring and growing new samples of food, and also coping with difficulties that arise along the way.

item.title: One Finger Death Punch
item.description: Game Description One finger death punch is an arcade fighting game in the style of beat’em up, in which you can feel like a real martial arts master. In this game we have to fight off crowds of enemies that have surrounded the main character and are advancing from opposite sides. The game design is made in 2D, and all the characters are drawn people, which adds simplicity to the game, but at the same time makes it unusual.

item.title: The LEGO Movie Videogame
item.description: Game Description InThe LEGO Movie - Videogame you can play pirate online with a friend for free. In this online multiplayer game you will control characters from the film, such as Emmett, Wyldstyle and Batman. Just like building with real LEGOs, you’ll use building blocks to solve puzzles and complete levels. Here’s the kicker: there are two types of characters. Regular builders, like Emmet at the beginning of the game, need pages of instructions to build things.

item.title: Talisman Digital Edition
item.description: Game Description Talisman Digital Edition provides the opportunity to play online with a friend, competing with each other on a pirate game for free. You can participate in various multiplayer competitions on the Internet online or on a shared screen. The project is a licensed digital version of the board game of the same name. The setting is made in the fantasy genre. The mechanics contain elements of classic board games and strategy games.

item.title: Talisman: Digital Edition
item.description: Game Description Talisman: Digital Edition is a story about the journey of a daredevil, looking for a special artifact - the “crown of power”. Its owner is able to destroy any enemy and become the ruler of the whole world. However, it is extremely difficult to get a powerful item, it requires courage, strength and luck, because there will be many dangers in the way. The player takes on the role of one of the 14 accessible heroes, divided into the following classes: magicians, knights, druids and thieves.

item.title: Disciples 3: Reincarnation
item.description: Game Description Disciples III: Reincarnation provides the opportunity to play online for free with a friend over the Internet. It takes players to the Gothic kingdom of Nevendaar, where a celestial creature has abandoned its charges. This expanded version of Disciples III: Renaissance and the Resurrection add-on has been completely redesigned, featuring a redesigned combat engine, new visuals, and a captivating narrative written by fantasy author Ekaterina Stadnikova. Now you can play online with a friend for free, even on a pirate site.

item.title: Octodad Dadliest Catch
item.description: Game Description InOctodad Dadliest Catch players will have to play pirates for free online, controlling Octodads pretending to be people. You can play with a friend locally or compete with random people online online. The gameplay focuses on funny ragdoll and physics. You will need to perform a variety of tasks, destroying objects along the way. Online play includes competition and co-op modes. The action takes place in a huge aquarium.

item.title: Hero Siege
item.description: Game Description Hero Siege is a roguelike with hack-n-slash elements that can be played online on a pirate site for free. You will have to explore the generated locations alone or online. Monsters, loot, bosses, and many other elements are also randomized. The free online game allows you to team up with up to four people to descend into dark dungeons and fight powerful opponents. The single player campaign and online play consist of 7 acts.

item.title: Insurgency
item.description: Game Description Insurgency is a tactical shooter, presented with the ability to play online with a friend or other people online, participating as a pirate for free in various confrontation modes. Mutiny allows you to fight online in cooperative and team matches. The action takes place during the events of the Iranian War. The online game relies on realism and heavy weapon physics. The possibility of free online play allows you to take control of one of two opposing factions: US PMC employees and Iranian rebels.

item.title: Insurgency
item.description: Game Description Insurgency is a first-person shooter, in which the developers focused on playing in cooperative or multiplayer mode, about the Iraq War. The protagonist is a member of the US PMC, and he is fighting against Iraqi insurgents. The player chooses one side at the beginning of the match, and after that a brutal fight begins between the two factions. The basis of the game is a confrontation between two teams, which include 16 people.

item.title: Nidhogg
item.description: Game Description Nidhogg is a game for two that can be played for free online with a friend: on a pirate you can connect via the Internet online or locally. Nidhogg is a 2D action game with elements of a fencing simulator. Taking one of the heroes under your leadership, you will have to perform numerous pirouettes, lunges and acrobatic stunts. No one canceled the clumsy blows. Multiplayer Nidhogg places two fighters in different interactive environments where players must demonstrate their hand-to-hand combat skills.

item.title: 3089 -- Futuristic Action RPG
item.description: Game Description On the pirate3089 – Futuristic Action RPG you can play online with a friend for free, traveling through a variety of procedurally generated locations. You can play cooperatively or participate in online confrontations over the Internet. The action takes place in the distant future on the planet Hakh. You have to fight with androids, aliens and other enemies. The visual side of 3089 – Futuristic Action RPG is made in a low-poly style.

item.title: Metal Gear Rising: Revengeance
item.description: Game Description Metal Gear Rising: Revengeance is a plot branch from the original universe of the recognized genius Hideo Kojima. The game is in the slasher genre, unlike other Metal Gear projects. The plot is dedicated to the story of the cyber ninja Raiden, the protagonist of the second part. 4 years have passed since the collapse of the evil Sons of Patriots corporation. The military units, given freedom of action, plunged the world into chaos and constant divisions of power zones.

item.title: Kingdom Rush
item.description: Game Description Kingdom Rush is a project in the “tower defense” genre, in the style of the Middle Ages, interspersed with magic, creatures that do not exist in real life, like trolls, and real-time control of heroes with a choice of the direction and course of their attacks. This game received recognition on many platforms and later reached personal computers. The gameplay is standard for the genre, the advantage over other projects is the refined balance and exciting, moderately difficult levels that challenge and force you to change battle tactics and constantly be on the alert.

item.title: The Walking Dead: Season 2
item.description: Game Description The Walking Dead: The Game. Season 2 – the continuation of the “Walking Dead” franchise does not lag behind the first part and begins its story 2 years after the previous events. Now in The Walking Dead: Season Two, the user plays as a 10-year-old girl, Clementine, who is once again trying to find shelter and survive in a mortal world filled with living corpses. Having lost all his old friends, a brave child begins a journey on his own.

item.title: Motor Rock
item.description: Game Description Motor Rock is perfect for playing pirate games online with a friend. Considering the peculiarities of the genre (racing arcade), you can have some good fun here by organizing competitions on the proposed tracks. This is a rethinking of the once classic project, which had the same concept - racing on the tracks to rock music. Here, events take on an intergalactic scale, and every racer dreams of getting to the biggest championship.

item.title: Tiny Brains
item.description: Game Description Tiny Brains allows you to play online, teaming up to solve puzzles and interacting with a friend on the pirate board. Laboratory animals endowed with superpowers and intending to escape from the place in which they are being held come under control. The mad scientist is preparing to implement his plan, but the main characters do not want to be part of this action. Therefore, in order to pass all the prepared tests, they will have to work hard, and gamers, in turn, will have to coordinate their actions online.

item.title: Zombie Tycoon 2: Brainhov's Revenge
item.description: Game Description Zombie Tycoon 2: Brainhov’s Revenge focuses on the confrontation between two sides, so the project is suitable for playing online with a friend on a pirate. Here there is a battle between two evil geniuses - Oliver Tycoon with his army of zombies, or Professor Brainhom, his teacher. He is also capable of controlling an entire army of undead and harnessing their power. In addition to the single-player campaign, there are also online deathmatches, where you can arrange battles online over the Internet.

item.title: Baldur's Gate 2 Enhanced Edition
item.description: Game Description Baldur’s Gate 2 Enhanced Edition gives users the atmosphere of classic RPG projects and at the same time allows you to play online with a friend on a pirate. Here the adventure continues, which began in part 1. In addition, there are enough additional missions, quests and campaigns that drag on for many hours. A squad of heroes going in search of adventure falls under the control of the user.

item.title: LEGO Marvel Super Heroes
item.description: Game Description LEGO Marvel Super Heroes allows you to play online with a friend, even on pirates for free. Immerse yourself in an epic story spanning the vast Marvel Universe. Play online online, teaming up with legendary heroes such as Iron Man, Spider-Man and Captain America to stop Loki and his villainous pals from creating a world-destroying super-weapon. This online game offers exciting adventures and unforgettable moments in the company of your favorite characters.

item.title: Deadfall Adventures
item.description: Game Description Deadfall Adventures immerses users in the atmosphere of adventure and allows you to enjoy what is happening with a friend on a pirate ship. The events take place in 1938, and the main character is James Lee Quarterman. Wanting to find an ancient artifact hidden in Egypt, he goes there with an expedition. But after starting the search, it turns out that he is not the only one who wants to get hold of precious things.

item.title: XCOM: Enemy Within
item.description: Game Description XCOM: Enemy Within expands on the original game and still allows for online play. Here, while playing the game with a friend on a pirate, users will have access to new types of weapons, a combat system and a list of previously unavailable features. At the same time, new opponents will appear, who can only be defeated by making the right decisions on the battlefield. The essence of the project has not changed in relation to the original, and users will still have to fight back against hostile aliens, whose troops and formations are scattered throughout the Earth.

item.title: Risk of Rain
item.description: Game Description Risk of Rain is a third-person shooter with roguelike elements, aimed at online competitions on the Internet. You can play online with a friend, acting in co-op against common enemies, or use other multiplayer modes available on the pirate site for free. The events of Risk of Rain take place on an unknown planet, where you have to fight off phantasmagoric creatures. Each monster has its own unique attack and movement patterns.

item.title: Project Zomboid
item.description: Game Description Project Zomboid allows you to play with a friend using an online connection. You can also play online with random people from all over the world, using all the multiplayer features available for free on the pirate site. The setting allows you to plunge into the world of a post-apocalypse, where humanity is under the threat of a deadly zombie virus. A large open world is presented for exploration, which you will have to explore alone, or using the opportunity of a free online game.

item.title: Project Zomboid
item.description: Game Description Project Zomboid is a cross-platform game in which we will have to find a house, equip it, and start surviving in a world where a zombie apocalypse has recently occurred. We are located in Knox County. The latest epidemic infected more than 90% of the district’s residents, and they all became zombies. Difficult conditions will force us to survive, stock up on food, water, weapons and all available supplies in order to simply survive.

item.title: Final Exam
item.description: Game Description Final Exam has the optimal concept for playing pirate online with a friend. The plot tells about 4 characters who were heading to school for a party. However, by coincidence, they find themselves in a ghost town filled with sinister creatures. They crave human flesh, so the heroes should think about how to protect themselves. Working together online on the Internet, gamers will have to make their way through crowds of creatures to get out of this ominous place.

item.title: Sniper Elite: Nazi Zombie Army 2
item.description: Game Description Sniper Elite: Nazi Zombie Army 2 uses the concept of previous projects in the series and provides the opportunity to play online with a friend on a pirate. The Second World War is coming to an end, but the armies of the dead are literally rising from their graves. A team of elite snipers will have to deal with them in order to establish complete control over previously captured territories.

item.title: Battlefield 4
item.description: Game Description On the pirateBattlefield 4 you can play for free with a friend online, taking part in cooperative modes, or compete online with players from all over the world over the Internet. The gameplay of Battlefield 4 is a tactical first-person shooter. The network game of the fourth part features many innovations. For example, VoIP solutions have been improved, and a browser mode has been added, allowing you to monitor the game from above or from a third person.

item.title: Contagion
item.description: Game Description Contagion is a fast-paced zombie shooter that allows you to play online with a friend or fight hordes of the undead alone. On the pirate game, you can team up with up to four people for free, confronting the hordes of the infected. Co-op on a shared screen and online playthroughs are available. Each of the heroes has unique abilities and characteristics. The possibility of free online play includes traveling together through contaminated streets in search of weapons and useful resources.

item.title: Contagion
item.description: Game Description Contagion - a fascinating zombie at the first person, created in the best traditions of action with a completely open world. The plot tells us about the world into which the virus penetrates and absorbs everyone without a trace. Everyone who fell under his actions turned into half -dead carcasses that crave blood. We take the role of the character, for the large -scale cleansing of human lands from the zombie.

item.title: NARUTO SHIPPUDEN: Ultimate Ninja STORM 3 Full Burst
item.description: Game Description InNARUTO SHIPPUDEN: Ultimate Ninja STORM 3 Full Burst you can not only arrange single battles, but also play online with a friend on a pirate. Plot-wise, this part continues to tell about the events of the 4th Great War, gradually revealing the plans of the villains and giving way to new characters. So, Itachi and Sasuke will fight Kabuto, and the shinobi alliance will try to stop Madara, who was resurrected to implement an insane plan.

item.title: Truck Racer
item.description: Game Description Truck Racer not only gives you the opportunity to play online with a friend on a pirate, but also gives you a lot of emotions from what is happening on the screen. Here, finding yourself behind the wheel of a massive truck, the user is immersed in the atmosphere of dynamic races on tracks in a variety of settings. In total, there are 48 types of tracks on 10 different landscapes, which is why you have to constantly adapt to circumstances in order to beat your opponents.

item.title: The Wolf Among Us
item.description: Game Description The Wolf Among Us is an episodic graphic novel based on the Fable comics series created by Bill Willingham. The game’s plot acts as a prequel to the main story. The game is divided into 5 episodes, where every decision made by the player has a consequence and affects the overall one. history. The gameplay is point-and-click, but some sections contain action and fights, which are QTE scenes. All the characters presented in the game are heroes of famous fairy tales, who, with the help of spells, can exist in the world of people or “Simps”, as they are called here.

item.title: Gas Guzzlers Extreme
item.description: Game Description InGas Guzzlers Extreme users can feel all the dynamics and drive together, because the project provides the opportunity to play online with a friend on a pirate game. The essence is very simple - each player is given a vehicle equipped with weapons of varying weight. Using all its power, gamers compete with each other on the proposed tracks, finding out who will be the best in a particular race.

item.title: F1 2013
item.description: Game Description PirateF1 2013 offers the opportunity to play for free with a friend online, competing on Pirate in various multiplayer modes. Co-op is available online on the Internet, which allows you to join a team and compete against other players from around the world. The gameplay of F1 2013 is based on the 13th year of the Formula 1 championship. Free online play features classic content, allowing you to get behind the wheel of some of the most iconic racing cars of the 80s and 90s.

item.title: The King Of Fighters 13
item.description: Game Description The King Of Fighters 13 is a dynamic fighting game aimed at fighting with a friend or random players online online. All multiplayer modes are available for free on the pirate site. You can play online or fight locally. The 13th part of the series has improved balance, removed the least interesting modes, added new competitions, online play and many additional fighters. The plot part directly continues the plot of the 11th game and completes the story of Ash Crimson.

item.title: ARMA 3
item.description: Game Description For free on the pirated version ofARMA 3, you can play online with a friend, joining forces or participating in online confrontations over the Internet. The action takes place on the islands of Altis, Stratis, Tanoa and Malden. There are about 50 different villages on them. Buildings can be destroyed and captured. Events take place in 2030. Western Europe is in crisis, the US and China are fighting, and the CSAT alliance is gaining strength.

item.title: Arma 3
item.description: Game Description InArma 3 we regain our independence by playing as a neutral side of this war. Inside the universe of the third Arma - 2030. Key opponents are still fighting for independence in economic and commodity terms. Among the enemies, a new structural organization CSAT appears, acting as a military-political alliance. While the crisis rages in Europe, the United States is at odds with China in the Pacific. More than 400 square kilometers of gaming space, where the player, playing the role of a NATO peacekeeper, will save his group from real traitors who show themselves at the beginning of the story campaign.

item.title: 100% Orange Juice
item.description: Game Description 100% Orange Juice provides a unique opportunity to play online with a friend in an online game for free using a pirated game. Gamers can enjoy exciting online battles online using the free online gaming feature. This game brings together characters from various Orange Juice games, creating a vibrant world where humans, dogs and machines coexist. As young hero Kai, guided by the enigmatic Marie Poppo, gamers travel through multiple realms, facing a menacing darkness that adds intrigue to the gameplay.

item.title: Outlast (+Whistleblower)
item.description: Game Description Outlast (+Whistleblower) - DLC for the game of the same name, which added more content and a new storyline. The addition contains a backstory of the events that happened in the original, where Miles Upshur played the game. The journalist went to the Mount Massive mental hospital, where, for information received, there were many violations. Here he encountered a crowd of terrible psychos - monsters who had taken over the hospital.

item.title: Total War Rome 2 Emperor Edition
item.description: Game Description InTotal War Rome 2 Emperor Edition you can play online for free, fighting on a pirate with a friend or other participants both locally and online online. It is allowed to unite into teams to confront each other factions. The online game Total War: Rome 2 is aimed at politics. The intrigues of the rulers play an important role. The map includes 183 regions. Land, sea and siege battles are represented by several stages of battle.

item.title: Total War: ROME 2 - Emperor Edition
item.description: Game Description InTotal War: ROME 2 - Emperor Edition we are allowed to play as one of Caesar’s three followers. This is Octavian, the adopted son of a former ruler who is obliged to become the ruler of Rome; Mark Antony is Caesar’s loyal friend and best military leader; and Lepidus, the man through whom Caesar achieved universal recognition. After Caesar was killed, chaos erupted within the Roman Empire. The foreign policy of the empire maintained proper balance, while civil war was taking place inside, and the territory was divided into three parts.

item.title: Rayman Legends
item.description: Game Description PlayingRayman Legends online as a pirate with a friend, alone or with other players online is all the fun and mayhem imaginable! The gameplay is a rich platformer where you need to unlock characters, skins and various accessories, but not entirely for free, but by receiving victory points. The adventure directly continues the previous part of Rayman Origins. The online game Rayman Legends allows you to both compete against each other and take tests in co-op with up to 5 people.

item.title: Game Dev Tycoon
item.description: Game Description Game Dev Tycoon gives gamers the opportunity to become video game developers. Moreover, on the pirate platform they are allowed to play an economic simulator online with a friend. Thanks to the efforts of fans, this can be done online online. The campaign starts in the 1980s. Network play in Game Dev Tycoon offers users competition. In multiplayer, players compete with each other, deliberately pirate other people’s releases, spy and steal data.

item.title: Lost Planet 3
item.description: Game Description On the pirateLost Planet 3 you can compete with a friend or go through the story campaign together for free. You can play online or fight locally, competing in various multiplayer modes. You can complete the story both online and alone. Despite the three in the title, the story acts as a prequel to the second part and Extreme Condition. Events take place on the snowy planet E.D.N. III.

item.title: Saints Row 4
item.description: Game Description Saints Row 4 is a crazy third-person action game that allows you to play online with a friend for free as a pirate. Online multiplayer competitions are available. The action takes place in a simulation of Steelport. The saints reach a new level, becoming leaders of the state, and the protagonist sits in the chair of the president. However, the Earth is attacked by aliens led by the evil Zinyak.

item.title: Skullgirls 2nd Encore
item.description: Game Description InSkullgirls 2nd Encore you can play online with a friend on a pirate, fighting online online or competing on the same PC. The definitive second edition includes all the extras and heroines, of which there are 14, for free. A single story mode, training, challenges and the possibility of free online play for two or championships with random people from all over the world are presented. Events take place in the bright and unusual world of Dark Deco.

item.title: Sir You Are Being Hunted
item.description: Game Description Sir, You Are Being Hunted is a first-person survival game designed for cooperative play with a friend or giving the opportunity to play online with random participants. On the pirate Sir You Are Being Hunted, you can fight for free in different network modes by connecting online via the Internet. The setting is designed in an aristocratic steampunk style. Sir, You Are Being Hunted gives you complete freedom of action, offering you to explore a huge sandbox world where you will need to use stealth skills and shoot accurately.

item.title: Space Hulk
item.description: Game Description Space Hulk is a co-op action game set in the Warhammer 40,000 universe. You can play the pirate Space Hulk online with a friend, going through the story campaign online for free. The main characters are the Space Marines. Network play allows each participant to take control of one of the warriors in order to go to various gloomy locations where they will need to destroy crowds of monsters.

item.title: Worms Clan Wars
item.description: Game Description On the pirate version ofWorms Clan Wars you can play online for free with a friend or fight both locally and online with other players. The Worms network game includes a huge number of worms, many unique landscapes, detailed locations, a wide selection of weapons, an expanded personalization menu and much other content. The possibility of free online play in Worms Clan Wars allows you to assemble your own team of worms: you can name clans, develop a unique emblem, distribute titles to squad members, determine leaders by general voting, and much more.

item.title: Europa Universalis 4
item.description: Game Description InEuropa Universalis 4 you can play online with a friend, and also fight online with random people on the Internet, using all the multiplayer features on the pirate for free. The gameplay is a global strategy, the events of which start from the late Middle Ages and end with the Modern Age. The online game allows you to take part in the Battle of Varna and witness the death of Napoleon.

item.title: Europa Universalis 4
item.description: Game Description A new part of the real-time strategyEuropa Universalis 4, the multiplayer mode of which allows up to 32 people to play on one server. Based on the previous parts, we can say that there are no more spies in the game, since they upset the overall balance of the game. The magistrate system has also changed greatly as the city’s development has undergone significant changes. The trading system has improved the most.

item.title: Hammerwatch
item.description: Game Description The top-down adventureHammerwatch gives you the opportunity to join forces with a friend or random people online for free on a pirate. You can play online or use local co-op, going through the storyline on one device. Alone or using the free online play option, you need to destroy hordes of monsters over the course of four chapters. Each environment contains unique biomes, traps, secrets, puzzles and enemies.

item.title: PayDay 2
item.description: Game Description PayDay 2 is a first-person cooperative action game aimed at playing together with a friend. You can play pirate for free online or play in a team with other participants online online. The project is a robbery simulator. Network play allows four players to join forces, where each will take on a specific role in the team. Using the opportunity of a free online game, the server owner selects a task.

item.title: Papers, Please
item.description: Game Description The fictional country of Arstotzka is a small world of the game’s protagonist, where he will check documents at customs every day. The plot ofPapers, Please - a puzzle game with an unusual approach and graphics, as well as the beginning of the simulator - shows the events with the main character winning the profession of a customs officer at a checkpoint in the lottery. His task will be to check documents and apply stamps.

item.title: Spelunky
item.description: Game Description On the pirateSpelunky you can play online with a friend, completing the story campaign for free or competing in procedurally generated locations. A cooperative playthrough is available online on the Internet, in which players take on the role of adventurers. They must explore various dungeons, collecting treasures and rescuing damsels in distress. The main goal is to collect as much gold as possible. It is very important to prevent the death of the protagonist by any means, otherwise you will need to start all over again.

item.title: Divinity: Dragon Commander
item.description: Game Description Divinity: Dragon Commander is a fantasy strategy designed for cooperative play on the Internet online, or confrontation. You are allowed to play online for free on a pirate with a friend, fighting together against other participants or competing with each other. A single player campaign and online play are presented. The gameplay combines elements of real-time strategy and TBS mechanics. Depending on the actions performed, the gameplay switches to different control modes.

item.title: Skulls of the Shogun
item.description: Game Description Skulls of the Shogun is an arcade strategy game that you can play online with a friend for free, fighting on a pirate ship against other dead shoguns. Players choose their fighter to fight each other over the Internet online. Local battles available. The gameplay invites you to engage in battle in turn-based battles. There is a limited turn time, so you need to perform actions as quickly as possible.

item.title: CastleStorm
item.description: Game Description InCastleStorm an amazing world was created in 2D format, where you can play online with a friend on a pirate, as well as play solo. The focus is on the confrontation between knights and Vikings, and users have the chance to directly participate in this event. So, gamers can choose their favorite side and enter the battle online online. At the same time, it supports the option of both multiplayer (on opposite sides of the conflict) and co-op, when session participants take one side.

item.title: Magic: The Gathering - Duels of the Planeswalkers 2014
item.description: Game Description Magic: The Gathering - Duels of the Planeswalkers 2014 is a card game aimed at PvE and PvP competition with players around the world. You can play pirated games online for free, participating in multiplayer confrontations online or competing with a friend in versus mode. Online play allows you to take on the role of a sorcerer. As you build your deck, you can summon creatures and cast spells.

item.title: Company of Heroes 2
item.description: Game Description Company of Heroes 2 gives you the opportunity to play online with a friend, fighting for free on a pirate with one of the presented factions, including the Soviets, the forces of the Wehrmacht, Britain, the High Command West and the US Army. On the Internet online you need to take control of one of their armies in order to destroy the enemy army. The gameplay of Company of Heroes 2 is a real-time strategy game inspired by the events of World War II.

item.title: Company of Heroes 2
item.description: Game Description The events ofCompany of Heroes 2 unfold before us in snowy Norilsk, where one of the largest Stalinist Gulags is located. NKVD officer Churkin comes here, who understands that he will not survive the next Stalinist purge of officers. In the Gulag he finds his comrade from the front, who is serving his sentence and preparing to be shot. Isakovich is the name of the character, he wrote a tome with the real actions of the commanders of the Red Army, for which he was sentenced to death.

item.title: Gunpoint
item.description: Game Description Gunpoint takes the user to the near future, where many interesting spy things have been invented. Richard Conway works as a spy for hire, performing a variety of tasks. One day he gets a special copy - hyperpants. This item of clothing helps you jump over huge distances, and also help you fall from a height without harm to your health. The protagonist receives a new task - to investigate the murder of an employee of a weapons company.

item.title: Don't Starve
item.description: Game Description Don’t Starve is an adventure arcade game in the action strategy genre with crafting elements. This game is an interesting survival simulator with a complete open game world. The plot tells us about the main character who was sailing on a ship and was shipwrecked. He woke up on an abandoned island. You will travel a lot through beautiful locations that were drawn by hand. Let’s begin to explore previously unknown living creatures and the remains of bygone times.

item.title: Monaco What's Yours Is Mine
item.description: Game Description Monaco What’s Yours Is Mine is a cooperative heist game that allows you to compete online, play with bots or with a friend. You can gather your own team of thieves to play pirates online against a team of opponents. While one opposing party is trying to hack all the devices in the location in order to get treasures and loot, the second group is trying to track down the criminals.

item.title: God Mode
item.description: Game Description God Mode is a cooperative shooter and action game that allows you to play with a friend online (including on a pirate). Gamers can jointly destroy monsters online online. The project uses a third-person view. In this case, the camera hangs over the character’s shoulder. God Mode emulates old school jokesters. Here you need to shoot crowds of enemies in arena locations. An individual or a group of users will not be allowed to proceed further until all opponents are destroyed.

item.title: Sacred Citadel
item.description: Game Description Sacred Citadel is a spin-off of the series of the same name, made in beat-em-up style. On the pirate Sacred Citadel, you can play online for free with a friend, going through the story campaign in co-op. You can walk through it on one screen and connect via the Internet online. Events take place in the world of Ancaria. It is necessary to join the fight against the Ash Empire, fighting the Grimmock orcs, seraphs and other minions for.

item.title: Starsed Pilgrim
item.description: Game Description Starsed Pilgrim puts a player in the role of a gardener in the void. This figure takes care of the silent space, planting seeds that create structures from color and sound. Each new sprout contributes to the composition that fills the abyss and transforming it with a direct action. The character moves through these new platforms, continuing the process of nurturing. The constantly spreading darkness serves as a motivation for this continuous creation, pushing the gardener to the construction of a new world away from its reach.

item.title: Age of Empires 2
item.description: Game Description Age of Empires 2 is a real-time strategy that allows you to play online with a friend, organizing battles with the participation of a huge number of troops. An online Internet connection is available on the pirate site. All addons and additions are included for free. Age of Empires 2: Age of Kings tells about events developing during the Middle Ages. The plot begins with the fall of the Roman Empire and ends with the Renaissance.

item.title: Age of Empires 2
item.description: Game Description Age of Empires 2 is a re-release of the classic real-time strategy game with many different improvements. Many years later, this game still remains unique and serves as an example for many strategy developers to follow. In the game, the player will have to take control of a small settlement of a certain faction and lead it to victory and prosperity. Events take place in the Middle Ages, roughly starting from the fall of the Roman Empire and up to the Renaissance.

item.title: Ms Splosion Man
item.description: Game Description Ms Splosion Man is a platformer that gives you the opportunity to play online online, cooperating with a friend on a pirate game. You can go through the campaign alone or play online for free, competing with each other or overcoming numerous obstacles together. The gameplay stands out for its total madness and vibrant visual style. The second player takes on the character from the original game - Solid Man, while the main character of the sequel is his female version.

item.title: Cities in Motion 2: The Modern Days
item.description: Game Description Cities in Motion 2: The Modern Days provides the opportunity to play for free as a pirate online with a friend, competing online on the Internet, or developing transport routes alone. The main difference between City in Movement 2 compared to the original is the network game, which is absent in the original simulator. The gameplay allows you to plan routes, build transport junctions, manage networks, create schedules, etc.

item.title: BioShock Infinite
item.description: Game Description BioShock Infinite is a first-person shooter with multiple mechanics of a role-playing adventure in the style of science fiction and steampunk. The game will take place in 1912 in an alternative universe, in the flying city of the United States of America - Columbia. You need to control the private detective Booker Devitt, who has a task to find a cute girl named Elizabeth. Immediately after it is found, the main characters find themselves in the very epicenter of the war.

item.title: Resident Evil 6
item.description: Game Description The pirate version ofResident Evil 6 has 4 unique campaigns available that you can play for free online with a friend. The joint line can be accessed online via the Internet. Events take place 15 years after the destruction of Raccoon City. The online game offers scenarios such as Leon and Helena, Chris and Pierce, Jake and Sherry, as well as Ada Wong and the nameless mercenary. Each storyline will introduce you to new heroes and opponents.

item.title: Sniper: Ghost Warrior 2
item.description: Game Description Sniper: Ghost Warrior 2 offers free online pirate play alone or with a friend. Co-op mode is only available with AI, but versus matches can be played online online. Sniper: Ghost Warrior 2 gives you the opportunity to take on players around the world. Not only is there online play, but also a single-player mode that tells the story of Cole Anderson. He is a private security consultant for the Delta Force Sniper organization.

item.title: The Showdown Effect
item.description: Game Description On the pirateThe Showdown Effect you can play online for free, competing with a friend or random participants from all over the world online online. Previously, the project was called Project JFK. The gameplay is 2.5D action, reminiscent of the action films of the 80s and 90s. Multiplayer allows you to choose one of eight characters. Each of the heroes has its own unique abilities. The protagonists represent different countries.

item.title: Tomb Raider
item.description: Game Description Tomb Raider tells about the adventures of the iconic heroine Lara Croft. The protagonist is a tomb raider and an experienced archaeologist. The pirate site offers the opportunity to play online with a friend for free. Online confrontations are available on the Internet in different multiplayer modes. The project is a restart of the franchise. Gameplay consists of exploring vast locations, fighting enemies and solving puzzles. It takes up to 15 hours of real time to complete the story campaign.

item.title: Tomb Raider
item.description: Game Description Tomb Raider is a restart of the series telling about the adventures of Lara Croft. The ship on which the girl’s crew was sailing was wrecked. On the island she is captured and left tied in a cave. The adventurer frees herself from her bonds and goes to look for the crew members. The player can choose the difficulty, which affects the course of battles. A vast world opens up before the gamer, divided into several locations.

item.title: Sniper Elite: Nazi Zombie Army
item.description: Game Description The pirate version ofSniper Elite: Nazi Zombie Army allows you to play online with a friend, fighting for free in various multiplayer modes. The network game is available online online. The cooperative is designed for four people. The opportunity to play free online games includes playing 5 unique missions together. In co-op mode, the kill cam is disabled and zombie dismemberment is slightly reduced. The gameplay is a first-person shooter that tells an alternate history of World War II.

item.title: Brutal Legend
item.description: Game Description In addition to the ability to play online with a friend on a pirate,Brutal Legend takes the user into an open world where its own special atmosphere is created. It combines demonic worlds, a dynamic combat system and heavy rock. The last aspect is realized through the main character, who is one of the best organizers of rock concerts. At one point, after a strange incident on the eve of the show, he finds himself in a parallel world, where he encounters demonic creatures.

item.title: Dead Space 3
item.description: Game Description Dead Space 3 is a continuation of the sci-fi horror game, which you can play online with a friend for free on a pirate account, going through the story campaign together on the Internet online. Cooperative playthrough is the main difference between the third part and its predecessors. Dead Space 3 allows for interaction between participants, unlocks the ability to crouch, and allows you to hide behind cover. Network play, due to cooperative mechanics, increases the intensity and dynamics of shootings several times.

item.title: Sonic and All-Stars Racing Transformed Collection
item.description: Game Description Sonic and All Stars Racing Transformed Collection is a racing arcade game in the Sonic setting, allowing you to play online with a friend or random participants, competing in a variety of multiplayer modes. All 33 characters are available for free on Pirate. The heroes represent both the franchise of the same name and characters from other franchises, such as Shinobi, Football Manager, Shenmue, Total War: Rome II, etc.

item.title: Primordia
item.description: Game Description The whole world in the game Primordia is mired in devastation and chaos after nuclear apocalypse. Everything around is gloomy, gray and lifeless, like the whole planet as a whole. In the computer application, topics of religion, freedom, justice and laws are raised. The protagonist Horatio The Human Blessed is a mechanic-engineer, a leading hermit lifestyle. The robot wears a black cloak with a dense hood, and his only friend of Crispin, a small flying saucer, constantly funny all around, sometimes bending the stick.

item.title: Far Cry 3
item.description: Game Description The first-person shooter -Far Cry 3 - will teach you how to survive in the wild conditions of the open world, more or less value relationships with good people, and show you what real madness is. The series rewarded us with enough action, showing that a huge arsenal of weapons is just part of what can be given to players in return for their desire to enjoy a completely open world and a good story.

item.title: Far Cry 3
item.description: Game Description On the pirateFar Cry 3 you can play online for free with a friend, taking part online in competitive and cooperative modes. Not only is there the possibility of free online play, but also a single-player campaign for Jason Brody. He is an American who was captured by the mad pirate Vaas Montenegro. He needs to escape from the tropical island and find his friends. Far Land 3 multiplayer includes the following modes: Reviving - you can revive your partners; Battlecry - allies receive additional boosts when activating the ability; Scouting - battle with a minimap on which enemies are displayed; Psyche Gas - competitions using gas and friend fire; Battle Bomb - an opportunity to carry out an airstrike; End of Match Scenes - a confrontation in which you can open the final scene.

item.title: Super Hexagon
item.description: Game Description Super Hexagon does not contain any plot. This is a dynamic arcade game with a top view. From the outside it looks like an endless game. But in fact, it can be passed. It will not be easy to reach the end, since the title is very hardcore. The project uses a minimalistic visual style. The gameplay is about survival in the arena. In Super Hexagon it is hexagonal in shape.

item.title: Call Of Duty: Black Ops 2
item.description: Game Description On the pirated version ofCall Of Duty: Black Ops 2 you can play online for free with a friend, competing in various multiplayer modes online online. The multiplayer game features confrontations in the world of the future. The year is 2025, so multiplayer allows you to use a variety of advanced and futuristic weapons. Each participant can choose the firing mode for their weapon: single shots, short or long bursts.

item.title: Emergency 2013
item.description: Game Description Emergency 2013 is a rescue simulator that offers the opportunity to play online with a friend, using the free co-op option on a pirate. The online confrontation mode is available on the Internet. Allows you to take control of the command of paramedics, fire brigade, police and rescuers. Each faction has its own unique tasks, units, equipment, tools and much more. Network play allows you, together with your partners, to eliminate various emergencies and natural disasters.

item.title: Painkiller: Hell and Damnation
item.description: Game Description Painkiller: Hell and Damnation is presented with the opportunity to play online with a friend, fighting on a pirate for free in duel matches, or online online participating in confrontations with players around the world. Single player campaign and online play available. Events take place after the end of the Overdose expansion. The main character of the adventure is Daniel Garner. He is the simultaneous embodiment of the Gifts of Light and the Curse of Darkness.

item.title: Natural Selection 2
item.description: Game Description Natural Selection 2 is a first-person shooter with strategy elements that allows you to play as a pirate for free online with a friend, going through a story campaign together online on the Internet or fighting in a confrontation. Before starting the adventure, you can undergo training that introduces you to the basics and mechanics of the game. After the tutorial, both online play and a story campaign are available.

item.title: Hotline Miami
item.description: Game Description Hotline Miami is a 2D top-down action game created by two incredibly hardworking and talented young people under the auspices of the same computer game development studio - Dennaton Games. The international release of this project took place in October 2012. The developers admitted that they took their inspiration from the Hollywood crime action films of the 80s. The game, as the name implies, takes place in the city of Miami, in the first half of the 80s.

item.title: Euro Truck Simulator 2
item.description: Game Description You can playEuro Truck Simulator 2 online with a friend, alone, or with random people online online. The pirate version offers Speed ​​Mode and Simulation for free. Each of them has its own characteristics and subtleties in driving a truck. The truck driver simulator allows you to transport numerous cargoes on the roads of Great Britain, Belgium, Germany, Italy, the Netherlands and Poland. The gameplay has a huge emphasis on realistic driving: driving onto the main road, signaling with headlights, allowing other cars to pass, participating in traffic jams, reducing speed due to the provided road signs, etc.

item.title: Euro Truck Simulator 2
item.description: Game Description The basis ofEuro Truck Simulator 2 is permanent contracts that will be stolen from under your nose by more experienced players controlled by artificial intelligence. Long routes to the capital of Germany, the Netherlands, England, France and Belgium are your main route when traveling with dangerous or simply expensive cargo. The main task of the driver is to deliver on time, deliver in good condition and not get caught with a fine.

item.title: Rocketbirds: Hardboiled Chicken
item.description: Game Description On the pirate gameRocketbirds: Hardboiled Chicken you can play online with a friend for free, competing with each other in confrontation modes or online online, going through the story campaign together. The main characters are anthropomorphic creatures. Single player campaign, online play and co-op are available. The plot suggests that the warbirds end the power of the penguin. Evil creatures have created a real dictatorship. Key mechanics and features: single and co-op play; rescuing the general’s daughter; destroying countless penguins; 15-chapter campaign; a huge number of weapons and puzzles; co-op mode with 10 missions; 6 feathered heroes with their own characteristics; many mini- stories and cinematic cutscenes; soundtrack from New World Revolution.

item.title: XCOM: Enemy Unknown
item.description: Game Description XCOM: Enemy Unknown is a classic of its genre and is great for playing online with a friend as a pirate. According to the plot, the Earth has been subjected to an alien invasion, and different parts of the planet are captured by enemies. To counter the threat, an elite squad from the XCOM organization falls under the control of users. The fighters of this unit are equipped with the latest types of weapons and uniforms, due to which they can give a worthy rebuff to enemies.

item.title: Worms Revolution
item.description: Game Description Worms Revolution - turn-based strategy with the ability to compete online on the Internet. You can play pirate online with a friend in co-op or fight on interactive maps in a confrontation. All network modes, guns, equipment, characters and locations are provided for free. The gameplay is a two-dimensional platformer where battle worms fight among themselves. Maps are susceptible to terraforming, as the explosion leaves craters and depressions. Using the opportunity of free online play, you can confront a common enemy or compete in duel matches.

item.title: Castle Crashers
item.description: Game Description InCastle Crashers you can play online with a friend, going through the story campaign together, or you can overcome various challenges online online. The gameplay is a two-dimensional beat-em-up, which centers on brave knights trying to resist an evil sorcerer. The pirate site offers a wide selection of weapons and a huge list of spells for free. Multiplayer features dynamic difficulty, increasing the strength and aggressiveness of enemies with each new level.

item.title: Castle Crashers
item.description: Game Description Castle Crashers is an arcade action game in which players will take control of powerful characters and fight monsters. Create a squad by choosing from 25 characters to fight your way through castles against your enemies. Compete with other users or monsters living throughout the continent. The plot will unfold at a ball in the king’s castle. During the fun, an evil sorcerer stole a precious magic stone and four princesses, who must be rescued by the knights and fight the enemy.

item.title: Borderlands 2
item.description: Game Description Borderlands 2 can be played online with a friend in splitscreen mode. Using an Internet connection online, a co-op for four is available for free on the pirate site. The gameplay is presented as a first-person shooter, aimed at looting and leveling up. There are 6 characters to choose from. Everyone has a personal skill set, personality, and background. Once in the open world, you need to go to the notice board to get to work.

item.title: Borderlands 2
item.description: Game Description Borderlands 2 is a shooter with a view from the perspective of the protagonist and leveling up abilities and passive improvements, as in the role-playing adventure genre. A direct continuation of the story of the original game. The main differences from the first part are a greater emphasis on the plot component and the addition of a more advanced weapon editor with many possible modifications that open up as you progress.

item.title: Torchlight 2
item.description: Game Description Torchlight 2 allows you to play online with a friend, teaming up to play through the story campaign together. Up to six people can play on Pirate for free. The game is available via the Internet online and local connection. The more participants join the adventure, the more enemies there will be on the screen. The plot tells the story of the town of Torchlight. Here, the ancient dragon Ordrak became a source of corruption, but he was defeated by three heroes: the Destroyer, the Alchemist and the Victorious.

item.title: FTL: Faster Than Light
item.description: Game Description FTL: Faster Than Light - this project is a two-dimensional simulator of a space combat ship. The creation and publication of this media product was carried out by the Subset Games studio. The official release took place in the first half of autumn 2012. The gameplay is based on the interaction between the player and the crew of the combat starship. The success of this space tactical strategy will depend on how successful this cooperation is.

item.title: Batman: Arkham City
item.description: Game Description Batman: Arkham City is an action-adventure game with a third-person view, based on one of the most popular heroes of comics, cartoons, films and toys, Batman. This project is an expanded edition of the original game. The media product was developed by Rocksteady Studios. The official release took place in early autumn 2012. The game world is five times larger in area than in the previous Batman: Arkham Asylum.

item.title: Dark Souls Prepare to Die Edition
item.description: Game Description InDark Souls Prepare to Die Edition you can play online for free as a pirate, team up with a friend, or invade other people’s worlds using an online connection. The role-playing adventure allows you to go into a world where you have to collect Dark Souls, fighting various monsters and incredibly strong enemies. Each enemy poses a serious threat and requires an individual approach. Events take place in the kingdom of Lordan.

item.title: Tower Wars
item.description: Game Description Tower Wars is a crossover of such genres as tower defense and real-time strategy. The gameplay is aimed at confrontations over the Internet online. For free, you can fight with a friend or play online with other players from all over the world. The events of Tower Wars take place in the world of the Middle Ages. Having gotten involved in a military conflict, you need to destroy all enemies in your path.

item.title: Iron Brigade
item.description: Game Description On the pirateIron Brigade you can play for free online with a friend, controlling combat mechs and fighting each other online online. Game mechanics contain elements of action, strategy and tower defense. The free-to-play feature allows you to team up with your teammates to protect humanity from the alien threat Monovision. Participants take control of mobile combat vehicles, which are equipped with advanced weapons and technology. It is important to think through tactics and develop a strategy to turn the tide of the fight in your favor.

item.title: Death Rally 2012
item.description: Game Description Death Rally 2012 can be played online, competing with a friend or random people online or locally. All online functions are available for free on the pirate site, including the deathmatch mode, where each player fights for himself. The gameplay is an intense competition involving a variety of vehicles and various weapons. You can upgrade vehicles, buy guns and fight bosses in story mode.
