The possibility of a free online game is aimed at confrontations between people from different parts of the planet.

item.title: Awesomenauts
item.description: Game Description Awesomenauts is a two-dimensional MOBA that allows you to play together with a friend online, fighting for free on a pirate in confrontations both on one device and online online. You can play cooperatively or participate in competitions. The possibility of free online play allows you to take part in dynamic 3 on 3 multiplayer matches. The plot revolves around an interstellar conflict in which robots fight among themselves.

item.title: Orcs Must Die 2
item.description: Game Description Orcs Must Die 2 is a third-person cooperative action game aimed at playing online with a friend. LAN connection and online Internet connection are available. Allows you to go through the campaign together on a pirate, using all network functions for free. There are two main characters - a battle mage and an agile sorceress. Each hero has his own skills and abilities. The protagonists will have to defend their fortress and guard the mines, preventing orcs and other monsters from entering human possessions.

item.title: Inversion
item.description: Game Description InInversion you can play online with a friend on a pirate for free, going through a story campaign together on the Internet online. The gameplay is a third-person shooter, the main character of which is a cop named Davis Russell. He and his partner decide to celebrate their daughter’s birthday. At this moment, unknown invaders appear. They use gravity weapons to fight people. The main character’s wife dies and his daughter is kidnapped.

item.title: Spec Ops The Line
item.description: Game Description Spec Ops The Line is a first-person shooter that allows you to play online with a friend in co-op, or fight for free on a pirate game using an online Internet connection. You will have to fight a huge number of enemies in the vastness of Dubai, playing as members of the Delta squad or taking over the leadership of the fighters of the Curse group. The latter report to Colonel Conrad.

item.title: LEGO Batman 2 DC Super Heroes
item.description: Game Description On the piratedLEGO Batman 2 DC Super Heroes you can play online for free, taking control of one of the characters from the Batman and DC-comics universes with a friend. Network play is available locally and online online. The plot follows billionaire Bruce Wayne against the villain Lex Luther. The possibility of free online play allows you to control Batman and his partner Robin. The adventure starts at Arkham Asylum.

item.title: Sins of a Solar Empire: Rebellion
item.description: Game Description In the space strategySins of a Solar Empire: Rebellion you can play online with a friend on a pirate, fighting for free in various multiplayer modes. You can compete online or locally. Events develop in three dimensions. The possibility of free online play provides a choice of maps with unique features. Participants are required to build infrastructure, extract resources, set up production, develop technologies and much more. The gameplay of Sins of a Solar Empire is divided into two components: global control and local play.

item.title: Max Payne 3
item.description: Game Description The pirate version ofMax Payne 3 offers the opportunity to compete online for free, adding multiplayer to the single-player campaign. You can play online with a friend or participate in confrontations with other players. Multiplayer carries over all the gameplay aspects from the single player mode, allowing the shootouts to look cinematic. The possibility of free online play includes confrontation in various modes that understand the themes of paranoia, betrayal and heroism.

item.title: Iron Front: Liberation 1944
item.description: Game Description Iron Front: Liberation 1944 is a tactical shooter that allows you to play online with a friend and compete with random people from all over the world. Iron Front: Liberation 1944 covers the events of World War II, taking combatants to the Eastern Front. The online game is dedicated to the confrontation between German and Soviet troops. It takes about 10 hours of real time to complete the storyline.

item.title: Stronghold 3
item.description: Game Description Stronghold 3 is a strategy game that allows you to play online, fighting with a friend or other players. All multiplayer modes are included for free on the pirate site. In the third part of the series, an improved system for building castles was introduced, and new types of crafts were added. The network game is designed for co-op and confrontation. A new weather system has been added and additional modes have been included, such as night sieges.

item.title: Sonic the Hedgehog 4: Episode 2
item.description: Game Description Sonic the Hedgehog 4: Episode 2 is a continuation of the game of the same name, which provides the opportunity to play online with a friend for free as a pirate. You can compete locally or online online. The plot once again tells about Dr. Eggman building a base on the Little Planet, where he joins forces with Metal Sonic. The online game offers you to take control of a blue hedgehog or Tails in order to, together with your partner, confront the villain.

item.title: Binary Domain
item.description: Game Description On the pirateBinary Domain you can team up with a friend to play online for free, fighting various enemies online online. The enemies are soldiers, robots, androids, turrets, etc. Online play allows you to take part in dynamic confrontations with different people around the world. Events are transferred to Tokyo of the future, namely in 2080. Dan Marshall and his team go on a secret operation to reprogram the robot society that has begun to infiltrate human life.

item.title: The Walking Dead: Season One
item.description: Game Description The Walking Dead: Season One is an interactive story divided into 6 episodes with elements of a point-n-click adventure and with QTEs in action scenes, telling the story of Lee Everett, a prisoner who was being transported in a police station when the zombie apocalypse began. car to another place of serving his sentence, but due to an attack on the vehicle by the dead, he managed to escape.

item.title: Blades of Time
item.description: Game Description In the pirate gameBlades of Time, players can join forces, fighting together against hordes of enemies online online. Together with a friend, you can go through the story campaign with a friend. Free multiplayer mode and Dismal Swamp add-on included. The gameplay is a third-person slasher game. The main character is a girl named Ayumi. The online game allows you to become her partner - a mighty strongman nicknamed Zero.

item.title: Crusader Kings 2
item.description: Game Description The global strategyCrusader Kings 2 can be played online as a pirate, fighting for free with a friend in various multiplayer confrontations. On the Internet online it is possible to participate in versus battles, or to fight in a cooperative against a common enemy. The gameplay is represented by a tactical pause mode. The online game simulates feudal relationships between the countries of medieval Europe and the Middle East.

item.title: The Darkness 2
item.description: Game Description The Darkness 2 is a first-person shooter that can be played either alone or online, teaming up with a friend or players from all over the world. To play online for free on a pirate, you need to select a mode called Vendetta. It includes 2 types of competitions: Co-op and Blacklist. The free multiplayer option includes solo playthrough of missions, but in this case some tasks are blocked.

item.title: Shank 2
item.description: Game Description Shank 2 allows you to fight against computer opponents together with a friend online. You can play this pirate game online with a friend. There is also content for fans of single play. There is a story campaign of 7 missions. Like its predecessor, Shank 2 belongs to the Beat ‘em up and Action genres. The possibility of free online play in this project is designed for two people.

item.title: Insane 2
item.description: Game Description Insane 2 offers you to take part in joint races over the Internet online. On the pirate Insane 2, you can play online with a friend for free or compete with random people from all over the world. Multiplayer includes 9 unique modes, including Capture the Flag, Gate Hunt and Pathfinder. Players can also take part in competitions such as Bonus Hunt, Territory Control, Helicopter Chase and many other competitions.

item.title: LEGO Harry Potter Years 5-7
item.description: Game Description LEGO Harry Potter Years 5-7 - an arcade game with the ability to play for free online with a friend, controlling the characters of the famous film franchise. Multiplayer is available locally and online, offering key scenes from the final three films in the franchise: Order of the Phoenix, Half-Blood Prince and Deathly Hallows. The visual side is made in the style of Lego toys. The main action of Lego Harry Potter takes place in Hogwarts castle.

item.title: Earth Defense Force: Insect Armageddon
item.description: Game Description Earth Defense Force: Insect Armageddon is an arcade third-person shooter that allows you to participate in single-player battles and multiplayer battles online over the Internet. Moreover, even on a pirated game it is possible to play online with a friend. The product is made in a sci-fi setting. The possibility of free online play adds replayability to the project. Earth Defense Force: Insect Armageddon takes place in New Detroit.

item.title: Serious Sam 3 BFE
item.description: Game Description Serious Sam 3 BFE is a first-person shooter that allows you to compete with a friend on a pirate, or play for free online with other players. A LAN connection is available and there is the ability to fight online over the Internet. Cool Sam 3 is presented in a single-player mode, where you have to fight otherworldly evil spirits, controlling a powerful demon slayer with a huge cannon at the ready.

item.title: Saints Row: The Third
item.description: Game Description Saints Row: The Third is a third-person action game in an open world, the plot of which can be completed with a friend using an online Internet connection. All network capabilities of the project are available for free on the pirate site. If you play online with a partner, you will need to explore the city of Stillwater. The Saints became a real brand, and Johnny Gat gained the status of a cupmaster.

item.title: Saints Row: The Third
item.description: Game Description The Third Street Saints are a large and large group in the universe of the gameSaints Row: The Third. The third-person shooter with its crazy plots gave the game’s heroes their own brand of sneakers, a carbonated drink and a logo, and now they have to fight the world’s largest crime syndicate, whose people are scattered around the world and do their work in the “shadows”. Since the main characters have long captured Stillwater, the Syndicate demands offerings from them in the form of tribute for the criminal leadership.

item.title: The Elder Scrolls 5: Skyrim
item.description: Game Description The Elder Scrolls 5: Skyrim is rightfully considered a legendary game. Even now, many years after its release, it continues to conquer new users who come to it based on recommendations or out of their own interest. In the role of a warrior named Dovahkiin, the gamer will find himself in a huge world full of mysteries, unexpected turns and battles. Here it is not possible to follow the path of a straightforward passage.

item.title: CastleMiner Z
item.description: Game Description CastleMiner Z is an open world project that is great for playing online with a friend as a pirate. Here, players are thrown onto a map made in the Minecraft setting, where all objects, biomes and areas of the territory are made in an identical style. In addition, there are several options for spending time in accordance with one or another mode. Therefore, people can coordinate online online and have some real fun.

item.title: Call Of Duty Modern Warfare 3
item.description: Game Description Call Of Duty Modern Warfare 3 is a continuation of the cult shooter, which offers the opportunity to play online with a friend or compete in online confrontations over the Internet. All network capabilities and functions of the project are available for free on the pirate site. Both online play and a single-player campaign are available, the events of which develop in 2017 during the Third World War.

item.title: Lord of the Rings War in the North
item.description: Game Description Lord of the Rings War in the North is a role-playing game that allows you to go on a journey with other players online online, or a pirate can team up with a friend for free to confront common enemies. Up to three people can play online. The Lord of the Rings: War in the North takes place in the fictional world of Middle-earth. Each takes on the role of one of the franchise’s famous heroes.

item.title: To the Moon
item.description: Game Description To the Moon is a philosophical story about two doctors - Eva Rosalina and Neil Watts from the Sigmund organization. The heroes make a tragic journey through the memories of a dying man. In this way they are trying to fulfill his last will, the essence of which is to let the person live his life again. The dying person remembers the new life that he sees at death before leaving this world.

item.title: Battlefield 3
item.description: Game Description On the pirated version ofBattlefield 3 you can play online for free with a friend and take part in numerous online multiplayer competitions with players from all over the world. The possibility of free online play allows 64 participants to fight on one map. Having chosen a fighter of a certain class, you need to fight in one of the available modes. Depending on the match, the victory condition and mechanics change.

item.title: Renegade Ops
item.description: Game Description Renegade Ops is a top-down action game. It has online multiplayer and local co-op. On this pirate game you can play with a friend online. In the story, the heroes are trying to stop Inferno, who wants to dominate the whole world. He erased the face of the Earth from one of the megacities and settled in one of the poor countries. General Bryant sent his soldiers to him to get even with him.

item.title: Dungeon Defenders
item.description: Game Description Dungeon Defenders combines Action with RPG and Tower Defense elements. The title can be played online with a friend on pirate. This version allows you to do this online online. The project is designed for co-op, although it also has a single. The plot tells how young heroes save the fantasy country of Etheria from the forces of an awakened ancient evil. The campaign is divided into missions with different difficulty levels.

item.title: Dungeon Defenders
item.description: Game Description Dungeon Defenders is an interesting game that combines a huge number of different genres: action, strategy, role-playing, RPG. This game is initially designed for multiplayer connections. Before we start, we have to choose the most interesting character class, his equipment style and the color of the magic crystal. This item is the most vital for the hero; if its structure is disrupted, the character’s death may occur. There are many different types of improvements in the game: hero characteristics, crystals and passive abilities, and most importantly, basic combat spells.

item.title: The Cursed Crusade
item.description: Game Description The Cursed Crusade is an adventure with the ability to play online with a friend on a pirate, the events of which take place in 1198. You have to take control of the Templars in order to go together online via the Internet to the Fourth Crusade. Multiplayer allows participants to choose one of two characters: Denz de Bail and the mercenary Esteban Noviembre. The possibility of free online play allows you to go through the story in splitscreen mode.

item.title: RAGE
item.description: Game Description RAGE is a first-person shooter with rear-facing racing elements. In the project, you can run and drive through local post-apocalyptic spaces, either alone or with other users online. It’s also possible to play pirated games with a friend online. There is enough content in both single player and multiplayer. According to the plot, having learned about the approach of an asteroid to Earth, the governments of different countries created bunkers and placed selected representatives of humanity in anabiotic sleep.

item.title: Supreme Commander Forged Alliance
item.description: Game Description Supreme Commander Forged Alliance is a stand-alone add-on to the strategy of the same name, in which you can play online with a friend. For free, players can compete online on the pirate Supreme Commander Forged Alliance. The expansion introduced a new Seraphim faction, including 110 new units. Network play introduces additional modes for cooperative play and multiplayer confrontations. The plot begins two years after the creation of the Black Sun weapon.

item.title: The Binding of Isaac
item.description: Game Description The Binding of Isaac can be played for free online as a pirate with a friend, so that you can go through complex puzzles online together, performing the sacrifice of Isaac. The plot revolves around a young boy, Isaac, whose mother must prove her faith by making a sacrifice to God. Free online play includes co-op exploration of the basement, where you’ll encounter siblings and your own mother.

item.title: Worms Ultimate Mayhem
item.description: Game Description On the pirate version ofWorms Ultimate Mayhem all network functions are available for free, allowing you to play online with a friend on the same screen or fight online online with an army of other players. You can either join teams or fight in co-op against a common enemy. Worms: Slaughter offers to take control of an army of well-armed worms, whose goal is to destroy the enemy army.

item.title: Bunch of Heroes
item.description: Game Description Bunch of Heroes is a cooperative action game designed for online co-op playthroughs. The story centers on a team of elite fighters, The Bunch, defending the Earth from an alien invasion. On Pirate, you can play online with a friend or go through the story campaign in single player mode for free. Aliens control an army of zombies. The online game offers you to take control of one of four heroes: Agent Leah, Jared Joe, El Camarada or Captain Smith.

item.title: Rock Of Ages
item.description: Game Description Rock Of Ages not only gives you the opportunity to play online with a friend on a pirate, but also allows you to feel the effect of combining elements of different genres. Gamers will be able to travel through different time periods, encountering different historical figures. The idea is simple - destroy the enemy castle before the enemy himself goes on the offensive. The main weapon is a huge boulder, which must be aimed at enemy buildings.

item.title: Warhammer 40:000 Space Marine Anniversary Edition
item.description: Game Description On the pirateWarhammer 40:000 Space Marine you can play online for free with a friend, going through a rich story campaign together, or compete online online with players from all over the world. Warhammer: Space Marines is a fast-paced third-person shooter. You will play as the Ultramarines, fighting with futuristic guns and a variety of melee weapons. The online game Warhammer 40:000 Space Marine allows two teams of 8 people to fight.

item.title: Touhou shinreibyou ~ ten desires
item.description: Game Description Touhou shinreibyou ~ ten desires begins when strange divine perfumes begin to come from people, Yokaev and fairies. In response to this event, female protagonists of the game go to the other world, suggesting that it is the key to unraveling the phenomenon. The gameplay offers to lead the chosen heroine through a series of levels filled with flitches of shells from opponents. The task is to survive these attacks and destroy the entire opposition, completing the passage of the stage with the boss.

item.title: E.Y.E.: Divine Cybermancy
item.description: Game Description E.Y.E.: Divine Cybermancy offers the opportunity to play online with a friend or team up with up to four people to explore the oppressive cyberpunk world together for free on a pirate ship. Alone or together with partners online, you will need to engage in a battle for resources. Players must confront the powerful Federation. Each participant takes on the role of an agent of the armed secret society Secreta Secretorum.

item.title: Air Conflicts: Secret Wars
item.description: Game Description For free on the pirated version ofAir Conflicts: Secret Wars you can play online with a friend, controlling combat aircraft from the First and Second Wars. The gameplay combines arcade and simulator mechanics. Players can compete with each other online online or engage in battles locally by selecting a special splitscreen mode. Multiplayer allows up to four people to team up. Several multiplayer competitions are available, designed for duels or massive air battles.

item.title: Disney Pixar Cars 2: The Video Game
item.description: Game Description Disney Pixar Cars 2: The Video Game takes you on an exciting international spy adventure where you can play online with a friend. Based on the film of the same name, this fast-paced action game immerses you in the world of CHROME - the headquarters of intelligence operations and motorized espionage. You can jump into the shoes of popular characters like Lightning McQueen and Mater, or try out new heroes as you train to become top-notch spies.

item.title: Dungeon Siege 3
item.description: Game Description Dungeon Siege 3 can please fans of RPGs with multiplayer. On this pirate game you can play with a friend online. Moreover, both online online and together at one computer. You can also go through the story campaign alone. Character movements are controlled using the keyboard and mouse. Gamepads are also supported. The possibility of free online play is designed for co-op. Dungeon Siege III is very different from its predecessors.

item.title: FEAR 3
item.description: Game Description FEAR 3 is a first-person shooter with elements of survival horror, the storyline of which can be followed online on the Internet. You can play online with a friend or join forces with a random participant. The gameplay is distinguished by an improved cover system compared to previous parts. A free co-op mode has been added to the pirate game, allowing you to play as an Operative or Paxton Fetell with a friend.

item.title: Duke Nukem Forever
item.description: Game Description In addition to the dynamic and driving single-player mod,Duke Nukem Forever allows you to play online with a friend on a pirate in multiplayer. Here, as in other projects in the series, the main character is Duke Nukem. item.description: Game Description On the pirate titleHunted: The Demons Forge, you can play online co-op alone or with a friend, using all the multiplayer features for free. item.title: Terraria
item.description: Game Description Terraria is a two-dimensional adventure that you can play online with a friend, or fight against other participants online online. There are generated caves and many other locations to explore. Multiplayer allows you to go on an adventure with up to four people. Mechanics allow you to dig, fight, explore, build and much more.

item.title: Terraria
item.description: Game Description Terraria is a simulator of construction, life, survival, an interesting storyline and everything that could be combined into a game with the Sand Box style. Simple 8-bit graphics take us into a randomly generated world generated by the game itself. The open map is almost endless if you dig deep into the world, but you will be stopped by armies of monsters or underground knights. Terraria is not as simple as it seems.

item.title: The Witcher 2 Assassins of Kings
item.description: Game Description The computer game “The Witcher 2 Assassins of Kings” is an expanded limited edition of the impressive continuation of the 2008 giant of the world of role-playing video games “The Witcher”. The development of this project was carried out by the famous studio CD PROJEKT RED. The announcement came in May 2011. Geralt of Rivia is the greatest of the line of witchers, wielding a sword better than others, almost the only one who can resist the forces of darkness, while being something between an ordinary person and a monster.

item.title: Portal 2
item.description: Game Description Portal 2 is a first-person puzzle game in which you can solve puzzles with a friend using an online Internet connection. You can play Pirate online for free, using devices to create portals in space. With their help, you can instantly move from one place to another. There is a cooperative game, which makes it possible to go through the story campaign together. Events unfold immediately after the end of the previous part.

item.title: Portal 2
item.description: Game Description The first-person puzzle gamePortal 2 received an official announcement only in the spring of 2011, after several postponements. The game was developed by the legendary company Valve, which needs no introduction. The game’s plot continues the line begun in the first part of the “Portal” series. Key features of Dino D-Day: 7 types of dinosaurs: Velociraptor, Dilophosaurus, Desmatosuchus, Stygimolochus, Protoceratops Trigger, Tyrannosaurus Rex and Styracosaurus; 9 human characters; 26 types of weapons; phantasmagoric setting of World War II; multiplayer battles inspired by Team Fortress and Left 4 Dead.

The protagonists hunt for Albert Wesker and try to find out the truth about the deadly Ouroboros virus, which turns people into terrible monsters.

item.title: Dawn Of Magic 2
item.description: Game Description On the pirated version ofDawn of Magic 2 you can play online with a friend for free, going through the story campaign together online. The plot directly continues the original. Players will have to fight phantasmagorical creatures and enter into an unequal battle with the immortal Modo. The balance of power has been disrupted and the Legions of Shadows are eager to take over the world of the living.

item.title: Dusk-12 (Territory of Darkness)
item.description: Game Description Dusk-12 takes users to an epidemic-ridden town with a post-Soviet flavor, located somewhere in the Russian outback. This first-person shooter can be played either alone or online with a friend (including on a pirate). Multiplayer is only available online online. It offers old school gameplay. The project has not only the possibility of free online play, but also two single-player campaigns. They let you play as two characters. Each has its own storyline.

item.title: Wolfenstein (2009)
item.description: Game Description On the pirateWolfenstein (2009) you can play with a friend on the pirate for free online, fighting with one of three classes. On the Internet online you can play as one of three classes: soldier, engineer or medic. All heroes have their own unique abilities. For example, soldiers use explosives and heavy weapons, medics heal allies, and engineers construct buildings. The network game is aimed at dueling confrontations and battles between teams.

item.title: Touhou Searensen ~ undefined fantastic object
item.description: Game Description Touhou Searensen ~ Undefined Fantastic Object is a scroll-player in which the player controls the human character and uses shells to win the antagonists. Any contact with enemy bullets, lasers or opponents themselves leads to a loss of life. When the player’s reserve runs out, the game ends. All items on the screen are collected when moving the controlled character to the upper boundary of the location. Activation of the function of the slow movement attracts the nearest objects directly to the protagonist, helping in their collection during the battle.

item.title: Trine Enchanted Edition
item.description: Game Description Trine Enchanted Edition is an adventure platformer with puzzle elements that allows you to play online with a friend on a pirate for free. Each player can take control of one of three heroes. The network game is designed for 3 participants. Each character has unique abilities. You need to combine skills and help your teammates to overcome obstacles and solve spatial puzzles. Trine’s gameplay is entirely based on interaction with objects and physics.

item.title: Call of Juarez: Bound in Blood
item.description: Game Description Call of Juarez: Bound in Blood may appeal to fans of virtual westerns. You can play Pirate either alone or online with a friend. This first-person shooter has a class system, but it is only available when playing locally or online. There are 13 specializations in total - from trapper to sniper. In Russian localization the title is known as “Call of Juarez. Ties of Blood.” There are 2 playable characters in the story campaign.

item.title: Battlefield Heroes
item.description: Game Description The tactical shooterBattlefield Heroes allows you to play online with a friend on a pirate for free, participating online over the Internet in various cooperative matches and confrontation modes. The possibility of free online play offers competition on 11 interactive maps. Six of them act as infantry: Coastal Clash, Riverside Rush, Victory Village and others, as well as 5 locations with vehicles, for example Buccaneer Bay, Seaside Skirmish, etc.

item.title: Delta Force: Xtreme 2
item.description: Game Description Delta Force: Xtreme 2 is a tactical first-person shooter that you can play online with a friend for free on a pirate site. Online confrontation missions and cooperative tasks aimed at playing together are available. At the center of the story are the soldiers of the Delta special forces. The online game allows you to go through many military operations in Laos and Uzbekistan. 2 campaigns presented. Each has 10 unique missions.

item.title: Minecraft
item.description: Game Description Minecraft is a cubic sandbox aimed at playing for free online with a friend. On the pirate site, you can organize online competitions on the Internet or join forces to build your own kingdom together. Free online play in Minecraft allows you to communicate with your teammates as you explore a procedurally generated world together. Network play is available locally or in split-screen mode. The gameplay is represented by three modes: survival, hardcore and creativity.

item.title: Killing Floor
item.description: Game Description Killing Floor 2 is a cooperative shooter that offers the opportunity to play online as a pirate with a friend, competing for free in various confrontation modes or participating in cooperative matches online online. The online game is divided into two components: Survival and Versus. All competitions offer matches with unique mechanics. Also available in Killing Floor 2 are various features for all competitions and various modifiers. In survival mode, six people find themselves in one huge arena, where they must destroy many ordinary enemies and a powerful boss.

item.title: Plants vs. Zombies GOTY Edition
item.description: Game Description Plants vs. Zombies became the game of the year, winning in many categories. The developers invite us to once again plunge into battles in a small location in order to free ourselves from the shackles of various zombies, hold back all the ardor of the monsters and save the city by using the latest technologies in the agricultural industry. Among the primary weapons in strategy, we have a pea shooter, a cherry bomb and sunflowers, which we use to earn money to purchase new strategic weapons.

item.title: Company of heroes Tales of Valor
item.description: Game Description Company of heroes Tales of Valor is an addition to the original game and still allows you to play online with a friend on a pirate. Here, users will have the opportunity to try out new campaigns with more features and challenges. Innovations include 3 new campaigns, 8 units and more detailed infantry management. Now, squads of soldiers are more dependent on supply points. In addition, the game now has a division into day and night, which also affects the tempo of the battle.

item.title: Total War EMPIRE Definitive Edition
item.description: Game Description Total War EMPIRE Definitive Edition allows you to play as a pirate online, fighting with players around the world, or participating in battles with a friend. The game is available online and has a full story mode. Total War EMPIRE Definitive Edition includes all special and additional content, added online play, as well as free updates. The gameplay is a mixture of RTS and TBS. With the help of a global map, government is governed.

item.title: Saints Row 2
item.description: Game Description Saints Row 2 is an open world action game that players can play together online on a pirate for free. On the Internet online you can not only compete, but also go through the story campaign with a friend. The main difference from the GTA series is that at the beginning everyone can customize their hero themselves, choosing gender, race, appearance and physique. During the game you can change the appearance of the character.

item.title: Left 4 Dead
item.description: Game Description Left 4 Dead is a multiplayer zombie shooter that allows you to play pirate games online with a friend, teaming up to four people online for free. The survivors fight against the horde of the Infected. Several campaigns are presented, consisting of several levels. The main task is to get to the evacuation zone. Between levels you need to barricade yourself in shelters to replenish your health and ammo.

item.title: Left 4 Dead 1
item.description: Game Description The first part ofLeft 4 Dead has 6 campaigns, several levels in each. The history and chronology of the chapters are interconnected, which will prevent the gamer from getting confused in the plot. At the beginning of each area, characters will appear at a checkpoint, where they can pick up weapons and ammunition and set off on their further journey. The United States of America has been gripped by an unknown virus that turns people into terrible monsters with bouts of aggression and rage.

item.title: Command and Conquer: Red Alert 3
item.description: Game Description Command and Conquer: Red Alert 3 introduces the opportunity to play online as a pirate with a friend, completing a joint story campaign for free. The gameplay is a real-time strategy game set during the Cold War. You can complete the campaign online online. In the case of a single playthrough, a computer partner is given as an ally. Network play allows you to jointly extract resources, build a base, train troops, develop technologies and destroy the enemy army.

item.title: Far Cry 2
item.description: Game Description On the pirateFar Cry 2 you can play online for free with a friend, fighting intense battles online online, or completing missions together. The gameplay is presented in an open world, allowing naraniki to go to any point in the location. The environment is distinguished by its interactivity. allowing you to interact with wildlife. You can board the transport at any time. Companions can use the free-to-play feature to not only take part in various online modes, but also complete story missions together.

item.title: Brothers in Arms Hells Highway
item.description: Game Description Brothers in Arms Hells Highway is a tactical shooter with the ability to play online online, controlling a soldier of the 101st Airborne Division. On Pirate you can play online for free with a friend, participating in various competitive modes. Brothers in Arms: Hell’s Highway takes you back to World War II. The online game also offers the opportunity to go through the battle known in history as the Dutch Operation together.

item.title: LEGO Batman: The Video Game
item.description: Game Description LEGO Batman: The Videogame offers a unique opportunity to play online and with a friend. This is an online game that allows you to enjoy the adventures of Gotham City for free and pirated. Enter an exciting world where you can fight online against the villains who have escaped from Arkham Asylum and, together with Batman and Robin, restore order in the city. Don’t miss your chance to immerse yourself in a quirky, action-packed adventure crafted from classic LEGO bricks and iconic DC Comics imagery, accessible to players of all ages.

item.title: Crysis Wars
item.description: Game Description Crysis Wars is a multiplayer spin-off of the original shooter Crisis. You can play online with a friend on pirate and compete for free in numerous online championships. The gameplay repeats the basic mechanics of the action game and retains all the capabilities of the suit, which participants can use for tactical purposes: become temporarily invulnerable, invisible, fast, etc. The main emphasis in Crysis Wars is on the possibility of free online play.

item.title: Stalker Clear Sky
item.description: Game Description InStalker Clear Sky you can play online with a friend using the cooperative mode, or go through the pirate campaign alone. Co-op play is available online online. STALKER: Clear Sky includes free improvements and additions that make the prequel Shadow of Chernobyl more diverse and balanced. Multiplayer allows you to go through the entire story campaign together. New territories were introduced: Red Forest, Limansk, Swamps, Abandoned Hospital and many others.

item.title: FlatOut: Ultimate Carnage
item.description: Game Description FlatOut: Ultimate Carnage is an arcade race for survival that allows you to play for free on a pirate online with a friend, participating in crazy races with total destruction of both the car and the environment. Network play is available locally and online online. The project acts as an expanded port of the second part, adding several new modes, such as carnage and time trial. Free online play allows you to take control of four new pilots: Lewis Durand, Lei Bing, Jill Richards and Curtis Wolfe.

item.title: Ubersoldier 2
item.description: Game Description Ubersoldier 2 allows you to play as a pirate and play with a friend online. This can only be done via the Internet online or LAN. At the same time, no less emphasis in the title is placed on single playthrough. The product is a first-person shooter. The project is also known under the names ÜberSoldier II and “Eastern Front: The Collapse of the Annenerbe”. This is the sequel to The Unknown War.

item.title: LEGO Indiana Jones The Original Adventures
item.description: Game Description The pirateLEGO Indiana Jones The Original Adventures offers the opportunity to play online with a friend for free, together going through an adventure based on all three films about the antiquity hunter Indiana Jones. The gameplay is a humorous three-dimensional arcade game in Lego style. Together with the characters you will experience the key moments of the original paintings. Co-op play is available online or locally on the Internet.

item.title: Rainbow Six Vegas 2
item.description: Game Description Rainbow Six Vegas 2 has the ability to play online, competing with a friend or random participants online online. For free on Pirate, you can participate in versus modes or play as a team, performing in co-op against other participants. The events of the second part act as both a sequel and a prequel to the original shooter. Three game modes are available: single player campaign, online play and co-op.

item.title: Sledgehammer
item.description: Game Description Sledgehammer is literally a festival of destruction and speed that you can experience with a friend on a pirate. With the ability to play online, the user does not have to limit himself to single-player mode, because now you can destroy real opponents, demonstrating your superiority. Rounds of online battles take place on different routes, which have their own terrain features, scales and ways to take the enemy by surprise.

item.title: Obscure 2
item.description: Game Description Obscure 2 continues the plot of the events of the first part and, as before, allows you to play through the campaign with a friend on a pirate. You can play online as one of the proposed characters, including those who were present in the first part. Limfor High School, which was the main setting of the previous game in the series, was decided to be demolished, but this did not rid the characters of their old problems.

item.title: Warhammer 40,000: Dawn of War - Soulstorm
item.description: Game Description Warhammer 40,000: Dawn of War - Soulstorm is an addition to the original game and offers users to try out several new innovations, including playing online with a friend on a pirate. 2 new armies have been added here - Sisters of Battle and Dark Eldar. Thus, there are 9 playable sides, and each can be used to play on the Internet online. In addition, users now have the ability to travel through the star system to fight in different objects and territories.

item.title: Frontlines: Fuel of War
item.description: Game Description Frontlines: Fuel of War is a tactical shooter that offers the opportunity to play online with a friend on a pirate for free. You can compete online online with players from all over the world. A special feature of the gameplay is the ability to use drones. They are divided into reconnaissance and sabotage, machine gun, mortar, etc. The network game is aimed at confrontation and cooperation. Drones are controlled using a remote control.

item.title: Silverfall: Earth Awakening
item.description: Game Description On the pirate version ofSilverfall: Earth Awakening you can play online with a friend for free, going through an intense fantasy campaign in co-op mode. Allows you to fight together online over the Internet, repelling various monsters, and also take part in confrontations with other players. The events take place in the fictional world of Nelve. In this universe, magic and technology intersect. The peculiarity is that in the process of going through history you will have to make difficult choices.

item.title: Conflict: Denied Ops
item.description: Game Description Conflict: Denied Ops is a tactical first-person shooter that offers you to take part in multiplayer battles available online, as well as go through a single-player campaign consisting of a huge number of missions that make it possible to uncover a global conspiracy. You can play pirate for free online with a friend, going through the storyline in co-op. Multiplayer allows you to switch between characters. The story of Conflict: Denied Ops begins with two CIA agents tasked with hunting down terrorists who threaten the world order.

item.title: Turok
item.description: Game Description Turok 2008 offers free online play. In this game you will meet up with a friend to play online. Play Turok online online without spending money on pirates. In Turok you will find yourself in the role of Joseph Turok, a Native American Marine. Your mission: capture war criminal General Roland Kane on a distant planet. Things get complicated quickly. After an emergency landing, you find yourself in a dangerous jungle infested with dinosaurs.

item.title: Unreal Tournament 3
item.description: Game Description Unreal Tournament 3 is a competitive first-person shooter that you can play with a friend online, competing in various multiplayer confrontations online. All multiplayer modes are available for free on the pirate site. UT3 allows for close combat skills, but the main focus is on long-range combat. Compared to previous parts, the balance of weapons has been improved. Many guns have increased damage and rate of fire. Network game includes modes: Deathmatch - every man for himself; Team DM - battle of teams; Capture the Flag - capturing and holding the flag; Vehicle CTF - analogous to the previous mode, but with transport; Duel - duel confrontations; Warfare - destroying the enemy core; Greed - collecting skulls and delivering them to the base; Betrayal - matches using Instagib rifles.

item.title: Crysis
item.description: Game Description Crysis can be played online with a friend or with random players from around the world, competing in various online multiplayer modes online or locally. The gameplay is a first-person shooter that offers you to take control of a Delta Force special forces fighter. Single player campaign and online play available. Multiplayer supports battles for up to 32 players. The ability to play Crisis for free online allows you to fight in two modes: Instant Action (standard deathmatch) and Power Struggle (struggle for power).

item.title: Kane and Lynch: Dead Men
item.description: Game Description On the pirateKane and Lynch: Dead Men you can play online with a friend, completing the co-op campaign for free. Local connection or online access is available. Kane & Lynch: Suicide Squad can also be played solo. Then artificial intelligence takes on the role of a partner. The network game is aimed at co-op, allowing you to take control of two heroes with completely different personalities. Kane is a cold and calculating mercenary, and Lynch is a nervous and unstable hero, ready to act aggressively.

item.title: Call Of Duty 4: Modern Warfare
item.description: Game Description Call of Duty 4: Modern Warfare allows a pirate to take part in various online multiplayer competitions for free. You can play online with a friend or fight against random players around the world. The single player campaign of Call of Duty 4: Modern Warfare consists of three acts, a prologue and an epilogue. After completing it, a special arcade mode opens. Free online play allows you to take part in a wide variety of competitive matches alone or in a team.

item.title: TimeShift
item.description: Game Description TimeShift is a sci-fi shooter that offers the possibility of online co-op on the Internet. TimeShift’s gameplay allows you to play pirates for free online with a friend, going through an intense story campaign and fighting in versus mode. Events take place in the world of the future. An alpha suit was developed that allows time travel. The villain is Aiden Kron and the online game allows partners to destroy a terrorist who goes back in time and changes the course of history.

item.title: Half-Life 2: Episode Two
item.description: Game Description The open world of the newly releasedHalf-Life 2: Episode Two at one time created a stir all over the world. Openly moving with one goal - to deliver information about the Alliance to the Resistance base - was a shocking task that players rushed into one after another. In the first-person shooter, we will continue to play as Gordon Freeman with Alixa Vance. Long journeys in the game are accompanied by frequent changes of scenes: now we are fighting against mutants, now we are solving puzzles, now we are watching an interactive film about the characters’ journey and their conversations.

item.title: Portal
item.description: Game Description Portal is a first-person adventure puzzle game. The plot takes place in the Aperture scientific laboratory, into which the main character, Chell, ended up. She is the one who must test a new weapon that allows you to create portals. Throughout the entire passage, the heroine will be pursued by the GLaDOS robot, telling her what to do and where to go. The first levels will be educational, they will tell you how to use the device.

item.title: Medal of Honor: Airborne
item.description: Game Description Medal of Honor: Airborne can be played online for free, fighting against a friend or against players from around the world. The network game is available online online. Participants fight in different modes, including team battles and classic deathmatches. Medal of Valor: Airborne is the eleventh installment in the military franchise. The main feature of the Medal of Honor: Airborne gameplay is its completely redesigned artificial intelligence. In single player mode, enemies always adapt to the player’s tactics.

item.title: FreakOut: Extreme Freeride
item.description: Game Description FreakOut: Extreme Freeride is a sports arcade game with simulation elements that you can play online with a friend for free on a pirate or random players from all over the world. The gameplay is inspired by the iconic Tony Hawk’s Pro Skater series. Single mode or online play invites you to conquer the ski slopes while skiing. FreakOut: Extreme Freeride requires you to perform a variety of stunts and compete in various multiplayer modes.

item.title: Overlord
item.description: Game Description Overlord is a role-playing adventure that can be played online for free on a pirate with a friend or random players. Each participant takes on the role of an Overlord, controlling hordes of minions. You can compete online on the Internet or go through quests in co-op. A single player campaign and online play are presented. Alone or using free online play, you need to kill 7 fallen heroes to conquer the lands and subjugate their inhabitants.

item.title: Maelstrom: The Battle for Earth Begins
item.description: Game Description Maelstrom: The Battle for Earth Begins crosses RTS and TPS. You can play Pirate with a friend online. This can be done, including online, via the Internet. There is another project with the same name, but without a subtitle in the title. But this release contains precisely a real-time strategy, and not an MMO action game. In this product, you need to extract resources (each side has their own), rebuild a base (this process also differs depending on the chosen group), create and improve an army.

item.title: Rainbow Six Vegas
item.description: Game Description The tactical shooterRainbow Six Vegas can be played online as a pirate, connecting for free with a friend or random people online online. The game introduces a new health system. Now vitality is replenished automatically. The camera now switches between first and third person when using cover or interacting with interactive objects in the location. Multiplayer Rainbow Six Vegas transfers the complete destructibility of the environment from the single-player mode.

item.title: Disney's Chicken Little: Ace in Action
item.description: Game Description Disney’s Chicken Little: Ace in Action lets you play online with a friend as you embark on an exciting space adventure. In this intergalactic online game, you take on the role of Ace, a superhero who, along with his team, saves the Earth from the sinister duo. Playing pirate for free on the Internet online, you have to confront the cunning Foxy Loxy and her strong partner Gusik Lusik, who have conceived another insidious plan.

item.title: Garry's Mod
item.description: Game Description Garry’s Mod is a game and physics sandbox. The main game mode is aimless and provides the player with a freely customizable world powered by the Source engine. The player creates non-player characters with various interaction objects. Special tools and tools allow you to construct new objects in reality, fix beams, iron, objects. Changing facial expressions is also available. Thanks to the flexible engine, users create their own modifications: Spacebuild, Wiremod, Elevator: Source, DarkRP, Prop Hunt and others.

item.title: Dark Messiah of Might and Magic
item.description: Game Description InDark Messiah of Might and Magic you can play pirate online for free, fighting with a friend or random players. The opportunity to play online and a single player campaign is presented. The setting is in the dark fantasy genre. Events take place in the fictional world of Ashan. The gameplay is a first-person action RPG. You can develop various abilities in melee and ranged combat, stealth, spells, etc.

item.title: Defcon
item.description: Game Description Defcon, although it does not stand out due to its detailed graphics or similar details, its format is optimal for playing online with a friend on a pirate. The project is inspired by the 1983 film of the same name and conveys all the experiences, moods and atmosphere that was felt in the world during the Cold War. Here, the user is given the role of a general, who is based in a well-hidden underground bunker.

item.title: El Matador
item.description: Game Description El Matador is a game inspired by the mechanics of the famous Max Payne series. “El Matador” is a third-person shooter where the protagonist, Victor Corbet, is an agent of the Drug Enforcement Administration (DEA). He uses his “bullet time” time dilation skills to perform acrobatic jumps in all directions for spectacular, and most importantly, effective extermination of bandits. Also similar to the project from Remedy Interactive will be the fact that Victor uses dual weapons for both hands.

item.title: Company of Heroes
item.description: Game Description On the pirateCompany of Heroes you have the opportunity to fight online online, commanding a personal platoon of soldiers. You can play online for free with a friend, facing off in duel or multiplayer matches. Network play allows you to join forces with partners, fighting in teams. Each participant’s army is divided into three directions: infantry, paratroopers and a tank unit. The Americans use defensive equipment, while the Germans fight with offensive units.

item.title: Flat Out 2
item.description: Game Description FlatOut 2 is a racing arcade game, the main feature of which is the total destruction of vehicles. You can play online with a friend, fighting for free in various multiplayer competitions. Online Internet connection and LAN modes with split screen are available. The gameplay can be described as a race for survival. The car is damaged by collisions with surrounding objects, so it is important not only to be the first to the finish line, but also to try to hold out until the final lap.

item.title: Disney Pixar Cars
item.description: Game Description Disney Pixar Cars invites players into the racing world of Lightning McQueen, a newcomer eager to conquer the Piston Cup championship. As players dive into the game, they encounter over 30 races and mini-games spread across a variety of environments. The excitement builds as players can choose from ten characters, including fan favorites like Mater and Sally. Each race format offers a unique challenge, from circuit races to checkpoint competitions, providing varied gameplay.

item.title: Heroes 5 Online
item.description: Game Description InHeroes 5 Online you can play online with a friend or compete with random people on the Internet online for free. Heroes of Might and Magic V Online will include free online play and access to the single player campaign. Both co-op and versus modes are available. It is necessary to control the protagonists while exploring the global map. Collecting resources, artifacts and an army, you need to enter into battle with various creatures or other players.

item.title: Rogue Trooper
item.description: Game Description Rogue Trooper is a sci-fi action game in which you can compete with a friend as a pirate for free. Local play and online confrontations are available. You can play online, fighting each other, or go through the story campaign in co-op. There are three modes: single adventure, co-op and online play. Participants in the action take on the role of genetic foot soldiers of the Genetic Infantry, or GI for short.

item.title: STAR WARS Empire at War - Gold Pack
item.description: Game Description STAR WARS Empire at War - Gold Pack is a collection of real-time strategies based on the Star Wars plot. You will play the role of an army manager on one of the sides in an intergalactic civil war. Command units of the Empire, Rebels, Republic or other civilizations. In Star Wars Empire at War, you will command your team, completing tasks and freeing planets from enemies. Visit Tatooine, Kashyyyk, Dagobah or other hot spots in the galaxy.

item.title: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six Lockdown
item.description: Game Description Tom Clancy’s Rainbow Six Lockdown is a tactical shooter with a first-person view. In addition to the single, there is multiplayer, which is available online online. You can also play Pirate with a friend online. In single player mode, the plot revolves around the Legion virus. The Rainbow 6 fighters will have to figure out how various terrorist groups are connected to it. Compared to its predecessors, Tom Clancy’s Rainbow Six Lockdown has improved graphics.

item.title: Need For Speed ​​Most Wanted
item.description: Game Description On the pirateNeed For Speed ​​Most Wanted you can play online for free with a friend. There is the possibility of cooperative play and a competitive mode is presented online on the Internet. Both online play and single player campaign are available. NFSMW takes place in the city of Rockport. You are allowed to freely explore areas of the city, moving along the Black List. According to the plot, the main character must win back his BMW M3 GTR from Razor.

item.title: Star Wars: Battlefront 2 (Classic 2005)
item.description: Game Description Star Wars: Battlefront 2 (Classic 2005) is a competitive shooter with the ability to play online with a friend, compete on a pirate for free, or fight online online with random players. The main goal in multiplayer is to destroy enemy soldiers and capture a control point. Multiplayer play in Star Wars Battlefront 2 introduces new mechanics compared to the previous part. For example, a campaign with various tasks that must be completed.

item.title: Call of Duty 2
item.description: Game Description Call of Duty 2 provides the opportunity to compete online online, fighting with a friend or random players from around the world. You can play the pirate game for free on the Internet online or go through all the single-player campaigns. The online game is aimed at confrontations in which you need to score the maximum number of points. Sometimes there are additional goals. Points are awarded for one kill.

item.title: Quake 4
item.description: Game Description Quake 4, in addition to the storyline, provides users with the opportunity to play online with a friend on a pirate. In addition to the story campaign, gamers can create servers for arena battles. Unlike previous parts of the series, a more advanced engine is used here, making online battles look more impressive. Every element of the environment, including objects for interaction, looks more detailed, and character models no longer seem angular.

item.title: Sniper Elite
item.description: Game Description Sniper Elite allows you to play pirate with a friend online. Multiplayer is available online and locally. On this pirate game you can play online with a friend. The title itself is a tactical third-person shooter with stealth elements. The main emphasis in the gameplay is on shooting from sniper rifles. At such moments, the camera changes the angle to the view from the eyes. For particularly spectacular hits, the bullet’s flight is shown in slow motion.

item.title: F.E.A.R. Platinum Collection
item.description: Game Description F.E.A.R. Platinum Collection is a first-person shooter with horror elements, including a huge number of multiplayer modes that allow you to play online with a friend or random participants. On the pirate F.E.A.R. Platinum Collection offers deathmatch, capture the flag and confrontation modes with capture of control points for free. The possibility of free online play offers competition both online and on a local network. The online game unites participants into teams that must compete in special SloMo matches.

item.title: Serious Sam 2
item.description: Game Description The entire Serious Sam 2 - a first-person shooter with a lot of action - shows us the atmosphere of an absurd fight with many monsters, weapons and a huge number of bonuses scattered on each planet. Cool Sam is full of hope to kill Mental. Everyone in the universe knows that the antagonist is immortal, and in order to destroy him, make him vulnerable, you will have to collect the Medallion of Power.

item.title: Serious Sam 2 (classic)
item.description: Game Description Serious Sam 2 (classic) is a continuation of the classic first-person shooter, which allows you to play online with a friend for free, competing with each other on a pirate game. You can fight online online, locally, or go through a single player campaign. The gameplay is distinguished by the increased dynamics of combat operations. Serious Sam 2 directly continues the previous parts of the franchise of the same name.

item.title: Day of Defeat: Source
item.description: Game Description Day of Defeat: Source is a team-based tactical shooter in which you have the opportunity to play pirates for free with a friend, competing for free in various multiplayer modes online online. DoD: Source is represented by 6 game classes. Each soldier has unique abilities. The online game is aimed at interaction, allowing you to use communication tools and coordinate your actions. Two opposing sides are presented: the Allies and the Wehrmacht.

item.title: FlatOut
item.description: Game Description FlatOut is a racing arcade game in which you can compete online with a friend, playing for free on a pirate in various modes. A feature of the gameplay is the complete destructibility of surrounding objects, be it a fence, fences, water structures, etc. Cars are also completely susceptible to destruction. Each car in FlatOut has its own physics and individual behavior on the track. The car behaves completely differently on different surfaces.

item.title: Grand Theft Auto: San Andreas (GTA Rumble Coop)
item.description: Game Description InGrand Theft Auto: San Andreas (GTA Rumble Coop) you can play online for free as a pirate with a friend, go through a story campaign in co-op, or explore the large open world of the state of San Andreas online online. Online play allows you to participate in confrontations, moving between three large cities: Los Santos, San Fierro and Las Venturas. Any vehicle can be stolen. A variety of cars, trucks, motorcycles, helicopters, planes, boats and bicycles are available.

item.title: Knights of Honor
item.description: Game Description Knights of Honor is a real-time strategy game set in a medieval setting. The project contains a lot of content for solo play offline, but it also allows you to have fun online online. You can play Pirate with a friend online. The title has a low barrier to entry, and detailed training is available for beginners. In the official Russian translation the project was called “Knights of Honor”.

item.title: Empire Earth 2
item.description: Game Description Empire Earth 2 is an isometric real-time strategy game. You can play it online with a friend, even on a pirated platform. Moreover, both via LAN and online online. The gameplay is familiar to the RTS genre. Here you need to collect resources, rebuild and improve your base, acquire an army, destroy enemy units and enemy camps. Each type of troops is superior to some fighters, but inferior to others.

item.title: Obscure
item.description: Game Description Obscure, although it belongs to a genre that initially involves a single playthrough, there is the opportunity to play online with a friend on a pirate. Here, the events unfold in Limfor - an American high school, which, despite its status, is surrounded by not the most pleasant rumors. Many say that students disappear here without a trace, and over time these rumors are confirmed. A strange virus is spreading in the institution, turning children into ugly creatures.

item.title: SWAT 4 Remake
item.description: Game Description SWAT 4 Remake is a modified version of the game of the same name, which allows you to play pirates for free online with a friend or fight terrorism with random people online online. SWAT 4 Remake features improved graphics, updated sounds, additional weapons and various improvements that improve the special forces simulator. SWAT 4 Remake includes the Stechkin Syndicate add-on. Multiplayer modes include Escort, Barricaded Suspects, and Rapid Deployment.

item.title: Splinter Cell Chaos Theory
item.description: Game Description On the pirateSplinter Cell Chaos Theory you can play online with a friend, competing online or participating in cooperative missions together. The main character is Sam Fisher. Events unfold in our time. The agent will have to visit many locations around the world. Chaos Theory tells the story of how the US National Security Agency, called Third Echelon, entrusts Sam with another task to uncover a global conspiracy. Canadian computer algorithms Mass Codes began to wage an information war with the United States.

item.title: Street Racing Syndicate
item.description: Game Description Street Racing Syndicate is a racing arcade game that offers the opportunity to play online with a friend or compete with other participants online. You can take part in all competitive modes for free on Pirate. More than 50 licensed cars are available from 15 leading manufacturers, including Toyota, Lexus, Subaru, Mazda and Volkswagen. The possibility of free online play allows you to fight on the streets of three major US cities.

item.title: Half-Life 2
item.description: Game Description The first-person shooter, which instantly became the voice of the generation -Half-Life 2 - gave players hope for the third part. The game has received so many awards that there is no point in describing them in the context of the description. The plot reveals to us the continuation of the first part. Gordon Freeman takes up his mount again, but now the graphics have become more realistic, there are more locations, and the plot is even deeper.

item.title: Counter-Strike: Source
item.description: Game Description Emerging as a worthy competitor to its previous installment,Counter-Strike: Source is an updated version 1.6 in which players found both disadvantages and advantages. For example, in the new part, many weapons have a completely different bullet spread, which is why players had to get used to it for a long time. The ballistics and shooting technique have not changed, but the graphics and the “atmosphere of an open location” added additional charm to the game for fans of the first-person shooter.

item.title: Half-Life 2: Deathmatch
item.description: Game Description Half-Life 2: Deathmatch is a competitive shooter that you can play online online, fighting with a friend or random players. All three confrontation modes are available for free on the pirate site. The environment and physics are completely borrowed from the original Half-Life 2. The possibility of free online play includes both a standard deathmatch and a team game Combine vs. resistance. Network game Half-Life 2: Deathmatch includes: Deathmatch - a classic death match, where each participant fights for himself; Team Deathmatch - similar to the previous mode, but aimed at group competitions; Puzzle - a puzzle where all participants start on the same Rebel team, choosing your model from the list in the process.

item.title: SuperPower 2 Steam Edition
item.description: Game Description SuperPower 2 Steam Edition is a geopolitical simulator that allows you to play online with a friend on a pirate, competing online for free in various multiplayer modes. You need to manage an entire country. Three main areas for leadership are presented: political, economic and military. At the beginning of the campaign, each player creates their own states. Network play allows you to compete with each other or fight in co-op.

item.title: Rome Total War Collection
item.description: Game Description Rome Total War Collection is a collection of several parts of strategy games in which you can play online for free, fighting with a friend or players from all over the world. Allows you to play on the pirate network in all available multiplayer modes. The pack includes the original part of Rome Total Thief and the extensive addition Barbarian Invasion. The possibility of free online play provides the chance to choose a side in the conflict and fight for dominance over European territories.

item.title: STAR WARS Battlefront (Classic, 2004)
item.description: Game Description InSTAR WARS Battlefront (Classic, 2004) players can participate in competitions online online, fighting on numerous planets of the Star Wars universe, or they can play for free on a pirate online with a friend, fighting in both versus and cooperative. The online game is represented by capturing and holding strategic points. The opposing sides have from 200 to 250 warriors and only one point to capture. The task of all participants is to destroy all enemy soldiers.

item.title: Call Of Duty 1 + United Offensive
item.description: Game Description Call Of Duty 1 + United Offensive is a combination of two projects from the series, and provides the opportunity to play online with a friend as a pirate in the main campaign mission, as well as multiplayer modes. Here, players will be transported to the period of World War II, where they will find themselves in completely different conditions. In total, there are 3 story campaigns - for the USSR, the Allies and the USA, which cover different time periods.

item.title: DOOM 3
item.description: Game Description DOOM 3 allows pirates to play online for free, competing with a friend or other players from around the world. You can fight over the Internet online or locally. The project is a restart of the franchise. The online game includes a variety of confrontation modes. The story campaign of Doom 3 takes place in 2145. The main character finds himself in the United Aerospace Corporation (UAC) research center on Mars.

item.title: CLANNAD
item.description: Game Description CLANNAD is a visual novel in anime style. The story follows a second grade student who begins a new school year at Hikarizaka School. On his way to school, he meets a girl, Nagisa. It turns out that she is constantly alone and has no friends at all. Depending on the actions you take, the course of the story changes. By helping a girl make friends, you build good relationships with some characters, but at the same time spoil them with others.

item.title: Far Cry
item.description: Game Description Far Cry offers to play online online in various multiplayer modes. On Pirate you can play online for free with a friend or compete with random people from all over the world. Far Cry is a sci-fi first-person shooter. The story tells about special forces soldier Jack Carver, who finds himself on a mysterious archipelago. The hero is looking for the missing journalist, but soon discovers that gene experiments were conducted on the island to raise mutants.

item.title: Star Wars: Jedi Knight Jedi Academy
item.description: Game Description Star Wars: Jedi Knight Jedi Academy is a multiplayer action game based on the Star Wars franchise. Jedi Knight: Jedi Academy gives you the opportunity to team up with a friend to play pirate co-op online, taking part in various multiplayer modes for free. You can play online online, exploring the vast expanses of a distant galaxy with a partner, or travel the universe alone. The network game provides a choice of 5 races.

item.title: POSTAL 2
item.description: Game Description POSTAL 2 is a first-person shooter full of dark humor, references, blood and other hardcore stuff like desecrating graves or putting cats on a machine gun as a silencer. The plot develops in a strange town - Paradise. The main character of Postal 2 will be a character named Dude. He tries to live an ordinary life without doing anything illegal. At the beginning of the story, he gets a job at the computer game development office Running with Scissors.

item.title: Postal 2 NicksCoop
item.description: Game Description Postal 2 NicksCoop is a cooperative modification for the game Postal 2, which allows you to play pirate games online with a friend completely free of charge, going through real madness together on the Internet online. Not only are various multiplayer maps presented, but also the full-fledged mechanics of co-op campaigns have been thought out. The gameplay allows you to join forces with a partner, providing the opportunity for free online play for fans.

item.title: Cossacks: War again
item.description: Game Description Cossacks: War Again is a strategy game that you can play online online, competing with a friend for free on a pirate or random players from all over the world. You can play online or alone. The network game is represented by confrontation and co-op modes. The basis of the gameplay is to extract 6 types of resources: wood, food, gold, iron, coal and stone. Each type of resource is mined in certain places on the map.

item.title: Commandos 2
item.description: Game Description InCommandos 2, you can team up with a friend to play online for free as a pirate, participating in co-op missions together or fighting in online confrontations online. Commando 2: Bravery Reward is a strategy game with stealth action elements in which players control a group of soldiers. All squad heroes have their own unique abilities. Commandos 2: Men of Courage characters: Kid - Jack O’Hara, green beret; Hawk - Sir Francis T.

item.title: Stronghold Crusader HD
item.description: Game Description On the pirateStronghold Crusader HD you can play online for free with a friend, competing in medieval confrontations. Players can fight over the Internet online or locally. Stronghold Crusader HD is a remaster of the original strategy, the events of which develop in the era of the Crusaders. Improved intelligence, new units, 4 full-fledged campaigns, online play and more than 100 unique missions are presented. The re-release includes the original game and Crusader Extreme.

item.title: Stronghold Crusader HD
item.description: Game Description A real-time strategy with an in-depth system for leveling up your settlement -Stronghold Crusader HD - was released with an addition that allows you to display the picture on a large screen with good quality. The basis of the game remains the same: we develop, build a large army, attack the enemy, whoever he is, win and move on. **The game has 4 historical campaigns, which are divided into stages in history.

item.title: Delta Force: Task Force Dagger
item.description: Game Description InDelta Force: Task Force Dagger you can play online as a pirate, fighting for free in multiplayer modes with a friend or random participants. Over the Internet, online players take on the role of Delta Force fighters to go to Afghanistan to resolve the military conflict. The online game is aimed at interaction and cooperation between squad members. Before starting the mission, you should listen to the briefing and select equipment.

item.title: GTA 3
item.description: Game Description On the piratedGTA 3 you can play for free online with a friend or online against other players from all over the world over the Internet. The huge interactive city of Liberty City is available for exploration. You are allowed to steal vehicles, run away from the police, fight gangs, complete numerous missions and move freely around the metropolis. The GTA 3 network game is aimed at co-op and player confrontation.

item.title: Return to Castle Wolfenstein
item.description: Game Description The first-person shooterReturn to Castle Wolfenstein features online play that allows you to compete with a friend or random players online. For free, you can play the pirate game online or go through a single-player campaign, the events of which are transferred to the era of World War II. The plot tells an alternative story. Reichsführer SS Himmler, with the support of Hitler himself, uses occult knowledge and science to create an army of monsters.

item.title: Deathmatch Classic
item.description: Game Description Deathmatch Classic from Valve provides free online multiplayer experience in the style of Quake with Half-Life elements. Released in 2001, this multiplayer game allows players to play online with friends over the Internet. Five maps converted from Quake provide an arena for online battles. The experience includes the use of pirated versions, making free play possible. Players' arsenal is identical to Quake, including the trusty Half-Life crowbar for close combat.

item.title: Delta Force: Land Warrior
item.description: Game Description Delta Force: Land Warrior is a tactical shooter that you can play online for free on a pirate, fighting with a friend or teammates online against terrorists. The online game features cooperative missions and modes such as Mortal Kombat, King of the Hill and Capture the Flag. The ability to play Delta Force 3 for free online allows up to 4 people to join forces. Protagonists of Delta Force: Land Warrior: Cole Gas Tank Harris is a talented demolitionist; Erica Mako Swift is a specialist in underwater explosions; Rydel Pitbull Wilson is a strong machine gunner; Jenn Snakebite Tanaka is a master of close-quarters confrontations; Daniel Crossbow Lonetree is an experienced sniper.

item.title: Counter-Strike
item.description: Game Description Counter-strike is a legendary multiplayer shooter, the founder of one of the most popular series in the history of the gaming industry. The concept is simple but ingenious. Two teams - terrorists and special forces - are trying to destroy each other on the map. Terrorists have the ability to plant a bomb at one of the key points. and the counterterrorism department tries to predict which point the opponents will attack.

item.title: Counter-Strike 1.6 Original
item.description: Game Description Counter-Strike 1.6 Original - a clean build, which has the ability to compete on the Internet online or using a local network. The pirate version of Counter-Strike 1.6 Original includes all online functions for free. You can play online with a friend and compete with random players from all over the world. At the center of the confrontation are two factions: terrorists and counter-terrorists. An online game poses different challenges for participants.

item.title: Deus Ex: Game of the Year Edition
item.description: Game Description Deus Ex: Game of the Year Edition is a stealth action game that tells about the world of 2052, when corporations have completely seized power over society, and augmentations have become an integral part of human life. The world is experiencing an economic crisis, various terrorist organizations have become active, and people are suffering from a pandemic - the Gray Death. The main character of the game is special agent JC Denton, who must deal with all this chaos, coming face to face with the Illuminati, conspiracy theories and the secrets of Area 51.

item.title: Quake 3 Arena
item.description: Game Description Quake 3 Arena is a competitive shooter that features the ability to play online with a friend. All network modes are available for free on the pirate site. The gameplay is aimed at confrontations between players in various locations. Competitions take place online or locally. The plot of Quake 4 Arena tells how the ancient race Vadrigar built the Eternal Arena for bloody battles. Gladiators fight on it and entertain the Vadrigars.

item.title: Half-Life: Opposing Force
